长江三角洲是得天独厚的鱼米之乡。
Chángjiāng Sānjiǎozhōu shì détiāndúhòu de yúmǐzhīxiāng。
The Changjiang Delta, richly endowed by nature, is a land of plenty.
这一带都是仓禀殷实的鱼米之乡。
Zhè yídài dōushì cāngbǐng yīnshí de yúmǐ zhī xiāng。
With it\'s full granaries, the area is rich in rice and fish.
鱼米之乡。
丰饶的鱼米之乡
富庶的鱼米之乡
各种人都来参加，未免泥沙俱下，鱼龙混杂。
Gè zhǒng rén dōu lái cānjiā，wèimiǎn níshājùxià，yúlónghùnzá。
People of all descriptions flocked to join in, so inevitably the waters were muddied and the bad became mixed with the good.
现在的影视界可谓是鱼龙混杂，良莠不齐。
Xiànzài de yǐngshìjiè kěwèishì yúlónghùnzá，liángyǒubùqí。
Nowadays,in film and TV circles, good and bad are mixed together.
这个乐队鱼龙混杂。
Zhège yuèduì yúlónghùnzá。
This band has a mixture of good and bad musicians.
鱼跃龙门。

Dàxíng xīqì yúlóng jùyǒu liǎngyì。

鱼类触须
yúlèi chùxū 
barbel

Tea seed cake can be used to kill wild fish in the lake.
一些鱼类回游到此水段来繁殖后代。

Some fish migrate to this section of water to breed.
不同的鱼类生活在不同的水层。

The fishermen were ebbing the catch in.

Jiěshì zhèxiē xiànxiàng xūyào guānyú yúlèi de zhīshi。
解释这些现象需要关于鱼类的知识。
Many marine fishes inhabit the mid-waters.

许多海洋鱼类生活在中层水域。

Niányòu de niǎo、yú hé páxínglèi dòngwù dōu chǎnluǎn。
年幼的鸟、鱼和爬行类动物都产卵。
Salmon roe is marketed as analogous to caviar.

Grandpa always goes fishing with this wooden boat.
大副发现船的左前方有鲸鱼群。

Chéngmén shīhuǒ，yāngjí chíyú，zhèshì nǐ yě tuōlíbùliǎo gānxì。
When the city gate is on fire, the fish in the moat will suffer, you can\'t escape responsibility.
他被皇帝软禁了起来，过着池鱼笼鸟一样的生活。
Tā bèi huángdì ruǎnjìn le qǐlái，guò zhe chíyú lóngniǎo yíyàng de shēnghuó。
He was confined by the emperor, living like a fish in a pond or a bird in a cage.
他家是船户，以打鱼为生。
Tā jiā shì chuánhù，yǐ dǎyú wéishēng。
He lives on a boat and makes his living by fishing.
附近的船民都是世居此地，祖祖辈辈以打鱼为生。
Fùjìn de chuánmín dōushì shìjū cǐdì，zǔzǔbèibèi yǐ dǎyú wéishēng。
All the neighboring boatmen have lived here and made a living by fishing for generations.
刚抓住的鱼跐溜一下就从我手中滑走了。
Gāng zhuāzhù de yú cīliū yíxià jiù cóng wǒ shǒu zhōng huázǒu le。
The fish I had just caught slipped out of my hand.
今天我请你去吃大马哈鱼。
Jīntiān wǒ qǐng nǐ qù chī dàmǎhāyú。
Today I\'ll treat you to salmon.
正所谓“人为刀俎，我为鱼肉”，现在只能任人摆布了。
Zhèng suǒwèi“rén wéi dāozǔ，wǒ wéi yúròu”，xiànzài zhǐnéng rèn rén bǎibù le。
Just as a Chinese saying goes, &quot;being meat or fish on another\'s chopping board&quot;, I am now at others\' mercy.
他从这个钓位已经钓上十来条鱼了。
Tā cóng zhège diàowèi yǐjing diàoshàng shíláitiáo yú le。
He has caught about ten fishes from this fishing position.
小明每天给他的金鱼喂饵料。
Xiǎo Míng měitiān gěi tā de jīnyú wèi ěrliào。
Xiaoming feeds his goldfish with fish bait.
用药期间，最好别吃鱼虾等发物！
Yòngyào qījiān，zuì hǎo bié chī yú xiā děng fāwù！
When taking this medicine you\'d better not eat stimulating food such as fish and shrimp.
煎鱼时不能只煎一面，要及时翻个儿。
Jiān yú shí bùnéng zhǐ jiān yímiàn，yào jíshí fāngèr。
You must turn over the fish at the right time when you cook it.
这些鱼是赶海的时候捉到的。
Zhèxiē yú shì gǎnhǎi de shíhou zhuōdào de。
These fish were caught when I went to the beach to collect marine life.
他要真炒你鱿鱼，你就干脆另择高枝算了。
Tā yào zhēn chǎo nǐ yóuyú，nǐ jiù gàncuì lìngzé gāozhī suàn le。
If he fires you, you just find another job.
大多数海鸟都以鱼为食物。
Dàduōshù hǎiniǎo dōu yǐ yú wéi shíwù。
Many sea birds live on fish.
我家的河塘里有很多鱼。
Wǒjiā de hétáng lǐ yǒu hěnduō yú。
There are plenty of fish in my families river dyke.
鲎鱼是一种很奇特的蓝血动物。
Hòuyú shì yìzhǒng hěnqítè de lánxuè dòngwù。
The Limuloid is a very unique animal with blue blood.
这家饭店的滑熘鱼丸做的很好吃。
Zhèjiā fàndiàn de huáliūyúwán zuò de hěnhǎo chī。
The fried fish balls made by this hotel taste good.
此地区的湟鱼年产量为全国之首。
Cǐ dìqū de huángyú nián chǎnliàng wéi quánguó zhī shǒu。
The annual output of Gymnocypris przewalskii in this area ranks first in the country.
一些鱼类回游到此水段来繁殖后代。
Yìxiē yúlèi huíyóu dào cǐ shuǐduàn lái fánzhí hòudài。
Some fish migrate to this section of water to breed.
这个季节正是鱼洄游的时候。
Zhège jìjié zhèngshì yú huíyóu de shíhou。
This is the season when fish migrate.
这次考核非常严格，没有混水摸鱼的可能。
Zhècì kǎohé fēicháng yángé，méiyǒu hùnshuǐ mōyú de kěnéng。
This examination will be strictly carried out, so there is no chance to fish in troubled waters.
鱼儿在荷花池中轻游，偶尔会惊出几许涟漪。
Yúr zài héhuāchí zhōng qīngyóu，ǒuěr huì jīngchū jǐ xǔ liányī。
Fish are swimming gently in the lotus pond,  causing ripples at times.
我满怀喜悦观察潭景，体会潭中鱼与游者相乐的佳趣。
Wǒ mǎnhuái xǐyuè guānchá tánjǐng，tǐhuì tán zhōng yú yǔ yóuzhě xiānglè de jiāqù。
I enjoyed the charming scene of the pool, where the fish and the swimmers were enjoying each other\'s company.
爷爷见天都要去池塘钓鱼，真是个快乐的老人。
Yéye jiàntiān dōuyào qù chítáng diàoyú，zhēnshì gè kuàilè de lǎorén。
Grandpa is a happy guy, who goes to fish in the pond every day.
家人不让孩子随便去江河里捉鱼虾。
Jiārén bú ràng háizi suíbiàn qù jiānghé lǐ zhuō yúxiā。
Parents don\'t allow their children to catch fish and shrimp in the river.
如今的教辅读物鱼目混杂，质量参差不齐。
Rújīn de jiàofǔ dúwù yúmù hùnzá，zhìliàng cēncībùqí。
Nowadays, books assisting teaching and learning are of varied qualities, and it is hard to distinguish good ones from bad ones.
出海捕鱼前我要在船上绑几个救生圈。
Chūhǎi bǔyú qián wǒ yào zài chuánshàng bǎng jǐgè jiùshēngquān。
I tie several rubber tires to the boat before I go to the sea to fish.
老板！那位客官不喜欢咱们店里做的鱼。
Lǎobǎn！Nàwèi kèguān bùxǐhuan zánmen diàn lǐ zuò de yú。
Sir, the guest doesn\'t like our fish.
宝宝很喜欢吃妈妈做的红烧快鱼。
Bǎobao hěnxǐhuan chī māma zuò de hóngshāokuàiyú。
The child likes his mother\'s stewed herring with brown sauce very much.
爸爸在院里垒砌了一个水池，准备养鱼用。
Bàba zài yuànlǐ lěiqì le yígè shuǐchí，zhǔnbèi yǎngyú yòng。
Father built a pool with stones, and bricks in the yard to raise fish.
总吃大鱼大肉不如吃些像莲花白这样的蔬菜对身体有益。
Zǒngchī dàyú dàròu bùrú chī xiē xiàng liánhuābái zhèyàng de shūcài duì shēntǐ yǒuyì。
It is helpful for your health to eat vegetables such as brocoli rather than meat, and fish.
这篇文章鲁鱼亥豕，错误百出。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng lǔyú hàishǐ，cuòwù bǎichū。
In this article, a lot of clerical and typographical errors are made through confusing similar characters.
我打算明年开始在渔场换成轮养的方式养鱼。
Wǒ dǎsuàn míngnián kāishǐ zài yúchǎng huànchéng lúnyǎng de fāngshì yǎngyú。
I am going to start keeping various species of fish in rotation in the fishing ground.
罗非鱼一年能够繁殖数代，生殖能力很强。

Tilapia are very fertile, and reproduce several offspring every year.
我从农贸市场买了两斤猫鱼准备回家喂猫。
Wǒ cóng nóngmào shìchǎng mǎi le liǎng jīn māoyú zhǔnbèi huíjiā wèimāo。
I\'ve bought two kilos of small fish from the farmers’ market, and plan to feed the cat at home.
他一个猛子扎下水，抓住了一条鲤鱼。
Tā yígè měngzi zā xià shuǐ，zhuāzhù le yìtiáo lǐyú。
With a dive, he caught a carp.
真没想到钓鱼还有如此妙趣。
Zhēn méi xiǎngdào diàoyú háiyǒu rúcǐ miàoqù。
I don\'t think that fishing is charming, and interesting.
这个饭店有一道名厨主理的红烧鱼，特别好吃。
Zhège fàndiàn yǒu yídào míngchú zhǔlǐ de hóngshāoyú，tèbié hǎochī。
There is an especially delicious dish of fish braised in brown sauce, which is cooked by a skillful chef.
爷爷时常架着这条木船在江上捕鱼。
Yéye shícháng jià zhe zhètiáo mùchuán zài jiāng shàng bǔyú。
Grandpa always goes fishing with this wooden boat.
我都目验过了，这些鱼都是新鲜的。
Wǒ dōu mùyàn guò le，zhèxiē yú dōushì xīnxiān de。
I have tested and verified with my own eyes. All the fish are fresh.
鲑鱼每年都要逆流而上，到它们的出生地产卵。
Guīyú měinián dōuyào nìliú ér shàng，dào tāmen de chūshēngdì chǎnluǎn。
Every year the salmons swim against the current to lay eggs in their birth place.
那个泡子里有鱼，所以常有水鸟在附近栖息。
Nàge pàozi lǐ yǒu yú，suǒyǐ chángyǒu shuǐniǎo zài fùjìn qīxī。
There are some fish in the small lake, so many water birds live beside it.
这种鱼雷是专门用来攻击潜水艇的。
Zhèzhǒng yúléi shì zhuānmén yònglái gōngjī qiánshuǐtǐng de。
The fish torpedo is specially used to attack submarines.
透过清浅的溪水，可以看见水底的小鱼。
Tòuguò qīngqiǎn de xīshuǐ，kěyǐ kànjiàn shuǐdǐ de xiǎoyú。
The little fish at the bottom of the brook can be seen though the clear and shallow water.
这个渔夫打捞上来一条珍稀的人鱼。
Zhège yúfū dǎlāo shànglái yìtiáo zhēnxī de rényú。
The fisherman found a rare dugong in the water.

In dried-up rivers, fish can survive by moistening each other with saliva. We can also get through these difficulties by encouraging each other.
我在岸边静静地等待着鱼儿入网。
Wǒ zài ànbiān jìngjìng de děngdài zhe yúér rùwǎng。
I wait silently by the river for the fish to enter the net.
那个戴着箬笠在雨中捕鱼的人是我叔叔。
Nàgè dài zhe ruòlì zài yǔ zhōng bǔyú de rén shì wǒ shūshū。
The man wearing a bamboo hat, and fishing in the rain was my uncle.
他做什么事情都没有恒心，总是三天打鱼，两天晒网。
Tā zuò shénme shìqing dōu méiyǒu héngxīn，zǒng shì sāntiān dǎyú，liǎng tiān shài wǎng。
He can\'t hold a constant interest in anything. He always works in fits, and starts.
沙鱼被认为是海洋中最凶猛的动物。

Sharks are considered as the most ferocious animal in ocean.
这种鱼生活在海里的深水层。
Zhèzhǒng yú shēnghuó zài hǎilǐ de shēnshuǐcéng。
This fish lives in the deep levels of the sea.
水网藻对于养鱼业来说危害极大。

这些珍贵的热带观赏鱼对水温的的变化十分敏感。

These precious tropical fish are very sensitive to the changes of water temperature.

Ripples appear on the water surface when fish pass by.
这些鱼肉酸败了，发出很难闻的气味。
Zhèxiē yúròu suānbài le，fāchū hěnnánwén de qìwèi。
The fish has gone bad, and smells terrible.
一只章鱼用腕足卷住了敌人。

An octopus coiled around its enemy with its tentacles.
他带着网具呢，看上去是要去打鱼了。
Tā dài zhe wǎngjù ne，kànshàngqù shì yào qù dǎyú le。
He is taking his netting gear, so it seems that he is going fishing now.

时间太久了，妈妈去年冬天腌制的咸鱼都变味了。

东方已经现出鱼肚白了，现在估计有六点了吧！

杰克看到河里有只鲞鱼。

妈妈最拿手的一道菜就是炒鱼片儿。

妹妹最喜欢吃超市里卖的那种鱼片儿了。

The material of this diving suit adopts bionic principles so it is as firm as sharkskin.
现在的影视界可谓是鱼龙混杂，良莠不齐。

shēngyúpiàn

wú tiáojiàn tóuxiáng
unconditional surrender
无条件投降。
缴械投降
jiǎoxiè tóuxiáng
lay down one\'s arms and surrender

Wǒ nìngsǐ yě bùtóuxiáng。
I would rather die than surrender.
无条件投降
wú tiáojiàn tóuxiáng
unconditional surrender

屈膝投降。
逼使敌人投降

无条件投降。

敌人战败投降了。

跑道畅通无阻，可以降落。
to get {or} be given clearance to land
得到降落许可
His plane lands at six-thirty.
他的飞机于6点30分降落。
to parachute sb/sth into
[+country，region] 用降落伞将某人/某物空投到
You want to deploy your parachute at the right time to ensure a safe landing.
你应该在正确的时间打开降落伞，保证安全着陆。
The rectilinear runway lights are a good guide for planes landing at night.
这些直线排列的跑道灯为夜间降落的飞机提供了良好的导航。
At the airport, they use orange lights as the signal for the plane to land.
在机场，他们用橘黄色的灯光作为飞机降落的信号。

机长正在使飞机平稳降落。

Zhècì jiàngwēn lái de tūrán，hòu yīfu dōu hái méiyǒu zhǔnbèi ne！
The temperature dropped suddenly, and we hadn\'t prepared warm clothes.
劳动强度增大必然导致劳动者的体力消耗增加，劳动效率下降。
Láodòng qiángdù zēngdà bìrán dǎozhì láodòngzhě de tǐlì xiāohào zēngjiā，láodòng xiàolǜ xiàjiàng。
A rise in labour intensity must increase strength consumption and decrease work efficiency.
由于农民们没有准备，突然的降温使果树遭受了冷害。
Yóuyú nóngmínmen méiyǒu zhǔnbèi，tūrán de jiàngwēn shǐ guǒshù zāoshòu le lěnghài。
Due to lack of preparation by the farmers, the sudden temperature drop made the fruit trees suffer from the disaster of sudden cold.
我们商店的库房里积压着大量冷门货，正准备降价销售。
Wǒmen shāngdiàn de kùfáng lǐ jīyā zhe dàliàng lěngmén huò，zhèng zhǔnbèi jiàngjià xiāoshòu。
In our depot, there overstocks a lot of outdated goods. We are preparing to sell them at a lowered price.
为了激活市场购买力，两家公司决定降价联销部分库存商品。
Wèile jīhuó shìchǎng gòumǎilì，liǎng jiā gōngsī juédìng jiàngjià liánxiāo bùfēn kùcún shāngpǐn。
In order to activate market purchasing power, the two companies decided to lower the price to jointly sell some of the stock goods.
由于季节的变化，我公司的零售额有所下降。
Yóuyú jìjié de biànhuà，wǒ gōngsī de língshòué yǒusuǒ xiàjiàng。
The retail sales of our company are down due to the change of seasons.
明天气温将降到零下，请市民们注意防寒。
Míngtiān qìwēn jiāng jiàngdào língxià，qǐng shìmínmen zhùyì fánghán。
The temperature will be below zero tomorrow. Tell citizens to be aware of the bitter cold.
南瓜子营养丰富，据说有降血压、治疗慢性病等很多用处。
Nánguāzǐ yíngyǎng fēngfù，jùshuō yǒu jiàngxuèyā、zhìliáo mànxìngbìng děng hěnduō yòngchu。
Pumpkin seeds are nutritious. It is said that it can be used to reduce blood pressure, and cure chronic diseases.
早晨空腹喝一杯温水，可以降低血液黏稠度。
Zǎochén kōngfù hē yì bēi wēnshuǐ，kěyǐ jiàngdī xuèyè niánchóudù。
Drinking a cup of lukewarm water on an empty stomach will bring down blood viscosity.
由于山区连续降雨，山塘的水位猛涨。
Yóuyú shānqū liánxù jiàngyǔ，shāntáng de shuǐwèi měng zhǎng。
Due to continuous rain, the water level of the ponds in the mountain has increased rapidly.
由于学习成绩下降，我被父亲申饬了。
Yóuyú xuéxí chéngjì xiàjiàng，wǒ bèi fùqīn shēnchì le。
I was blamed by my father due to the worsening of my study.
我们要通过推行义务教育来不断降低失学率。
Wǒmen yào tōngguò tuīxíng yìwù jiàoyù lái búduàn jiàngdī shīxuélǜ。
We should decrease the drop-out rate at school by promoting compulsory education.
经过我军三天三夜的苦战，敌人终于抵挡不住了，送来了降表。
Jīngguò wǒjūn sāntiān sān yè de kǔzhàn，dírén zhōng yú dǐdǎng búzhù le，sònglái le xiángbiǎo。
The enemy finally issued a document of surrender, after fighting for three days and three nights.
我们的国王一向以善用降将而著名。
Wǒmen de guówáng yí xiàng yǐ shànyòng jiàngjiāng ér zhùmíng。
Our king is famous for his kind treatment to surrendered generals.
你这是邪火攻心，需要服点降火的药。
Nǐ zhè shì xiéhuǒ gōngxīn，xūyào fú diǎn jiànghuǒ de yào。
You are suffering from excessive internal heat and need some medicine to treat it.
根据他的症状，老中医为他开了个降心火的方子，
Gēnjù tā de zhèngzhuàng，lǎo zhōng yī wèi tā kāi le gè jiàngxīnhuǒ de fāngzi，
The old herbal doctor prescribed something to ease the internal heat based on his symptoms.
由于公司营业额不断下降，董事会决定换掉经理。
Yóuyú gōngsī yíngyèé búduàn xiàjiàng，dǒngshìhuì juédìng huàndiào jīnglǐ。
With the continuous decrease of its business income, the board decided to change the company\'s manager.
她在冬天收集了许多雪水，准备夏天用来降暑。
Tā zài dōngtiān shōují le xǔduō xuěshuǐ，zhǔnbèi xiàtiān yònglái jiàngshǔ。
She collected lots of snow water in winter so as to reduce the heat in summer.
为了降低成本，他减少了用在杂项上的费用。
Wèile jiàngdī chéngběn，tā jiǎnshǎo le yòngzài zá xiàng shàng de fèiyòng。
In order to reduce costs, he cut miscellaneous expenses.
作为一名老军阀，他过去曾不断招降纳叛。
Zuòwéi yìmíng lǎojūnfá，tā guòqù céng búduàn zhāoxiáng nàpàn。
As a senior warlord, he used to continuously recruit deserters and traitors in the past.
由于经营不善，公司利润骤降。
Yóuyú jīngyíng búshàn，gōngsī lìrùn zhòujiàng。
Through bad operation, the company had a slump in profits.
在助产士的帮助下，胎儿顺利地降生了。
Zài zhùchǎnshì de bāngzhù xià，tāiér shùnlì de jiàngshēng le。
With the help of the midwife, the baby was born successfully.
驻留在患者体内的毒素会被这种高分子药物降解。
Zhùliú zài huànzhě tǐnèi de dúsù huì bèi zhèzhǒng gāofēnzǐ yàowù jiàngjiě。
Toxins remaining in the patient\'s body will be degraded by this macromolecular medicine.
用了这种特效的牙膏，小孩蛀牙发生率可能会下降。
Yòng le zhèzhǒng tèxiào de yágāo，xiǎohái zhùyá fāshēnglǜ kěnéng huì xiàjiàng。
By using this kind of special toothpaste, children may decrease the rate of tooth decay.
他自忖地位下降，心中暗暗感到悲伤。
Tā zì cǔn dìwèi xiàjiàng，xīn zhōng ànàn gǎndào bēishāng。
He felt quite sad after reflecting on the decay of his status.
降雨往往是在对流层发生的。
Jiàngyǔ wǎngwǎng shì zài duìliúcéng fāshēng de。
Rain is created in the troposphere.
伞兵在跳下飞机后，在半空中打开了降落伞。

The paratrooper opened the parachute in mid air after he had jumped out of the plane.
滥用有机肥料可能会导致土地的土质下降。

这架飞机可以执行人工降雨等任务。

Workers are using a lift to transfer building materials to the top floor.

The soldiers are practicing parachute jumping with the help of the parachute tower.
卫星云图显示未来几天将有大规模降雨。

升高/降低高度

shíxíngchǎn、yùn、xiāo yìtiáolóng
make production, transportation and marketing a coordinated process
短途运销。
运销蔬菜。
把这批易爆物品安妥地运到野外销毁。
The ASH is promoting a new campaign against the sale of tobacco products.
国际反烟组织正开展一项新运动，反对销售烟草产品。
远销海外
yuǎnxiāo hǎiwài
find a good sale overseas; find a market abroad
远销国外。
Our sale blew up and sold a lot more than we ever expected.
Wǒmen xiāoshòu hěn hǎo， xiāoshòuliàng yuǎnyuǎn chāoguò wǒmen qīwàng de。
我们销售很好，销售量远远超过我们期望的。
由于营销策略的改变，第三季度的销售额陡增。
Yóuyú yíngxiāo cèlüè de gǎibiàn，dìsān jìdù de xiāoshòu\'é dǒuzēng。
The sales volume in the third quarter skyrocketed, which should be attributed to the change in marketing strategy.
我公司正在敦聘出色的营销人员。
Wǒ gōngsī zhèngzài dūnpìn chūsè de yíngxiāo rényuán。
Our company is very serious about hiring marketing personnel with outstanding records.
那个商场抛出的营销企划，是完全针对这个商场而制定的。
Nàge shāngchǎng pāochū de yíngxiāo qǐhuà，shì wánquán zhēnduì zhège shāngchǎng ér zhìdìng de。
The market produced a marketing proposal according to its own conditions.
营销人员个个口齿伶俐，说话趋利避害。
Yíngxiāo rényuán gègè kǒuchǐ línglì，shuōhuà qūlì bìhài。
All salesmen have a slick tongue, they will push the advantages and avoid the disadvantages when they speak.
由于营销策略失误，今年商品的利润下滑50%。
Yóuyú yíngxiāo cèlüè shīwù，jīnnián shāngpǐn de lìrùn xiàhuá bǎifēnzhī wǔshí。
Due to the wrong sales strategy, the profit of this year\'s goods dropped by 50%.
最近公司组织了关于营销的学习班，我们都参加了。
Zuìjìn gōngsī zǔzhī le guānyú yíngxiāo de xuéxíbān，wǒmen dōu cānjiā le。
We participated in the training class on marketing, which was organized by the company recently.
这家企业预计在年内实现营销国际化。
Zhèjiā qǐyè yùjì zài niánnèi shíxiàn yíngxiāo guójìhuà。
This enterprise plans to achieve international marketing by the end of the year.
由于公司今年营销策略得当，利润源源而来。
Yóuyú gōngsī jīnnián yíngxiāo cèlüè dédàng，lìrùn yuányuán érlái。
Thanks to a proper marketing strategy, the company\'s profit comes in a steady stream.
缴销营业执照
jiǎoxiāo yíngyè zhízhào 
hand in the business licence for cancellation
那个商店专门经营出口转内销的商品，我们一起去看看吧。
Nàge shāngdiàn zhuānmén jīngyíng chūkǒu zhuǎn nèixiāo de shāngpǐn，wǒmen yìqǐ qù kànkàn ba。
That shop specializes in selling export-oriented-transformed-domestic-market-targeted goods. Let\'s go and see.
节日营销方案出笼
营销皮革制品。
知名度高的企业在产品营销上占有优势。
由于经营有方，企业实现了产销两旺
The next one will be my last attempt at the marketing exam, after that I won\'t try it again.
下次我再参加一次市场营销考试，最后再努力一把，此后再也不考了。
I think it would be useful for you to learn the basics of marketing.
我认为学习一些市场营销的基础知识会对你很有好处。
I don\'t know anything about marketing but I can study.
我对市场营销一无所知，但我可以学。
This company puts a high value on marketing.
这家公司高度重视市场营销。
She has a degree in Marketing.
她拥有市场营销专业的学位。
He is becoming a real marketing man.
他正逐步成为一个真正的营销专家。
Coca-Cola Company\'s products are cleverly marketed.
可口可乐公司的产品营销手段十分灵活。
He worked in the marketing plan end of things.
他负责营销计划部分的工作。
She currently holds the position of marketing manager.
她现在担任营销经理的职位。
Xerox has the best sales-training program.
施乐公司拥有最好的营销培训计划。
The ad campaign was based on the latest marketing concepts.
这个广告计划是按最新的营销观念制定的。
His dissertation discusses the application of Sun Tzu\'s military strategies in modern marketing.
他的毕业论文探讨了孙子兵法在现代营销中的应用。
I have substantial understanding of marketing.
我对市场营销相当了解。
The new marketing strategy has brought us visual profits.
新的营销策略给我们带来了切实的利润。
This article breaks down the truths of website marketing.
Zhè piān wénzhāng xiángxìjièshàole wǎngluò yíngxiāo de yuánlǐ。
这篇文章详细介绍了网络营销的原理。
The overall design of your reports is an important part of your marketing effort.
Nǐ bàogào zhōng de zǒngtǐ guīhuà shì nǐ yíngxiāo xiàonéng de zhòngyào bùfen。
你报告中的总体规划是你营销效能的重要部分。
Rob has worked in sales and marketing for 15 years with a breath of experience.
Bàobó zài xiāoshòubùmén hé yíngxiāo bùmén gōngzuò guò 15 nián，yōngyǒu fēngfù de jīngyàn。
鲍勃在销售部门和营销部门工作过15年，拥有丰富的经验。
Research can help a company to develop its global marketing strategy.
Yánjiū néng bāngzhù gōngsī zhìdìng chū qí quánqiú yíngxiāo cèlüè。
研究能帮助公司制定出其全球营销策略。
Weighing up the competition is an important part of marketing.
Quánhéng jìngzhēng shì shìchǎngyíngxiāo de zhòngyào bùfen。
权衡竞争是市场营销的重要部分。
The horrible marketing plan took the shine off a great product.
Kěpà de yíngxiāo jìhuà shǐ yí gè jíhǎo de chǎnpǐn xiāngxíngjiànchù。
可怕的营销计划使一个极好的产品相形见绌。
His experience in marketing resulted in the forwarding of his career.
Shìchǎng yíngxiāo fāngmiàn de jīngyàn cùjìn tā zhíyè shēngyá de fāzhǎn。
市场营销方面的经验促进他职业生涯的发展。
Most companies have a manager in charge of marketing.
Dàduōshù gōngsī dōu yǒu yí gè zhǔguǎn shìchǎng yíngxiāo de jīnglǐ。
大多数公司都有一个主管市场营销的经理。
They had to complete the sale before the banks closed.
Tāmen bìxū zài yínháng tíngzhǐ yíngyè qián wánchéng xiāoshòu。
他们必须在银行停止营业前完成销售。
The American firm accounts for some 60 per cent of the world\'s annual sales of computers and has a turnover around $30000 million.
Zhège Měiguó gōngsī zhànjùle shìjiè diànnǎo nián xiāoliàng de 60%，bìngqiě měinián yíngyè\'é dádào 300 yì měiyuán。
这个美国公司占据了世界电脑年销量的60%，并且每年营业额达到300亿美元。

be on sale throughout the country

be on sale; sell

shíxíngchǎn、yùn、xiāo yìtiáolóng

The supermarket is holding a promotional activity on food preservation bags.
各大银行都有国债承购包销的业务。

All banks underwrite national debt.
今年冬天西瓜销售的市况很好，明年我们要有计划地进行补充。

Watermelons are selling well in the market this winter, so we\'ll supply more next year in a planned way.
展销会的司令部制定了周密的计划，保证会议的顺利进行。
Zhǎnxiāohuì de sīlìngbùzhìdìng le zhōumì de jìhuà，bǎozhèng huìyì de shùnlì jìnxíng。
The command center of this exhibition has made a careful plan to ensure the smooth progress of the meeting.
行销。
产品行销海内外。
销行国内外。
They stopped selling in exact sizes in order to reduce inventory.
Wèile jiǎnshǎo kùcún，tāmen tíngzhǐ yǐ jīngquè guīgé jìnxíng xiāoshòu。
为了减少库存，他们停止以精确规格进行销售。
He imposed his pretentious books on the public.
他把他写的自认为不错的书强行推销给大众。
He ended up as a commercial traveller.
Tā zuìzhōng chéngwéile yí gè lǚxíngtuīxiāoyuán。
他最终成为了一个旅行推销员。

任何有形资产如果出现永久性磨损，就要进行冲销。
Repairs to properties and fittings in licensed properties are written off as incurred.
Shòuquán zīchǎn jí xiāngguān shèbèi jìnxíng wéixiū shí，yào duìqí jìnxíng chōngxiāo。
授权资产及相关设备进行维修时，要对其进行冲销。
They negotiated the sale of the house.
Tāmen jìnxíng fángwū xiāoshòu tánpàn。
他们进行房屋销售谈判。
Her new novel jumped high on the bestseller list.

她的新小说跃居畅销书排行榜前茅。

某些情况下，直接核销法是可行的。

The CEO was disappointed with the sales team for not reaching their sales quota.

销售团队没有达到他们的销售定额，首席执行官对此深表失望。

犯罪分子销毁了底账。

The metal used to make these spills is very expensive.
用于制造这些销子的金属非常贵。
The climb was originally very bold with the main protection being two pegs.

This style of shoe is in demand.
Zhèzhǒng shìyàng de xiézǐ xiāolù hěn hǎo。
这种式样的鞋子销路很好。
The former nazi was denaturalized.
Zhè míng qián Nàcuìfènzǐ bèi chèxiāole guīhuàquán。
这名前纳粹分子被撤销了归化权。
We must all share the blame for the haberdashery incident.

销路很好
xiāolù hěn hǎo
have a good sale; find a good market; sell well
没有销路
méiyǒu xiāolù
find no sale (or market)
质量可靠的产品总能有畅旺的销路。
Zhìliàng kěkào de chǎnpǐn zǒng néng yǒu chàngwàng de xiāolù。
Quality-reliable products will always sell well.
这种王木纹地板砖的销路非常好。
Zhèzhǒng wángmùwén dìbǎnzhuān de xiāolù fēicháng hǎo。
These floor tiles with &quot;王&quot;-shaped veins are selling well.
这个货比较冷背，上市以来销路就不好。
Zhège huò bǐjiào lěngbèi，shàngshì yǐlái xiāolù jiù bùhǎo。
The product is slow-moving. Ever since it was put into market, it hasn\'t sold well.
由于销路不好，这个厂的冷库里积压了大量的冷冻食品。
Yóuyú xiāolù bùhǎo，zhège chǎng de lěngkù lǐ jīyā le dàliàng de lěngdòng shípǐn。
Because of small market, a lot of frozen foods were overstocked in the refrigeratory of the factory.
这种碗橱式样新颖，在市场上销路很好。
Zhèzhǒng wǎnchú shìyàng xīnyǐng，zài shìchǎng shàng xiāolù hěnhǎo。
This cupboard for tableware is new in style, and sells well in the market.
这个公司生产的洗头水销路一直不错。
Zhège gōngsī shēngchǎn de xǐtóushuǐ xiāolù yìzhí búcuò。
The shampoo produced by this company, and always sells well.
这家工厂加工的香肚在市场上有很好的销路。
Zhèjiā gōngchǎng jiā gōng de xiāngdù zài shìchǎng shàng yǒu hěnhǎo de xiāolù。
The pork sausage produced by this factory is well received in the market.

Furniture made of  keteleeria fortunei is very polular in the market recently.

shēngchǎn shìxiāo duìlù、zhìliàng hǎo de chǎnpǐn
produce popular products of good quality
我带的钱够一路开销的。
Wǒ dài de qián gòu yílù kāixiāo de。
I\'ve brought enough money with me to cover the expenses of the trip.
给滞销商品找个出路
gěi zhìxiāo shāngpǐn zhǎo gè chūlù 
find an outlet for unsalable goods

这次审计中，我们在帐目冲销上发现了很多不合理之处。
Zhècì shěnjì zhōng，wǒmen zài zhàngmù chōngxiāo shàng fāxiàn le hěnduō bùhélǐ zhī chù。
During the audit, we found many discrepancies in their books.
那个商店专门经营出口转内销的商品，我们一起去看看吧。
Nàge shāngdiàn zhuānmén jīngyíng chūkǒu zhuǎn nèixiāo de shāngpǐn，wǒmen yìqǐ qù kànkàn ba。
That shop specializes in selling export-oriented-transformed-domestic-market-targeted goods. Let\'s go and see.
张教授写了一本书《亚健康初探》，还很畅销。
Zhāng jiàoshòu xiě le yìběn shū《Yàjiànkāngchūtàn》，hái hěnchàngxiāo。
Professor Zhang wrote a book titled &quot;Pilot Study on Sub-health&quot;, which sold well.
禁止搭车销售这些过期商品！
Jìnzhǐ dāchē xiāoshòu zhèxiē guòqī shāngpǐn！
Those selling goods that have passed their sell-by date are not allowed to travel!
昨晚，一个非法爆竹销售点发生了大爆炸。
Zuówǎn，yígè fēifǎ bàozhú xiāoshòudiǎn fāshēng le dàbàozhà。
Last night, a big explosion happened in an illegal firecracker shop.
大毛的市场销售情况真不错。
Dàmáo de shìchǎng xiāoshòu qíngkuàng zhēn búcuò。
Long-haired pelts are selling well.
由于规划不当，这两个待建项目都要撤销。
Yóuyú guīhuà búdàng，zhè liǎnggè dàijiàn xiàng mù dōuyào chèxiāo。
The two projects that are awaiting construction must be cancelled, because of improper planning.
现在是羽绒服销售的淡月。
Xiànzài shì yǔróngfú xiāoshòu de dànyuè。
Right now is the slack month for down garments.
这本介绍中国共产党党史的书很畅销。
Zhèběn jièshào Zhōngguó gòngchǎndǎng dǎngshǐ de shū hěnchàngxiāo。
This book introducing the history of the Chinese Communist Party is selling well.
这些赔款根本抵销不了他的损失。
Zhèxiē péikuǎn gēnběn dǐxiāo bùliǎo tā de sǔnshī。
This compensation can\'t make up for his loss at all.
这批钢材被用来抵销工程欠款。
Zhè pī gāngcái bèi yònglái dǐxiāo gōngchéng qiànkuǎn。
This steel was used in substitution for the financial arrears for the project.
这种王木纹地板砖的销路非常好。
Zhèzhǒng wángmùwén dìbǎnzhuān de xiāolù fēicháng hǎo。
These floor tiles with &quot;王&quot;-shaped veins are selling well.
按照规定，烟花爆竹必须定点销售。
Ànzhào guīdìng，yānhuābàozhú bìxū dìngdiǎn xiāoshòu。
According to the rules, firecrackers should only be available in designated stores.
由于不确定因素太多，我们不可能实现定销。
Yóuyú bú quèdìng yīnsù tài duō，wǒmen bùkěnéng shíxiàn dìngxiāo。
Too many uncertain factors prevent us from being able to predict the sales volume.
我公司的新产品已经在全市范围内动销了。
Wǒ gōngsī de xīn chǎnpǐn yǐjing zài quán shì fànwéi nèi dòngxiāo le。
Our company\'s new products have begun to be sold in the whole city.
这些水壶已经被他兜销出去了。
Zhèxiē shuǐhú yǐjing bèi tā dōuxiāo chūqù le。
The water bottles have been sold out by him.
为了加强公司间的合作，他们签署了这个对销协议。
Wèile jiāqiáng gōngsī jiān de hézuò，tāmen qiānshǔ le zhège duìxiāo xiéyì。
To deepen cooperation between the two companies, they signed an agreement on counter purchasing.
我公司正在敦聘出色的营销人员。
Wǒ gōngsī zhèngzài dūnpìn chūsè de yíngxiāo rényuán。
Our company is very serious about hiring marketing personnel with outstanding records.
这是公司制定的统一销售价，不会有二价。
Zhè shì gōngsī zhìdìng de tǒngyī xiāoshòujià，bú huì yǒu èrjià。
This is the uniform retail price determined by the company and there shall be no other prices.
商家所谓的返利销售，能够真正地让利于消费者吗？
Shāngjiā suǒwèi de fǎnlì xiāoshòu，nénggòu zhēnzhèng de ràng lì yú xiāofèizhě ma?
Can the so-called beneficial sales benefit the consumers in a real sense?
每户村民都顺利购买到了返销粮。
Měi hù cūnmín dōu shùnlì gòumǎi dào le fǎnxiāo liáng。
All the villagers bought the state-purchased grain successfully.
这个月我的开销有些大，都快没钱交房费了！
Zhège yuè wǒ de kāixiāo yǒuxiē dà，dōu kuài méi qián jiāo fángfèi le！
I overspent this month and now I am running out of money to pay my rent.
本公司常年经销各种非织造布。
Běngōngsī chángnián jīngxiāo gèzhǒng fēizhīzàobù。
Our company deals in all kinds of non-woven goods all year round.
这本书很畅销，改年还得再版。
Zhèběnshū hěnchàngxiāo，gǎinián hái děi zàibǎn。
The book is selling well, it will be republished in a later year.
邮递员们正在忙着盖销。
Yóudìyuánmen zhèngzài máng zhe gàixiāo。
Postmen are busy cancelling the stamps.
中秋节到了，超市在展销各式月饼。
Zhōngqiūjié dào le，chāoshì zài zhǎnxiāo gè shì yuèbǐng。
The mid-autumn festival is coming, the supermarkets are displaying and selling all kinds of moon cakes.
供销社在收购农民的余粮。
Gōngxiāoshè zài shōugòu nóngmín de yúliáng。
The supply and marketing cooperative is purchasing farmers\' surplus grains.
这家建材供应站销售各种建筑材料。
Zhèjiā jiàncái gōngyīngzhàn xiāoshòu gèzhǒng jiànzhù cáiliào。
This supply station for building materials sells all kinds of building materials.
我们的恩怨就此一笔勾销，从此就做陌路人。
Wǒmen de ēnyuàn jiù cǐ yìbǐgōuxiāo，cóngcǐ jiù zuò mòlùrén。
All the gratitude and resentment between us is forgotten. From now on we will be complete strangers.
他已经病得形销骨立了，不知还能挺多久。
Tā yǐjing bìng de xíngxiāo gǔlì le，bùzhī hái néng tǐng duōjiǔ。
He is so sick that he is as thin as a skeleton. No one knows how much longer he can hold out.
小卖部里的荷兰豆很畅销。
Xiǎomàibùlǐ de hélándòu hěnchàngxiāo。
Snow peas are very popular in the small shop.
警方发现了销售盗版光盘的黑线。
Jǐngfāng fāxiàn le xiāoshòu dàobǎn guāngpán de hēixiàn。
The police found black thread of selling pirated compact disks.
过年时花销大，我们应该多加注意。
Guònián shí huāxiāo dà，wǒmen yīnggāi duōjiā zhùyì。
People should pay attention to the large amount of money they spend during Spring Festival.
家里的花销都由妈妈掌管。
Jiā lǐ de huāxiāo dōu yóu māma zhǎngguǎn。
The mother is in charge of the all the families spending.
他的画选正在图书大厦出售，销量火爆。
Tā de huàxuǎn zhèngzài túshū dàshà chūshòu，xiāoliàng huǒbào。
His book of selected paintings is selling well at Books Plaza.
现在很多会展中心靠会展经济维持自己的基本开销。
Xiànzài hěnduō huìzhǎn zhōng xīn kào huìzhǎn jīngjì wéichí zìjǐ de jīběn kāixiāo。
Now many exhibition centers are supporting their basic operations by providing rooms and services for meetings and exhibitions.
这家电影院的服务很好，销售非常火爆。

This cinema provides a good service and has a flourishing business.
仓库里有些处理品要拿出来贱价销售。
Cāngkù lǐ yǒuxiē chǔlǐpǐn yào náchūlái jiànjià xiāoshòu。
Substandard goods in the storehouse are to be sold at a low price.
在超市的促销广告上总能看到“最终解释权归某某超市所有”的字样。

One can always find expressions such as, &quot;The final right to interpret belongs to the supermarket,&quot; on supermarket sales advertisements.
本公司诚招各地经销商，欢迎您的加盟。
Běngōngsī chéngzhāo gèdì jīngxiāoshāng，huānyíng nín de jiāméng。
Our company welcomes dealers all over the country to join our team.
最近一段时间，各商家都在竞销反季商品。
Zuìjìn yíduàn shíjiān，gè shāngjiā dōu zài jìngxiāo fǎnjì shāngpǐn。
Many dealers have been competing with each other recently to sell seasonal products.
这个货比较冷背，上市以来销路就不好。
Zhège huò bǐjiào lěngbèi，shàngshì yǐlái xiāolù jiù bùhǎo。
The product is slow-moving. Ever since it was put into market, it hasn\'t sold well.
由于销路不好，这个厂的冷库里积压了大量的冷冻食品。
Yóuyú xiāolù bùhǎo，zhège chǎng de lěngkù lǐ jīyā le dàliàng de lěngdòng shípǐn。
Because of small market, a lot of frozen foods were overstocked in the refrigeratory of the factory.
我们商店的库房里积压着大量冷门货，正准备降价销售。
Wǒmen shāngdiàn de kùfáng lǐ jīyā zhe dàliàng lěngmén huò，zhèng zhǔnbèi jiàngjià xiāoshòu。
In our depot, there overstocks a lot of outdated goods. We are preparing to sell them at a lowered price.
为了激活市场购买力，两家公司决定降价联销部分库存商品。
Wèile jīhuó shìchǎng gòumǎilì，liǎng jiā gōngsī juédìng jiàngjià liánxiāo bùfēn kùcún shāngpǐn。
In order to activate market purchasing power, the two companies decided to lower the price to jointly sell some of the stock goods.
这几天零打碎敲，我的开销也不小呢。
Zhè jǐtiān língdǎ suìqiāo，wǒ de kāixiāo yě bùxiǎo ne。
Though little by little, I have spent plenty of money these days.
仓库里还有2万元的毛货没有销售出去。
Cāngkù lǐ háiyǒu liǎngwànyuán de máohuò méiyǒu xiāoshòu chūqù。
There are still 20,000 yuan worth of unsold woolens remaining in the storehouse.
公司给我们每个人都派定了销售任务量。
Gōngsī gěi wǒmen měigèrén dōu pàidìng le xiāoshòu rènwùliàng。
The company assigned everybody a sales task.
明天总店将派员考察各加盟店的销售情况。
Míngtiān zǒngdiàn jiāng pàiyuán kǎochá gè jiāméngdiàn de xiāoshòu qíngkuàng。
The head office will appoint some people to inspect the sales of all franchises.
我们果园种植的蟠桃每年都畅销海内外呢。
Wǒmen guǒyuán zhòngzhí de pántáo měinián dōu chàngxiāo hǎinèiwài ne。

那个商场抛出的营销企划，是完全针对这个商场而制定的。
Nàge shāngchǎng pāochū de yíngxiāo qǐhuà，shì wánquán zhēnduì zhège shāngchǎng ér zhìdìng de。
The market produced a marketing proposal according to its own conditions.
营销人员个个口齿伶俐，说话趋利避害。
Yíngxiāo rényuán gègè kǒuchǐ línglì，shuōhuà qūlì bìhài。
All salesmen have a slick tongue, they will push the advantages and avoid the disadvantages when they speak.
昨天海关用燃烧弹销毁了一批毒品。
Zuótiān hǎiguān yòng ránshāodàn xiāohuǐ le yì pī dúpǐn。
Yesterday, customs destroyed a collection of drugs with incendiary bombs.
商家们通过各种促销手段来吸引消费者。
Shāngjiāmen tōngguò gèzhǒng cùxiāo shǒuduàn lái xīyǐn xiāofèizhě。
Businessmen attract customers through all kinds of promotional methods.
今年冬天西瓜销售的市况很好，明年我们要有计划地进行补充。
Jīnnián dōngtiān xīguā xiāoshòu de shìkuàng hěnhǎo，míngnián wǒmen yào yǒu jìhuà de jìnxíng bǔchōng。
Watermelons are selling well in the market this winter, so we\'ll supply more next year in a planned way.
展销会的司令部制定了周密的计划，保证会议的顺利进行。
Zhǎnxiāohuì de sīlìngbùzhìdìng le zhōumì de jìhuà，bǎozhèng huìyì de shùnlì jìnxíng。
The command center of this exhibition has made a careful plan to ensure the smooth progress of the meeting.
我从展销会上买了好几件藤器。
Wǒ cóng zhǎnxiāohuì shàng mǎi le hǎo jǐ jiàn téngqì。
I bought several cane products at the commodities fair.
我被提任为华北地区的销售经理。
Wǒ bèi tírèn wéi huáběi dìqū de xiāoshòu jīnglǐ。
I\'ve been promoted to the position of sales manager in North China.
每年的销售金额都能在这个统计表中查到。
Měinián de xiāoshòu jīné dōu néng zài zhège tǒngjìbiǎo zhōng chádào。
The sales of each year can be found in this statistical table.
他是一名化妆品的推销员，很受当地妇女的喜欢。
Tā shì yìmíng huàzhuāngpǐn de tuīxiāoyuán，hěnshòu dāngdì fùnǚ de xǐhuan。
He is a cosmetics salesman, and is very popular with local women.
这种碗橱式样新颖，在市场上销路很好。

This cupboard for tableware is new in style, and sells well in the market.
他做买卖总是微利多销，因此生意很好。
Tā zuò mǎimai zǒngshì wēilì duōxiāo，yīncǐ shēngyì hěnhǎo。
He is always gaining quick returns with a small profit, and so has a booming business.
警方精心布置，一举捣毁了这个传销窝点。
Jǐngfāng jīngxīn bùzhì，yìjǔ dǎohuǐ le zhège chuánxiāo wōdiǎn。
The police planned carefully, and crashed the multi-level marketing hideout.
这个公司生产的洗头水销路一直不错。
Zhège gōngsī shēngchǎn de xǐtóushuǐ xiāolù yìzhí búcuò。
The shampoo produced by this company, and always sells well.
由于营销策略失误，今年商品的利润下滑50%。

保险推销员正在介绍他们公司的险种。
Bǎoxiǎn tuīxiāoyuán zhèngzài jièshào tāmen gōngsī de xiǎnzhǒng。
The insurance salesmen are introducing the different insurance products of their company.
这家工厂加工的香肚在市场上有很好的销路。
Zhèjiā gōngchǎng jiā gōng de xiāngdù zài shìchǎng shàng yǒu hěnhǎo de xiāolù。
The pork sausage produced by this factory is well received in the market.
终于要到回款，这下总算可以销差了！
Zhōngyú yào dào huíkuǎn，zhèxià zǒngsuàn kěyǐ xiāochāi le！
I finally got the money back and can report back to my boss.
因为工作中屡犯错误，他被销差了。
Yīnwéi gōngzuò zhōng lǚfàn cuòwù，tā bèi xiāochāi le。
He was fired, as he continued to make mistakes in his work.

Zhèn lǐ kāi le yìjiā zhuānmén shēngchǎn xiāodīng de gōngchǎng。
A plant which specializes in producing pins opened recently.

A telephone number will be canceled if not used for half a year.

Xiāohuò qúdào chàngtōng cáinéng bǎozhèng qǐyè de kuàisù fāzhǎn。
Only with smooth channels to sell the goods can the enterprise develop at a fast speed.
这家商场产品的销价都比较高。
Zhèjiā shāngchǎng chǎnpǐn de xiāojià dōu bǐjiào gāo。

The city consumes large quantity of electricity in summer.

Zhège jìdù de xiāoshòué míngxiǎn gāoyú shàng gè jìdù。
The sales revenue this season is obviously higher than that of the previous one.
经过几番劝说，他的怒气才算是销歇了。

His anger finally subsided following other people\'s coaxing.

Zhè chē shì xīnkuǎn，hěn chàngxiāo。
This car is new in the market and sells well.

Academic newspapers have low sales and are not aiming at making a profit.
最近公司组织了关于营销的学习班，我们都参加了。
Zuìjìn gōngsī zǔzhī le guānyú yíngxiāo de xuéxíbān，wǒmen dōu cānjiā le。
We participated in the training class on marketing, which was organized by the company recently.
这是他杀人的血证，不要销毁。
Zhèshì tā shārén de xuèzhèng，búyào xiāohuǐ。
This is the bloody evidence which proves his crime of murder; don\'t destroy it.
现在只能压库倾销了，不然赔得更多。
Xiànzài zhǐnéng yākù qīngxiāo le，bùrán péi de gèngduō。
The only way now is to sell the products piled up in stock, or we will lose even more money.
熟食店用鸭肫做原料做了很多食品，很畅销的。
Shúshídiàn yòng yāzhūn zuò yuánliào zuò le hěnduō shípǐn，hěn chàngxiāo de。
The deli prepares many food with duck\'s gizzard, which is very popular.
这个商品现在很好销，言不二价。
Zhège shāngpǐn xiànzài hěn hǎoxiāo，yánbú èrjià。
This product sells well and there is no room for haggling.
现在言情小说很畅销，你喜欢吗？
Xiànzài yánqíng xiǎoshuō hěn chàngxiāo，nǐ xǐhuan ma？
Do you like romantic novels which are so popular nowadays?
邮售是一种很有发展潜力的新型销售方式。
Yóushòu shì yìzhǒng hěn yǒu fāzhǎn qiánlì de xīnxíng xiāoshòu fāngshì。
Selling by post is a new type of marketing with high potential.
油杉做成的家具近几年来在市场上销路很好。
Yóushān zuòchéng de jiājù jìn jǐ niánlái zài shìchǎng shàng xiāolù hěnhǎo。
Furniture made of  keteleeria fortunei is very polular in the market recently.
春节期间，各大商场都开展有奖销售活动。
Chūnjié qījiān，gè dà shāngchǎng dōu kāizhǎn yǒujiǎng xiāoshòu huódòng。
During Spring Festival, all the big shopping centers held lottery-prize sales activities.
药品的有有效期快到了，必须尽快销出去。
Yàopǐn de yǒu yǒuxiàoqī kuàidào le，bìxū jǐnkuài xiāochūqù。
The expiration date of this medicine is coming soon; we must sell it as quickly as possible.
今年我公司的销售收入由去年的20万跃增到60万。
Jīnnián wǒ gōngsī de xiāoshòu shōurù yóu qùnián de èrshíwàn yuèzēngdào liùshíwàn。

yuǎnxiāo hǎiwài
find a good sale overseas; find a market abroad

tuīxiāoyuán 
salesman

总括起来
zǒngkuò qǐlái 
to sum up; to state succinctly
总括
Zǒngkuò
sum up
哲学是关于自然知识和社会知识的概括和总结。
Zhéxué shì guānyú zìrán zhīshi hé shèhuì zhīshi de gàikuò hé zǒngjié。

Such a broad epitome and conclusion is more difficult to understand.

to sum up

a highly artistic condensation

to put it briefly

不必介意
一句玩笑，不必介意
我不过顺口说说，你不要介意。

我现在觉得好多了，但你不介意的话，我还是想回家。

你不介意我把收音机打开吧？

我不介意选哪个，所以还是你决定吧。
I hope you don\'t mind
希望你不介意

我不介意走路。

Wǒ bǎozhèng nǐ yìdiǎn dōu búhuì jièyì。
我保证你一点都不会介意。
排难解纷
解纷排难
居委会的陈大妈经常为大家排忧解纷。
Jūwěihuì de Chén dàmā jīngcháng wèi dàjiā páiyōu jiěfēn。
Aunt Chen from the neighborhood committees often helps to resolve disputes among the dwellers.
调解纠纷
tiáojiě jiūfēn
mediate an issue
排解纠纷
páijiě jiūfēn
mediate a dispute; reconcile a quarrel
调解纠纷
tiáojiě jiūfēn
mediate in a dispute
调解家庭纠纷
tiáojiě jiātíngjiūfēn 
mediate in (or patch up) a family quarrel
纠纷双方和解无效，只能对簿公堂了。
Jiūfēn shuāngfāng héjiě wúxiào，zhǐnéng duìbùgōngtáng le。
The case was brought to court as the two parties failed to reconcile with each other.
朋友排解了他们的纠纷。
Péngyou páijiěle tāmen de jiūfēn.
Friends mediated between them in the dispute.
他们的这起离婚纠纷一直闹上了民事法庭，也没能解决好。
Tāmen de zhè qǐ líhūn jiūfēn yìzhí nàoshàng le mínshì fǎtíng，yě méi néng jiějué hǎo。
Their divorce dispute has gone to civil court, but it has not been settled at last.

化解纠纷。

调解邻里纠纷。

我将和你就如何解决劳资纠纷达成协议。
I had to study Marxism in university, and his complex ideas and writings always confused me.
我在大学必须学习马克思主义，他纷繁的思想和著作常常让我感到不解。
纷争不已
fēnzhēng bù yǐ
endless dispute
介入两国之间的纷争
jièrù liǎngguó zhījiān de fēnzhēng
be involved in the disputes and conflicts between two countries
对于尘事中的纷争，他已经无心过问了。
Duìyú chénshì zhōng de fēngzhēng，tā yǐjing wúxīn guòwèn le。
He isn\'t concerned with world affairs.
战争爆发后，有钱人纷纷逃往中立国。
Zhànzhēng bàofā hòu，yǒuqián rén fēnfēn táowǎng zhōng lìguó。
After the war broke out, rich people ran away to neutral states one after another.
如何看待这场战争带来的影响，众说纷纭。
Rúhé kàndài zhèchǎng zhànzhēng dàilái de yǐngxiǎng，zhòngshuō fēnyún。
There are a variety of comments on how to see the effects of the war.
纷争
19世纪末列强把中国看成一块肥肉，纷纷争夺。
调解纷争
诸侯割据，列国纷争。
The members were involved in a tilt.

成员们卷入了纷争。
Quarrels and dissensions ensued among the cast, most of whom hurriedly and shamefacedly handed over their parts to understudies.
Zhēngchǎo hé jiūfēn suízhī zài yǎnyuán men zhōngjiān fāshēngle，tāmen dāngzhōng dàbùfèn dōu jíjímángmáng、búgù xiūchǐ de jiāng tāmen de juésè jiāogěile tìshēn yǎnyuán。
争吵和纠纷随之在演员们中间发生了，他们当中大部分都急急忙忙、不顾羞耻地将他们的角色交给了替身演员。
由于事务纷杂，他最近老是加班。

He has had to work late recently due to his abundant complex business.

纷乱的脚步声
fēnluàn de jiǎobùshēng

fēnluàn de júmiàn

sīxù fēnluàn
a confused state of mind; a confused train of thought
我们对于这种纷乱的数据最好采用归纳法进行分析。
Wǒmen duìyú zhèzhǒng fēnluàn de shùjù zuìhǎo cǎiyòng guīnàfǎ jìnxíng fēnxī。
The inductive method is the best approach for analyzing complicated data like this.

大雪下得纷纷扬扬，小明盼着雪停以后出去堆雪人。

The air is thick with flying snowflakes and Xiao Ming is looking forward to making a snowman when it stops.

那时候正是国难当头，爱国青年都纷纷到抗敌前线去。
Nà shíhou zhèng shì guónàn dāngtóu，àiguó qīngnián dōu fēnfēn dào kàngdí qiánxiàn qù。
The country was in imminent danger, and large numbers of patriotic young people left for the front to fight the enemy.

Luòyè fēnfēn。

敌军纷纷逃窜。

Jiētóu xiàng wěi yìlùn fēnfēn。

街头巷尾人们三五成群，议论纷纷。
Jiētóu xiàng wěi rénmen sānwǔchéngqún，yìlùn fēnfēn。
People were seen standing about in knots on street corners, talking and arguing.
这条消息首播后不到一小时，世界各地电台和电视台便纷纷转播。
Zhè tiáo xiāoxi shǒubō hòu bú dào yì xiǎoshí，shìjiè gè dì diàntái hé diànshìtái biàn fēnfēn zhuǎnbō。
Less than an hour following its first transmission, the news was reported by radio and TV stations across the world.
同学们纷纷谈论着今天发生的事。
Tóngxuémen fēnfēn tánlùn zhe jīntiān fāshēng de shì。
The students are all talking about what happened today.
那些不知就里的人纷纷往这边张望，满脸的惊异。
Nàxiē bùzhī jiùlǐ de rén fēnfēn wǎng zhèbiān zhāngwàng，mǎnliǎn de jīngyì。
Those who are ignorant of the situation look in this direction with a curious look on their face.
今天是老人的茶寿，亲戚邻居纷纷登门拜贺。
Jīntiān shì lǎorén de cháshòu，qīnqi línjū fēnfēn dēngmén bàihè。
Relatives and neighbours are coming to congratulate the elderly man on his 108th birthday today.
厂里的人议论纷纷，说他私下去抄肥。
Chǎnglǐ de rén yìlùn fēnfēn，shuō tā sīxià qù chāoféi。
People in the factory are discussing his earning illegal income.
春天来了，树木纷纷抽条。
Chūntiān lái le，shùmù fēnfēn chōutiáo。
Spring has come and the trees sprout one after another.
中国各大足球俱乐部纷纷聘请外籍教练出掌球队的帅印。
Zhōngguó gè dà zúqiú jùlèbùfēnfēn pìnqǐng wàijí jiàoliàn chūzhǎng qiúduì de shuàiyìn。
Big football clubs in China employed foreign coaches to take charge of their football teams.

After Jingzhe, hibernant animals come out to look for food.
他的戏演砸了，观众纷纷叫倒好儿。
Tā de xì yǎnzá le，guānzhòng fēnfēn jiào díohǎor。
The audience booed his failed performance.

Chūn Jié qiánxī，piāobó yìxiāng de yóuzǐmen dōu fēnfēn fǎnguī jiāyuán。
Those who live in other places go back to their hometown for Spring Festival.
地震后的重建工作很顺利，大家纷纷盖起了新的房舍。
Dìzhèn hòu de chóngjiàn gōngzuò hěn shùnlì，dàjiā fēnfēn gài qǐ le xīn de fángshě。
The reconstruction works after the earthquake are going smoothly with everyone putting up their new houses.
大雪下得纷纷扬扬，小明盼着雪停以后出去堆雪人。
Dàxuě xià de fēnfēnyángyáng，Xiǎo Míng pàn zhe xuě tíng yǐhòu chūqù duī xuěrén。
The air is thick with flying snowflakes and Xiao Ming is looking forward to making a snowman when it stops.
下属纷纷跳槽，他成了一个光杆儿司令。
Xiàshǔ fēnfēn tiàocáo，tā chéng le yígè guānggǎnr sīlìng。
With his subordinates leaving their positions one after another, he has become a leader without any followers.
君主昏庸，开国元勋们纷纷辞职归田。
Jūnzhǔ hūnyōng，kāiguó yuánxūnmen fēnfēn cízhí guītián。
The founding heroes resigned from office and returned home one after another because of the fatuous and self-indulgent ruler.
战败后，败兵们纷纷逃入了荒山秃岭。
Zhànbài hòu，bàibīngmen fēnfēn táorù le huāngshān tūlǐng。
After losing the bell, the defeated soldiers escaped in succession into the bald hills.
清明节时人们纷纷回乡祭扫祖坟。
Qīngmíngjié shí rénmen fēnfēn huíxiāng jìsǎo zǔfén。
During Tomb Sweeping Festival, most people go back to their hometowns to clean their ancestral tombs and offer sacrifices. .
事情纷纷扰扰，让人无法专心学习。
Shìqíng fēnfēnrǎorǎo，ràng rén wúfǎ zhuānxīn xuéxí。
The confusing matters make him unable to concentrate on his study.
我正在城楼上观山景，忽然听见城下乱纷纷。

Seeing the mountain scenery from the city gate tower, I suddenly heard a hubbub in the city.

Qiángguó dōu fēnfēn jiànlì tàikōngzhàn，fēnxiǎng tàikōng zīyuán。
Powerful nations are building space stations to share resources.
她结婚时，亲朋好友纷纷为她添箱。
Tā jiéhūn shí，qīnpéng hǎoyǒu fēnfēn wèi tā tiānxiāng。
When she got married, her relatives and friends all gave her gifts of money or presents.
最近几年，农民们纷纷利用夏闲时间外出打工。
Zuìjìn jǐ nián，nóngmínmen fēnfēn lìyòng xiàxián shíjiān wàichū dǎgōng。
In recent years, many rural labourers go to work for others in their spare time during summer.
路上发生了车祸，行者纷纷驻足观看。
Lù shàng fāshēng le chēhuò，xíngzhě fēnfēn zhùzú guānkàn。
A road accident had happened. Pedestrians all stopped to watch the scene.
狂风旋卷着大量的沙尘呼啸而过，路人纷纷闭上了眼睛。
Kuángfēng xuánjuǎn zhe dàliàng de shāchén hūxiào érguò，lùrén fēnfēn bìshàng le yǎnjīng。

When the exploration team returned successfully, many people came to their base camp to celebrate the victory.
老百姓纷纷猜测，这些身份不明的人是不是朝廷派来的。
Lǎobǎixìng fēnfēn cāicè，zhèxiē shēnfèn bùmíng de rén shìbúshì cháotíng pàilái de。
The civilians all suspected actively whether those unidentified people were dispatched by the court.

Shùyè fēnfēn cóngshùshàng diàoxiàlái。
The leaves are gradually falling from the trees.
大家纷纷出钱，只是数额有多有少。
Dàjiā fēnfēn chūqián，zhǐshì shù\'é yǒu duō yǒu shǎo。

Qiúmímen fēnfēn yōngrù sàichǎng。
The fans crowded into the competition venue.
街头巷尾人们三五成群，议论纷纷。
Jiētóu xiàng wěi rénmen sānwǔchéngqún，yìlùn fēnfēn。
People were seen standing about in knots on street corners, talking and arguing.
这条消息首播后不到一小时，世界各地电台和电视台便纷纷转播。
Zhè tiáo xiāoxi shǒubō hòu bú dào yì xiǎoshí，shìjiè gè dì diàntái hé diànshìtái biàn fēnfēn zhuǎnbō。
Less than an hour following its first transmission, the news was reported by radio and TV stations across the world.
同学们纷纷谈论着今天发生的事。
Tóngxuémen fēnfēn tánlùn zhe jīntiān fāshēng de shì。
The students are all talking about what happened today.
那些不知就里的人纷纷往这边张望，满脸的惊异。
Nàxiē bùzhī jiùlǐ de rén fēnfēn wǎng zhèbiān zhāngwàng，mǎnliǎn de jīngyì。
Those who are ignorant of the situation look in this direction with a curious look on their face.
今天是老人的茶寿，亲戚邻居纷纷登门拜贺。
Jīntiān shì lǎorén de cháshòu，qīnqi línjū fēnfēn dēngmén bàihè。
Relatives and neighbours are coming to congratulate the elderly man on his 108th birthday today.
厂里的人议论纷纷，说他私下去抄肥。
Chǎnglǐ de rén yìlùn fēnfēn，shuō tā sīxià qù chāoféi。
People in the factory are discussing his earning illegal income.
春天来了，树木纷纷抽条。
Chūntiān lái le，shùmù fēnfēn chōutiáo。
Spring has come and the trees sprout one after another.
中国各大足球俱乐部纷纷聘请外籍教练出掌球队的帅印。
Zhōngguó gè dà zúqiú jùlèbùfēnfēn pìnqǐng wàijí jiàoliàn chūzhǎng qiúduì de shuàiyìn。
Big football clubs in China employed foreign coaches to take charge of their football teams.
惊蛰之后，冬眠的动物纷纷出蛰。
Jīngzhé zhīhòu，dōngmián de dòngwù fēnfēn chūzhé。
After Jingzhe, hibernant animals come out to look for food.
他的戏演砸了，观众纷纷叫倒好儿。
Tā de xì yǎnzá le，guānzhòng fēnfēn jiào díohǎor。
The audience booed his failed performance.
春节前夕，飘泊异乡的游子们都纷纷返归家园。
Chūn Jié qiánxī，piāobó yìxiāng de yóuzǐmen dōu fēnfēn fǎnguī jiāyuán。
Those who live in other places go back to their hometown for Spring Festival.
地震后的重建工作很顺利，大家纷纷盖起了新的房舍。
Dìzhèn hòu de chóngjiàn gōngzuò hěn shùnlì，dàjiā fēnfēn gài qǐ le xīn de fángshě。
The reconstruction works after the earthquake are going smoothly with everyone putting up their new houses.
大雪下得纷纷扬扬，小明盼着雪停以后出去堆雪人。
Dàxuě xià de fēnfēnyángyáng，Xiǎo Míng pàn zhe xuě tíng yǐhòu chūqù duī xuěrén。
The air is thick with flying snowflakes and Xiao Ming is looking forward to making a snowman when it stops.
下属纷纷跳槽，他成了一个光杆儿司令。
Xiàshǔ fēnfēn tiàocáo，tā chéng le yígè guānggǎnr sīlìng。
With his subordinates leaving their positions one after another, he has become a leader without any followers.
君主昏庸，开国元勋们纷纷辞职归田。
Jūnzhǔ hūnyōng，kāiguó yuánxūnmen fēnfēn cízhí guītián。
The founding heroes resigned from office and returned home one after another because of the fatuous and self-indulgent ruler.
战败后，败兵们纷纷逃入了荒山秃岭。
Zhànbài hòu，bàibīngmen fēnfēn táorù le huāngshān tūlǐng。
After losing the bell, the defeated soldiers escaped in succession into the bald hills.
清明节时人们纷纷回乡祭扫祖坟。
Qīngmíngjié shí rénmen fēnfēn huíxiāng jìsǎo zǔfén。
During Tomb Sweeping Festival, most people go back to their hometowns to clean their ancestral tombs and offer sacrifices. .
事情纷纷扰扰，让人无法专心学习。
Shìqíng fēnfēnrǎorǎo，ràng rén wúfǎ zhuānxīn xuéxí。
The confusing matters make him unable to concentrate on his study.
我正在城楼上观山景，忽然听见城下乱纷纷。
Wǒ zhèngzài chénglóu shàng guān shānjǐng，hūrán tīngjiàn chéng xià luànfēnfēn。
Seeing the mountain scenery from the city gate tower, I suddenly heard a hubbub in the city.
强国都纷纷建立太空站，分享太空资源。
Qiángguó dōu fēnfēn jiànlì tàikōngzhàn，fēnxiǎng tàikōng zīyuán。
Powerful nations are building space stations to share resources.
她结婚时，亲朋好友纷纷为她添箱。
Tā jiéhūn shí，qīnpéng hǎoyǒu fēnfēn wèi tā tiānxiāng。
When she got married, her relatives and friends all gave her gifts of money or presents.
最近几年，农民们纷纷利用夏闲时间外出打工。
Zuìjìn jǐ nián，nóngmínmen fēnfēn lìyòng xiàxián shíjiān wàichū dǎgōng。
In recent years, many rural labourers go to work for others in their spare time during summer.
路上发生了车祸，行者纷纷驻足观看。
Lù shàng fāshēng le chēhuò，xíngzhě fēnfēn zhùzú guānkàn。
A road accident had happened. Pedestrians all stopped to watch the scene.
狂风旋卷着大量的沙尘呼啸而过，路人纷纷闭上了眼睛。
Kuángfēng xuánjuǎn zhe dàliàng de shāchén hūxiào érguò，lùrén fēnfēn bìshàng le yǎnjīng。
The strong wind howled past with a lot of sand in it, which forces pedestrians to shut their eyes one after another.
战争爆发后，有钱人纷纷逃往中立国。
Zhànzhēng bàofā hòu，yǒuqián rén fēnfēn táowǎng zhōng lìguó。
After the war broke out, rich people ran away to neutral states one after another.
探险队顺利归来，群众纷纷到探险队大本营祝捷。
Tànxiǎnduì shùnlì guīlái，qúnzhòng fēnfēn dào tànxiǎnduì dàběnyíng zhùjié。
When the exploration team returned successfully, many people came to their base camp to celebrate the victory.
老百姓纷纷猜测，这些身份不明的人是不是朝廷派来的。
Lǎobǎixìng fēnfēn cāicè，zhèxiē shēnfèn bùmíng de rén shìbúshì cháotíng pàilái de。
The civilians all suspected actively whether those unidentified people were dispatched by the court.
树叶纷纷从树上掉下来。
Shùyè fēnfēn cóngshùshàng diàoxiàlái。
The leaves are gradually falling from the trees.
大家纷纷出钱，只是数额有多有少。
Dàjiā fēnfēn chūqián，zhǐshì shù\'é yǒu duō yǒu shǎo。
One after another everyone offered money, but the amounts were varied.
他不想插身在这场纠纷中间。
Tā bùxiǎng chāshēn zài zhèchǎng jiūfēn zhōng jiān。
He doesn\'t want to get involved in this dispute.

tóuxù fēnfán

fēnluàn de jiǎobùshēng

fēnluàn de júmiàn

tóuxù fēnyún

fēnzhēng bù yǐ

Xiao Ming\'s eyes are itching; his mother believes it is because he has played computer games too long.
长时间盯着电脑写稿子，盯得眼睛都发疼了。

I feel a pain in my eyes after typing my essay for too long.

The sparkling stars in the sky are like pretty eyes.
他的眼睛有点复视。
Tā de yǎnjīng yǒu diǎn fùshì。

With eyeballs rolling, the fox is thinking about how to get the piece of meat from the crow\'s mouth.
他黑溜溜的眼睛，显得特别有神。

His jet-black eyes are sparkling.

中国人是黄种人，他们有着黄皮肤和黑眼睛。

本年度国家预算
bě niándù guójiā yùsuàn 
the national budget for this fiscal year
编造预算
biānzào yùsuàn 
draw up a budget
跨年度预算
kuà niándù yùsuàn
a budget to be carried over to the next year
审核预算
shěnhé yùsuàn
verify a budget
预算外的开支
yùsuàn wài de kāizhī 
extra-budgetary expenditure
预算经费
yùsuàn jīngfèi 
budgetary resources
预算赤字
yùsuàn chìzì 
budget deficit
预算结余
yùsuàn jiéyú 
budget surplus
预算年度
yùsuàn niándù 
budget year
预算收入
yùsuàn shōurù 
budgetary receipts
造预算
zào yùsuàn
make (or draw up) a budget
追加预算
zhuījiā yùsuàn 
supplement a budget; make a supplementary budget

yùjiànxìng
foresight; farsightedness
水害的防治要有预见性，等到发生了就晚了。
Shuǐhài de fángzhì yào yǒu yùjiànxìng，děngdào fāshēng le jiù wǎn le。
There needs to be some foresight in preventing floods. It will be too late if we take action after it has happened.
他能预见未来。
Tā néng yùjiànwèilái。
He can foresee the future.
那位人类学家的预见非常准确。
Nàwèi rénlèixuéjiā de yùjiàn fēicháng zhǔnquè。
That anthropologist\'s predictions were accurate.
可以预见，这个地区将是中国的硅谷。
英明的预见。
你这种做法很有预见。
He admitted that there were problems that could have been forseen and prevented.
Tā chéngrèn zhè shì xiē kěyǐ yùjiàn bìng yùfáng de wèntí。
他承认这是些可以预见并预防的问题。
to anticipate a request
因预见要求而满足在前
I see problems ahead.
我能够预见可能发生的问题。
in the near/foreseeable future
在不久/可预见的未来
He claims to have a divine vision from God.
Tā shēngchēng tā yǒu yùjiàn wèilái de shénlì。
他声称他有预见未来的神力。
Few people could have accurately forecast the possibility of the Gulf conflict.
Hěn shǎo yǒu rén néng zhǔnquè yùjiàn dào Hǎiwān chōngtū de kěnéngxìng。
很少有人能准确预见到海湾冲突的可能性。
It would have required an enormously creative imagination to have foreseen these developments.
Yào yùjiàn dào zhèxiē fāzhǎn yāoqiú yǒu fēicháng duō de chuàngzàoxìng xiǎngxiànglì。
要预见到这些发展要求有非常多的创造性想像力。
This happens in nearly all aspects of special education and can occur no matter from which premise we begin.
Zhè jīhū fāshēngzài tèshūjiàoyù de měigè fāngmiàn érqiě yǒu kěnéng zài wǒmen méiyǒu yùjiàn de qiántí xià fāshēng。
这几乎发生在特殊教育的每个方面而且有可能在我们没有预见的前提下发生。
Her former husband has been ordered to pay her maintenance for the foreseeable future.
Tā de qiánfū bèi lèlìng zài kě yùjiàn de jiānglái yí duàn shíjiān nèi fùgěi tā shēnghuófèi。
她的前夫被勒令在可预见的将来一段时间内付给她生活费。

任何专家都未预见到娱乐行业的衰落。
This may possibly have been foreseen by the monk.
Xiūdàoshi kěnéng yǐjīng yùjiàn dào le zhè jiàn shì。
修道士可能已经预见到了这件事。
I foresee a close match unless Chiu has an off day.
Wǒ kěyǐ yùjiàn dào yì chǎng shìjūn-lìdí de bǐsài，chúfēi Zhào bú zài zhuàngtài。
我可以预见到一场势均力敌的比赛，除非赵不在状态。
Molly has the power to see into the future.
Mòlì yǒu yùjiàn wèilái de nénglì。
莫莉有预见未来的能力。
He sees many difficulties ahead.
Tā yùjiàn dào le xǔduō kùnnan。
他预见到了许多困难。
He foresaw a probable loss.
Tā yùjiàn dào kěnéng huì fāshēng mǒu zhǒng sǔnshī。
他预见到可能会发生某种损失。
We had long anticipated his cadaverous end.
Wǒmen zǎojiù yùjiàn dàole tā qīcǎn de jiéjú。
我们早就预见到了他凄惨的结局。
Such a change is gloomily foreseen by many.
Hěn duō rén dōu bēiguān de yùjiàn dàole nà yí biànhuà。
很多人都悲观地预见到了那一变化。

Kěyǐ yùjiàn de shì，tā bù xǐhuan zhè tiáo xiāoxi。
可以预见的是，他不喜欢这条消息。

不祥的预感
bùxiáng de yùgǎn
an ominous presentiment
他买彩票时预感会中大奖，果真应验了。

种白菜一定要注意预防菜蛾。

预案。

He knew better than to expect a detailed answer.

Zài zhèngshì shíshī jìhuà qián bìxū zuòhǎo yùxíng diàochá gōngzuò。
The investigation carried out before the implementation of the plan must be done seriously.
正式画展之前将会进行为期三天的预展。
Zhèngshì huàzhǎn zhīqián jiānghuì jìnxíng wéiqī sāntiān de yùzhǎn。
Before the official art exhibition, there will be a three-day pre-exhibition.
国家将对部分紧缺商品预征一定的税收。

to interfere in sth
干预某事

[inf] 干预某事

Our troops took advantage of the enemy\'s weakened position and cut in like a knife slicing down a length of bamboo.

xūdù niánhuá

nòngxūzuòjiǎ，piànqǔ róngyù

看起来气势汹汹，实际上十分虚弱
Kàn qǐlái qìshìxiōngxiōng，shíjì shàngshífēn xūruò
fierce in appearance but feeble in reality
别谦虚了，我们知道你是这方面的行家。
Bié qiānxū le，wǒmen zhīdào nǐ shì zhèfāngmiàn de hángjiā。
Don\'t be so modest. We know you\'re an expert in this field.
他谦虚了一番，终于答应来做一次演讲。
Tā qiānxū le yì fān，zhōng yú dāyìnglái zuò yícì yǎnjiǎng。
After making a few modest remarks he finally agreed to come and give a talk.
保持谦虚谨慎、不骄不躁的作风
bǎochí qiānxū jǐnshèn、bùjiāobúzào de zuòfēng
remain modest, prudent and free from arrogance and rashness in one\'s style of work
普通话中的“了、着、的”等虚词和做后缀的“子、头”等字都念轻声。
Pǔtōnghuà zhōng de“le、zhe、de”děng xūcí hé zuò hòuzhuì de“zǐ、tóu“děng zì dōu niàn qīngshēng。
In putonghua, particles like le, zhe, and de and suffixes like zi and tou are all in the neutral tone (or are all toneless).
虚心向群众请教
xūxīn xiàng qúnzhòng qǐngjiào
learn modestly from the masses
有虚名而无实学
yǒu xūmíng ér wú shíxué
have a false reputation and no real learning
你太不虚心了。
Nǐ tài bùxūxīn le。
You\'re being immodest.
虚心体察情况
xūxīn tǐchá qíngkuàng
be ready to look into matters with an open mind; not be prejudiced in sizing up situations
虚像
xūxiànɡ
virtual image
对于这种生疏的工作，我感到心虚。
Duìyú zhèzhǒng shēngshū de gōngzuò，wǒ gǎndào xīnxū。
I don\'t know much about the job, and I\'m diffident about my ability to do it properly.
这个机构形同虚设。
Zhège jīgòu xíngtóngxūshè。
This organization is nothing but an empty shell.
以虚带实。
Yǐ xū dài shí。
Let correct ideology guide practical work.
虚位
xūwèi
leave a seat vacant
胆虚
dǎnxū
timid; milk-livered
心里有点虚
xīnlǐ yǒu diǎn xū
feel rather diffident
身体很虚
shēntǐ hěn xū
be very weak physically
虚阴极
xūyīnjí
virtual cathode
箭不虚发。
Jiàn bùxūfā。
Not a single arrow missed its target.
虚报账目
xūbào zhànɡmù
cook accounts; falsify accounts
我们不能让青春虚度。
Wǒmen bùnéng ràng qīngchūn xūdù。
We must not let our youth slip idly by.
虚浮的计划
xūfú de jìhuà
an impractical plan
作风虚浮
zuòfēngxūfú
have a superficial style of work
虚构的情节
xūgòu de qíngjié
a made-up story; a trumped-up story
虚构的人物
xūgòu de rénwù
a fictitious character
纯属虚构
chún shǔ xūgòu
an out-and-out fabrication; a sheer fabrication
虚幻的情景
xūhuàn de qíngjǐng
a mere illusion
虚假证明
xūjiǎ zhèngmíng
false testimony
虚假现象
xūjiǎ xiàn xiàng
false appearance
我感到他对人有点虚假。
Wǒ gǎndào tā duì rén yǒu diǎn xūjiǎ。
I don\'t think he is quite honest with people.
受了一场虚惊
shòu le yìcháng xūjīng
be the victim of a false alarm
徒有虚名，并无实学
tú yǒu xūmíng，bìngwú shíxué
have a false reputation and no real learning
这个故事是虚拟的。
Zhège gùshì shì xūnǐ de。
This is a fictitious story.
不慕虚荣
bú mù xūrónɡ
not affected by vanity; not vain
病后身体很虚弱
bìnghòu shēntǐ hěn xūruò
suffer from general debility after an illness; be very weak after an illness
兵力虚弱
bīnɡlì xūruò
weak in military strength
虚弱的本质
xūruò de běnzhì
inherent (or intrinsic) weakness
探听虚实
tàntīnɡ xūshí
try to find out about an opponent, etc.; try to ascertain the strength (of the enemy)
虚实并举
xūshí bìngjǔ
do both ideological and practical work
虚饰历史
xūshì lìshǐ
disguise historical facts
虚饰的文辞
xūshì de wéncí
flashy, empty words
虚妄的故事
xūwàng de gùshì
a fabricated story
这个人很虚伪。
Zhègerén hěn xūwěi。
That chap is a hypocrite.
他为人实在，没有一点虚伪。
Tā wéi rén shízai，méiyǒu yìdiǎn xūwěi。
He is perfectly candid and never two-faced.
宁可虚位以待，也不要让不称职的人滥竽充数。
Nìngkě xūwèiyǐdài，yě búyào ràng bú chènzhí de rén lànyúchōngshù。
We\'d rather leave the place vacant than have someone incompetent fill the position.
虚文浮礼
xūwénfúlǐ
mere formalities; conventionalities
虚无主义者
xūwúzhǔyìzhě
nihilist
人浮于事、虚职过多
rénfúyúshì、xūzhí guò duō
overstaffed and with too many redundant positions
虚掩着门
xūyǎn zhe mén
with the door left unlocked or unlatched
事属子虚。
Shì shǔ zǐxū。
It is sheer fiction.
剧场内座无虚席。
Jùchǎngnèi zuòwúxūxí。
There was a full house.
他们推三阻四，正好暴露了他们做贼心虚。
Tāmen tuīsānzǔsì，zhènghǎo bàolù le tāmen zuòzéi xīnxū。
In making so many excuses, they revealed their own guilty conscience.
虚构
xūgòu
fabricate; make up
虚幻
xūhuàn
unreal; illusory
虚无缥缈
xūwúpiāomiǎo
purely imaginary; entirely unreal; visionary; illusory
虚文
xūwén
rules and regulations that have become a dead letter; dead letter
太虚
tàixū
the great void; the universe
虚名
xūmíng
false reputation; undeserved reputation
谦虚
qiānxū
modest; self-effacing
形同虚设
xíngtóngxūshè
perform practically no function
虚心听取别人的意见
xūxīn tīngqǔ biérén de yìjiàn
listen to people\'s criticisms with an open mind
故弄玄虚
gùnòngxuánxū
purposely make a mystery of simple things; be deliberately mystifying
他身体特别虚弱，总是病歪歪的。
Tā shēntǐ tèbié xūruò，zǒng shì bìngwāiwāi de。
He is very weak, and is chronically ill.
旧时人们在提到自己的字的时候，往往用“草字”两个字表示谦虚。
Jiùshí rénmen zài tídào zìjǐ de zì de shíhou，wǎngwǎng yòng“cǎozì”liǎng gè zì biǎoshì qiānxū。
In ancient times, people often used &quot;Cao Zi&quot;to show their humility when mentioning their names.
他准备赶往事发地点察验虚实。
Tā zhǔnbèi gǎnwǎng shìfā dìdiǎn cháyàn xūshí。
He intended to go to the spot of the accident to find out the truth.
本公司拒绝承做虚假广告。
Běngōngsī jùjué chéngzuò xūjiǎ guǎnggào。
We refuse to partake in the production of illusive advertisements.
他就是喜欢人家吃捧他，虚荣的很。
Tā jiùshì xǐhuan rénjia chīpěng tā，xūróng de hěn。
He is extremely vain, he likes to be flattered by others, .
他这个人有些虚荣，总是耻于向别人求教。
Tā zhège rén yǒuxiē xūróng，zǒng shì chǐ yú xiàng biérén qiújiào。
He is kind of vain, and always feels ashamed to turn to others.
我说的这个故事创意纯属虚构，大家不要对号入座。
Wǒ shuō de zhège gùshì chuàngyì chúnshǔ xūgòu，dàjiā búyào duìhào rùzuò。
The story I told was completely made-up, you shouldn\'t try to tell it to anyone.
我军士气高昂，足以让敌人胆虚。
Wǒ jūn shìqì gāoáng,zúyǐ ràng dírén dǎnxū.
The high morale of our troops is enough to scare the enemies.
在这场点球大战中，他所在的球队竟然弹无虚发。
Zài zhèchǎng diǎnqiú dàzhàn zhōng，tā suǒ zài de qiúduì jìngrán dànwú xūfā。
His team made ever kick count during the penalty kick match.
你所说的，不过是浮词虚语罢了。
Nǐ suǒ shuō de，búguò shì fúcí xūyǔ bà le。
What you said were just empty words.
虚假产品使一些消费者蒙受了经济损失，更有甚者，有的还能害死人。
Xūjiǎ chǎnpǐn shǐ yìxiē xiāofèizhě méngshòu le jīngjì sǔnshī，gèngyǒu shènzhě，yǒu de hái néng hàisǐ rén。
Fake products inflict economic losses on some consumers. Moreover, some of them can kill people.
这些虚伪的官绅背地里做尽了坏事。
Zhèxiē xūwěi de guānshēn bèidìlǐ zuòjìn le huàishì。
This hypocritical bureaucrat has done many bad things secretly.
虚假招聘惯常的伎俩是先收费后培训，最后毫无音讯。
Xūjiǎ zhāopìn guàncháng de jìliǎng shì xiān shōufèi hòu péixùn，zuìhòu háowú yīnxùn。
A common trick of fake employment is to charge first, offer training and then disappear completely.
他积食好几天了，身体很虚弱。
Tā jīshí hǎojǐtiān le，shēntǐ hěnxūruò。
He hasn\'t eaten anything for several days and is very weak now.
小王谦虚地说自己的文章漏洞很多，诚请前辈见示。
Xiǎo Wáng qiānxū de shuō zìjǐ de wénzhāng lòudòng hěnduō，chéngqǐng qiánbèi jiànshì。
Xiao Wang said in a modest way that his essay teemed with errors and hoped his senior would give advice.
他是个虚荣的人，爱露白。
Tā shì gè xūróng de rén，ài lòubái。
He is a vain person, and is fond of revealing his wealth to others.
这种弄虚作假的现象屡禁不绝。
Zhèzhǒng nòngxū zuòjiǎ de xiàn xiàng lǚjìn bùjué。
Fraud and trickery still exist despite repeated bans.
我希望你能够按质论价，不要虚高价格。
Wǒ xīwàng nǐ nénggòu ànzhì lùnjià，búyào xūgāo jiàgé。
I hope you can give a reasonable price based on quality, instead of an empty high price.
他打这套梅花拳时套数熟练，动作优美，果然名不虚传呀。
Tā dǎ zhètào méihuāquán shí tàoshù shúliàn，dòngzuò yōuměi，guǒrán míngbùxūchuán ya。
He does plum-blossom-stake exercises gracefully and proficiently, and is true to his name.
厂领导经常虚心听取员工劝谏。
Chǎnglǐngdǎo jīngcháng xūxīn tīngqǔ yuángōng quànjiàn。
Leaders of the factory have an open mind on employees\' opinions.
胎衣不下的现象是由产妇气虚造成的。
Tāiyī búxià de xiàn xiàng shì yóu chǎnfù qìxū zàochéng de。
Retention of the placenta is caused by deficiency of vital energy after giving birth to a baby.
“五痨七伤”在中医学里范指身体虚弱。
“Wǔláo qīshāng”zài zhōngyīxué lǐ fànzhǐ shēntǐ xūruò。
In traditional Chinese medicine, &quot;five lesions and seven injuries&quot; refers to poor health and ailments.
副词属于虚辞，有修饰的作用。
Fùcí shǔyú xūcí，yǒu xiū shì de zuòyòng。
The adverb is a kind of form word, which has a modifying function.
他整天无所事事，简直是在虚耗光阴。
Tā zhěngtiān wúsuǒ shìshì，jiǎnzhí shì zài xūhào guāngyīn。
He is idle all day, which is a real waste of time.
你最近身体不好，虚火上升，要吃点中药调理一下。
Nǐ zuìjìn shēntǐ bùhǎo，xūhuǒ shàngshēng，yào chī diǎn zhōng yào tiáolǐ yíxià。
You haven\'t been well these days, with the depletion fire syndrome going up. You\'d better have some Chinese medicine to nurse your health.
公司表面风光，其实财务早就虚空了。
Gōngsī biǎomiàn fēngguāng，qíshí cáiwù zǎojiù xūkōng le。
The company looks impressive in appearance, but its finance has long been empty.
咱们赶紧开始谈判吧，虚礼都免了。
Zánmen gǎnjǐn kāishǐ tánpàn ba，xūlǐ dōu miǎn le。
Let\'s begin our negotiations right now and spare all the formalities.
他伸手抓住了一片虚飘的树叶。
Tā shēnshǒu zhuāzhù le yípiàn xūpiāo de shùyè。
He reached out his hand and grabbed a floating tree leaf.
我生病了，身体虚飘飘的。
Wǒ shēngbìng le，shēntǐ xūpiāopiāo de。
I am sick and feel very weak and wobbly.
中医说虚热也是一种病症，需要好好休息。
Zhōngyī shuō xūrè yěshì yìzhǒng bìngzhèng，xūyào hǎohǎo xiūxi。
According to the traditional Chinese medicine science, the deficient heat is also regarded as a sign of illness, which requires a good rest.
证券市场最近有些虚热的迹象。
Zhèngquàn shìchǎng zuìjìn yǒuxiē xūrè de jì xiàng。
The security market shows some trace of the bubble.
你这么做是虚荣心在作用吧？
Nǐ zhème zuò shì xūróngxīn zài zuòyòng ba？
Aren\'t you doing this out of vanity?
现在很多人都不讲实际，尽是虚套子糊弄人。
Xiànzài hěnduōrén dōu bùjiǎng shíjì，jìnshì xūtàozi hùnòng rén。
Nowadays, many people are not down to earth, but full of conventions.
虚文浮礼就省省吧，没有实际意义。
Xūwén fúlǐ jiù shěngshěng ba，méiyǒu shíjì yìyì。
Let\'s spare the mere formalities. They\'re meaningless.
昨天看恐怖片，今天我的心还虚悬着呢。
Zuótiān kàn kǒngbùpiān，jīntiān wǒ de xīn hái xūxuán zhe ne。
Having watched a horror film yesterday, my heart is still unsettled today.
这次的大奖到现在还虚悬着呢。
Zhècì de dàjiǎng dào xiànzài hái xūxuán zhe ne。
The award hasn\'t been decided yet.
他说都是虚言，你不要太当真了。
Tā shuō dōushì xūyán，nǐ búyào tài dàngzhēn le。
What he said were all empty words. You shouldn\'t take them seriously.
把门虚掩着就可以啦，我马上回来！
Bǎ mén xūyǎnzhe jiù kěyǐ la，wǒ mǎshàng huílái！
Just leave the door unlocked. I will come back soon.
虚造证据是违法的，你不会不知道吧！
Xūzào zhèngjù shì wéifǎ de，nǐ búhuì bùzhīdào ba！
Fabricating evidence is against the law. You should know that!
你这是中医说的虚症，吃点中药吧。
Nǐ zhèshì zhōng yī shuō de xūzhèng，chī diǎn zhōng yào ba。
This is what the traditional Chinese medicine science calls a deficiency illness. Take some Chinese medicine.
他虚掷了很多钱在房产上，现在吃饭都没钱了。
Tā xūzhì le hěnduō qián zài fángchǎn shàng，xiànzài chīfàn dōu méiqián le。
He threw a great deal of money into real estate in vain. Now he can\'t even afford a meal.
虚字在文章里没有具体意义。
Xūzì zài wénzhāng lǐ méiyǒu jùtǐ yìyì。
Function words have no actual meaning in an article.
他被车撞了，有点血虚，要补补身体。
Tā bèi chē zhuàng le，yǒudiǎn xuèxū，yào bǔbǔ shēntǐ。
He should take more nourishing food, as his blood is deficient due to the car accident.
当年他们那一派主张写实和虚幻相结合。
Dàngnián tāmen nà yípài zhǔzhāng xiěshí hé xūhuàn xiāng jiéhé。
In that year, their group held the view that realism and imagination should be combined together.
经过了解我发现她真虚伪，让人恶心。
Jīngguò liǎojiě wǒ fāxiàn tā zhēn xūwěi，ràng rén ěxin。
After getting to know her, I find that she is hypocritical and disgusting.
祖传的医方据说对于治疗肾虚效果很好。
Zǔchuán de yīfāng jùshuō duìyú zhìliáo shènxū xiàoguǒ hěnhǎo。
The ancestral prescription is said to be efficacious against renal weakness.
浮夸虚靡之风虽古已有之，却于今为烈。
Fúkuā xūmí zhī fēng suī gǔyǐ yǒuzhī，què yújīn wéiliè。
Though proneness to boasting and waste has existed for a long time, it is becoming more and more serious nowadays.
我最讨厌那些爱做秀的人了，感觉他们特别虚伪。
Wǒ zuì tǎoyàn nàxiē ài zuòxiù de rén le，gǎnjué tāmen tèbié xūwěi。
I hate people striking attitudes most, and find them extremely hypocritical.
面对子虚乌有的诽谤，我感到很苦恼。
Miànduì zǐxū wūyǒu de fěibàng，wǒ gǎndào hěn kǔnǎo。
I felt quite distressed at being untruthfully slandered.
虚掉
xū diào
make (photos, pictures, etc)unclear; ignore something; become weak
那女人爱慕虚荣。
Nà nǚrén àimùxūróng。
That woman is very vain.
媒体总爱故弄玄虚。
Méitǐ zǒng ài gùnòngxuánxū。
The media always likes to make a mystery out of things.
我感到精神空虚。
Wǒ gǎndào jīngshén kōngxū.
I feel spiritually empty.
谦虚是一种美德。
Qiānxū shì yìzhǒng měidé.
Modesty is a virtue.
他谦虚了一下，最后接受了礼物。
Tā qiānxū le yíxià，zuìhòu jiēshòule lǐwù.
He was shy about it at first, but in the end he accepted the present.
你这么不谦虚，会摔跤的。
Nǐ zhème bù qiānxū，huì shuāijiāo de。
If you show such lack of modesty, you\'ll come to grief.
我不与虚伪的人为伍。
Wǒ bù yǔ xūwěi de rén wéiwǔ。
I don\'t keep company with hypocrites.
故事情节纯属虚构。
Gùshì qíngjié chúnshǔ xūgòu。
This story has been completely fabricated.
我看得出他对我只是虚情假意。
Wǒ kàndechū tā duì wǒ zhǐshì xūqíng-jiǎyì。
I realized that his apparent friendliness to me was not genuine.
我们要虚心向他人学习。
Wǒmen yào xūxīn xiàng tārén xuéxí。
We need to learn from others in an open-minded way.
面对虚张声势的商家，如何讨个好价钱？
Miànduì xūzhāngshēngshì de shāngjiā，rúhé tǎo gè hǎo jiàqián ？
How is it possible to bargain with shopkeepers who bluff and bluster?
他很虚荣，她则不然。
Tā hěn xūróng，tā zé bùrán。
He\'s very vain, but she\'s not.
她身体虚弱，经常遭受疾病的折磨。
Tā shēntǐ xūruò，jīngcháng zāoshòu jíbìng de zhémó。
She\'s in poor health and often tormented by illness.
这部影片首映的时候，电影院里座无虚席。
Zhè bù yǐngpiàn shǒuyìng de shíhou，diànyǐngyuàn lǐ zuòwúxūxí。
There was a full house at the film premier.
乘虚而入
虚度青春
虚构
阴虚火旺
空虚。
不慕虚名。
虚心乃成功之保证。
纯属虚构
虚妄。
不务虚名。
不虚此行。
座无虚席。
空虚。
谦虚。
乘虚而入。
虚症。
虚汗。
虚情假意。
虚张声势。
虚伪。
虚席以待。
虚度年华。
弹(ｄàｎ)无虚发。
心里发虚。
胆虚。
以虚带实。
务虚。
故弄玄虚。
眩于虚名。
做贼心虚。
虚张声势。
座无虚席。
白吃了这么多补品，身体还是那么虚弱。
严厉打击虚假出资和抽逃资金行为。
身体虚弱，站着直打晃儿。
打探虚实。
看见这阵势，我胆虚了。
反腐败不能虚张声势，必须动真格的。
本剧的人物和情节纯属虚构，请勿对号入座。
浮词虚语
他把金钱地位看作浮利虚名。
抛舍虚荣。
首场演出，座无虚席。
虚耗时日。
虚火上升。
国库虚空。
虚礼应当从简。
病了几天，走起路来虚飘飘的。
防范虚热的泡沫经济。
他的工作调动至今还虚悬在那儿。
一等奖没有评出，一直虚悬着。
句句是实话，绝无虚言。
门虚掩着，轻轻一推就开了
虚掩着衣襟，腰里别着手枪。
虚造罪名
虚造声势。
虚掷年华
岁月虚掷。
贼人胆虚。
论据虚假是本文的致命伤。
不要爱慕虚荣
他在发言中避实就虚，不谈实质问题。
辨别虚实。
谦虚谨慎，定能成事
第一次参加比赛心里有点儿发虚
经过调养，身体不再发虚了
他表面上很谦虚，骨子里却谁也看不起
虚应故事

to suit sth to sb/sth
使某物适合于某人/某物
The intellectual people are more suitable for administration position than sentimental people.
理智的人比感情用事的人更适合做管理工作。
Engaging in a dangerous activity is not for the timid.
Dǎnxiǎo de rén bú shìhé cóngshì wēixiǎn huódòng。
胆小的人不适合从事危险活动。
There are a couple of discos for the younger.
Nàr yǒu jǐ zhī shìhé niánqīngrén de Dísīkē gēqǔ。
那儿有几支适合年轻人的迪斯科歌曲。
Eric performed a monologue which had people in fits of laughter.
Àiruìkè biǎoyǎn yí duàn chángpiān dúbái，qíjiān rénmen shìshí de fāchū xiàoshēng。
艾瑞克表演一段长篇独白，其间人们适时地发出笑声。
Many garden tools are adapted for disabled people.
Xǔduō yuánlín gōngjù jīng tiáozhěng， shìhé cánjí rénshì shǐyòng。
许多园林工具经调整，适合残疾人士使用。
to be unsuitable for sb
对某人不合适
Human beings will adapt to almost any vile conditions.
Rénlèi néng shìyìng jīhū rènhé èliè tiáojiàn。
人类能适应几乎任何恶劣条件。
We were looking for a flexible person to take the job.
Wǒmen zài xúnzhǎo yí wèi shìyìngxìng qiáng de rén lái dānrèn cǐ gōngzuò。
我们在寻找一位适应性强的人来担任此工作。
Some of us find it hard to adapt to country life.
Wǒmen zhōng yǒuxiē rén nányǐ shìyìng xiāngcūn shēnghuó。
我们中有些人难以适应乡村生活。
Mrs. Lee would report on progress to the board in due time.
Lǐ fūrén jiāng zài shìdàng de shíhou bàogào dǒngshìhuì de jìnzhǎn。
李夫人将在适当的时候报告董事会的进展。
The same rules go for everyone.
Xiāngtóng de guīzé shìyòngyú měi gè rén。
相同的规则适用于每个人。
appropriate for sth/sb
适合于某物/某人
Children adapt to a new environment more easily than adults.
儿童比成人更容易适应新环境。
Cactus plants are tolerant of extreme heat.
Xiānrénzhǎng kěyǐ shìyìng jí rè huánjìng。
仙人掌可以适应极热环境。
A suitable number of people are cooperating on this task.
Jiù zhège rènwù，yǒu shìdàng de yí bùfēn rén zài hézuò。
就这个任务，有适当的一部分人在合作。
An elderly person may be better suited with a smaller dog.
Yí wèi lǎoniánrén kěnéng gèng shìhé yǎng xiǎo diǎner de gǒu。
一位老年人可能更适合养小点儿的狗。
The proper amount and distribution of electrolytes in the body is essential for health.
Diànjiěyè zài réntǐ nèi de shìdàng shùliàng hé fēnbù shì jiànkāng de gēnběn。
电解液在人体内的适当数量和分布是健康的根本。
Comfort keynotes this designer\'s fall collection.
Shūshì shì zhè wèi shèjìrényuán de qiūjì shōucángpǐn de zhǔdiào。
舒适是这位设计人员的秋季收藏品的主调。
This color doesn\'t fit you, it looks better against a more pale skin.
这个颜色不适合你，它更适合皮肤白些的人。
Mike is the only possible man for this position.
麦克是唯一适合这个职位的人。
Wushu is suitable to people of all ages.
武术适合各种年龄的人练习。
We can also provide suitable employment for blind people in London.
Wǒmen hái kěyǐ xiàng lúndūn nàxiē shīmíngrénshì tígōng héshì de jiùyèjīhuì。
我们还可以向伦敦那些失明人士提供合适的就业机会。
All questions asked must apply to all the candidates.
Suǒyǒu tí chūlái de wèntí bìxū shìyòngyú suǒyǒu hòuxuǎnrén。
所有提出来的问题必须适用于所有候选人。
The same goes for the rest of us.
Zhè tóngyàng shìhé wǒmen qítā de rén。
这同样适合我们其他的人。
He is a square peg in a round hole.
Tā búzài shì shìhé zhè yī zhíwèi de rén。
他不再是适合这一职位的人。
She spends her time frivolously enjoying the easy life of a rich and spoiled girl.
Tā qīngfú de guòzhe tā nàzhǒng fùyǒu de、 bèi rén chǒnghuài de shūshì rìzi。
她轻浮地过着她那种富有的、被人宠坏的舒适日子。
perfect for sb/sth
对某人/某事完全合适
For most of all, I am determined to get my family a decent place to live.
Zuì zhòngyào de shì，wǒ juédìng wèi jiārén zhǎodào yí gè héshì de dìfang shēnghuó。
最重要的是，我决定为家人找到一个合适的地方生活。
I appreciate the comforts of home.
Wǒ gǎnjī jiārén dài gěi wǒ de shūshì。
我感激家人带给我的舒适。
The applause suitably summed up the thoughts of the people there.
Zhǎngshēng shìdàng de tǐxiànle nàli rénmen de kànfǎ。
掌声适当地体现了那里人们的看法。
It is not comme il faut for a gentleman to be constantly asking for money.
Duì yíwèi shēnshì láishuō，jīngcháng xiàng biérén yào qián shì bùhéshì de。
对一位绅士来说，经常向别人要钱是不合适的。
A correctly padded seat will be comfortable for a wide range of people.
Shìdàng jiāle diànzǐ de zuòwèi，rénrén dōuhuì juéde hěn shūfu。
适当加了垫子的座位，人人都会觉得很舒服。
Witnesses should be able to give adequate and appropriate testimony.
Zhèngrén yīng nénggòu tígōng chōngzú shìdàng de zhèngcí。
证人应能够提供充足适当的证词。
She is too thin-skinned to be an account executive in an advertising agency.
她脸皮太薄，不适合在广告公司担任业务人员。
Away games gave working-class youths their first taste of comfortable living.
Yuǎnlí yóuxì shǐ gōngrénjiējí de niánqīngrén men shǒucì gǎnshòudàole shūshì shēnghuó。
远离游戏使工人阶级的年轻人们首次感受到了舒适生活。
The task was uncongenial to one sensitive to rebuffs.
Zhège gōngzuò bú tài shìhé duìyú yánlì huíjué mǐngǎn de rén。
这个工作不太适合对于严厉回绝敏感的人。
This rule applies to everyone who is employed by our company.
Zhè tiáo guīdìng shìyòng yú wǒmen gōngsī gùyōng de měi gè rén。
这条规定适用于我们公司雇佣的每个人。
This function is ineptly left to a small voice.
Zhè xiàng rènwù bú shìdàng de jiāogěile yí gè shēngyīn xiǎo de rén。
这项任务不适当地交给了一个声音小的人。
Virtually everyone has heard about the importance of adequate protein in the diet.
Shìshíshàng měigè rén dōu tīngshuōguò zài yǐnshí zhōng shèqǔ shìdàng dànbáizhì de zhòngyàoxìng。
事实上每个人都听说过在饮食中摄取适当蛋白质的重要性。
everyone must find their own level according to their ability.
Měi gè rén dōu bìxū gēnjù zìjǐ de nénglì qù zhǎodào shìhé zìjǐ de wèizhi。
每个人都必须根据自己的能力去找到适合自己的位置。
A well trained staff saw to the agreeableness of our accommodations.
Shòuguò liánghǎo xùnliàn de gōngzuò rényuán fùzé bǎ wǒmen de zhùsù ānpái de shūshì mǎnyì。
受过良好训练的工作人员负责把我们的住宿安排得舒适满意。
Japanese like to pun--their language is well suited to punning.
Rìběnrén xǐhuan shuō shuāngguānyǔ，yīnwèi tāmen de yǔyán hěn shìhé shuāngguānyǔ。
日本人喜欢说双关语，因为他们的语言很适合双关语。
这项原则并非适用于一切情况。
Zhè xiàng yuánzé bìng fēi shìyòng yú yíqiè qíngkuàng。
This rule does not apply in all cases.
急切间找不着适当的人
jíqiè jiān zhǎo bu zháo shìdāng de rén 
cannot find the right person on such short notice

要把钻石切割成合适的形状需要专门的工具。

Jiā yìxiǎochí yán，táng shìliàng。

每天饮用适量的白水有益健康。

据说适量饮用发酵酒，对身体有好处。
Jùshuō shìliàng yǐnyòng fājiàojiǔ，duì shēntǐ yǒu hǎochu。
It is good for your health to drink a moderate amount of fermented liquor.
适量蜂花粉与蜂蜜调合，每天饮用一些，既滋补又美容。
Shìliàng fēnghuāfěn yǔ fēngmì tiáohé，měitiān yǐnyòng yìxiē，jì zībǔ yòu měiróng。
Drinking some bee pollen mixed with honey every day is good for your health and can make you more attractive.
我们的身体需要适量地补充赖氨酸。
Wǒmen de shēntǐ xūyào shìliàng de bǔchōng làiānsuān。
We should supplement with lysine for our health.
添加适量的催化剂，会加快反应的速度。

A proper amount of catalyst will speed up the reaction.
适量施放细菌肥料能促进土壤对养份的吸收。
Shìliàng shīfàng xìjūnféiliào néng cùjìn tǔrǎng duì yǎngfèn de xīshōu。

适量用药
shìliàng yòngyào
take medicine in appropriate doses
适量运动有益健康。

雨量适中
yǔliàng shì zhōng
moderate rainfall
服药过量会适得其反。

Taking more than the prescribed dose will produce the opposite effect.

a suit of summer weight
适合夏季穿的衣服

那件有拖裾的连衣裙非常适合她。

我觉得褐色头发比浅黄色头发更适合你。

这个玩具适合３岁以上的儿童。

我想这种天气肯定不适合学潜水。

那个颜色不适合你，试试红色的。

岛屿南部的水域最适合冲浪。

她很适合做催眠治疗法的受试对象。

appropriate for sth/sb
适合于某物/某人
to be convenient for
[+person] 适合于
skiing is not for me
滑雪不适合我
it suits him down to the ground
[BRIT] [inf] 这完全适合他
to suit sth to sb/sth
使某物适合于某人/某物
to be unfit for sth/to do sth
不胜任某事/不适合做某事
This assessment can help you to understand your memory pattern and to develop your own efficient way of learning.
这个评估可以帮你了解自己的记忆模式，并有助于形成适合你的有效学习方法。

这个旅行计划适合有时间的游客。

麦克是唯一适合这个职位的人。

她脸皮太薄，不适合在广告公司担任业务人员。

她不适合穿颜色这么艳丽的衣服。

顾问认为当前情况并不适合立即行动。
The title could well have served for the current chapter.
Zhège biāotí duì dāngqián zhè yī zhāng hěn shìhé。
这个标题对当前这一章很适合。
Making up the beds with sheets is rather awkward.
Yòng chuángdān chōngdāng bèirù fēicháng bù héshì。
用床单充当被褥非常不合适。
She felt no discomfort as the dentist drilled her deadened tooth.
Dāng yáyī zuàn tā shīqù zhījué de yáchǐ shí，tā méiyǒu gǎndào rènhé búshì。
当牙医钻她失去知觉的牙齿时，她没有感到任何不适。
适合于她的情况不一定都会适合于你，你看问题不要太模式化了。
Shìhéyú tā de qíngkuàng bùyídìng dōuhuì shìhéyú nǐ，nǐ kàn wèntí búyào tài móshìhuà le。
What suits her may not suit you. You should not standardize things.
硬面虽然不适合包饺子，却适合做刀削面。
Yìngmiàn suīrán bú shìhé bāojiǎozi，què shìhé zuò dāoxuēmiàn。
Though not suitable for making steamed stuffed buns, stiff dough is suitable for making shaved noodles.
这张两用沙发没有合适的地方安放。
Zhèzhāng liǎngyòng shāfā méiyǒu héshì de dìfāng ānfàng。
There\'s nowhere to put the sofa bed.
安适的环境
ānshì de huánjìng 
a quiet and comfortable environment

gēnjù bùtóng qíngkuàng zuò shìdàng de biàntōng

胃部不适
wèibùbúshì 
have a stomach upset
略感不适
lüè gǎn búshì

cǎiqǔ shìdàng de bùzhòu

Xīhóngshì chákǒu zhuàng，zhòng báicài tǐng héshì。

这件上衣长短正合适。
Zhèjiàn shàngyī chángduǎn zhèng héshì。

这个场子够大，可是音响效果不好，不适合用来开音乐会。

这间屋子太潮湿，不适宜住人。

他最适合做这件事，我敢打包票。
Tā zuì shìhé zuò zhèjiàn shì，wǒ gǎn dǎ bāopiào。
He\'s the right man for this job, I can give you my word.
这双鞋我穿上大小正合适。
Zhèshuāngxié wǒ chuānshàng dàxiǎo zhèng héshì。
These shoes are just my size.
她对学外语不感兴趣，让她学学绘画看，倒许合适。
Tā duì xué wàiyǔ bùgǎnxìngqù，ràng tā xuéxue huìhuà kàn，dào xǔ héshì。

在这里建个百货商店，地点倒适中。
Zài zhèlǐ jiàn gè bǎihuò shāngdiàn，dìdiǎn dào shì zhōng。

这个地区最适宜种小麦。
Zhège dìqū zuì shìyí zhòng xiǎomài。

你这样说合适吗？ 否！
Nǐ zhèyàng shuō héshì ma? Fǒu！

shēntǐ lüè gǎn búshì

Zhèshuāngxié dàxiǎo gāng héshì。

Zhèshuāngxié wǒ chuān zhe zhènghéshì。

他究竟经验丰富，让他负责这项工作最合适。

nóngdàn shìyí

您来主持这个讨论最合适，不要谦让了。

búshìdàng de qiángdiào qíngkuàngtèshū

shìyú értóng yuèdú de shūjí

适因此故
shì yīn cǐ gù

gǎn dào bú shì

到适当的时候
dào shìdàng de shíhou

适度的体育活动有利于病人恢复健康。

这件衣服的布料质地很好，价格也合适。

Nín zhège xiāngzi chāocháng，bú shìyí suíshēn xiédài。
Your suitcase is too large to take with you.

这种材料传热很快，适合做暖气片。

This kind of material is perfect for making heating radiators because of its fast transmission of heat.
粗放经营越来越不适应现在的科技时代了。

他的脸型只适合剃寸头。

他在技术方面进步很慢，已经不再适合参加这个等级赛了。

这一带地势低缓，适宜种植农业作物。
Zhè yídài dìshì dīhuǎn，shìyí zhòngzhí nóngyè zuòwù。
This area is low and even, it\'s not fit for agricultural crops.
导购员介绍说，这些玩具适合低幼儿童。
Dǎogòuyuán jièshào shuō，zhèxiē wánjù shìhé dīyòu értóng。
The shop girl said that these toys were fit for young children.
由于不适应目前的工作，他提出了调转申请。
Yóuyú bú shìyìng mùqián de gōngzuò，tā tíchū le diàozhuǎn shēnqǐng。
He applied for a transfer because he couldn\'t adapt to his current work.
她是南方人，不适应北方的冬寒气候。
Tā shì nánfāngrén，bùshìyìng běifāng de dōnghán qìhou。
She comes from the south and is not accustomed to the cold winter of the north.
据说适量饮用发酵酒，对身体有好处。
Jùshuō shìliàng yǐnyòng fājiàojiǔ，duì shēntǐ yǒu hǎochu。
It is good for your health to drink a moderate amount of fermented liquor.
丽丽的发式真是很适合她。
Lìlì de fàshì zhēnshi hěn shìhé tā。
Lily\'s hair style suits her perfectly.
何必固执于这些繁缛条文呢，我们应该适当变通。
Hébì gùzhí yú zhèxiē fánrù tiáowén ne，wǒmen yīnggāi shìdàng biàntōng。
Why should we confine ourselves with all the over-elaborate rules and regulations? We should be more flexible.
这块猪肉肥瘦儿正合适，做红烧肉肯定好吃。
Zhèkuài zhūròu féishòur zhèng héshì，zuò hóngshāoròu kěndìng hǎochī。
This piece of pork is neither too lean nor too fat and can be braised in brown sauce to make a delicious dish.
适量蜂花粉与蜂蜜调合，每天饮用一些，既滋补又美容。
Shìliàng fēnghuāfěn yǔ fēngmì tiáohé，měitiān yǐnyòng yìxiē，jì zībǔ yòu měiróng。
Drinking some bee pollen mixed with honey every day is good for your health and can make you more attractive.
这件衣服的服式不适合你。
Zhèjiàn yīfu de fúshì bú shìhé nǐ。
The style of these clothes does not suit you.
服务性行业并不是只适合女性从业者。
Fúwùxìng hángyè bìng búshì zhǐ shìhé nǚxìng cóngyèzhě。
The service industry is not confined to women only.
这是个人隐私，不适合公之于众。
Zhè shì gèrén yǐnsī，bú shìhé gōngzhī yú zhòng。
This is personal and it is inappropriate to reveal it to the public.
对于适合自己的工作机会就要努力争取，拱让只能说明懦弱。
Duìyú shìhé zìjǐ de gōngzuò jīhuì jiùyào nǔlì zhēngqǔ，gǒng ràng zhǐnéng shuōmíng nuòruò。
One should fight for suitable job opportunities. Handing it over to others on a silver platter is a sign of weakness.
不能对孩子一味惯纵，管教要适当严厉些。
Bùnéng duì háizi yíwèi guànzòng，guǎnjiào yào shìdàng yánlì xiē。
We shouldn\'t spoil the child all the time. Parents should be moderately strict with their children.
我们马上要过渡到下一个阶段的工作，大家要尽快适应。
Wǒmen mǎshàng yào guòdù dào xià yígè jiēduàn de gōngzuò，dàjiā yào jìnkuài shìyìng。
We will move on to next phase soon, you all should get accustomed to it quickly.
今日海况良好，适合出航。

shìliàng yòngyào

appropriate for sth/sb
适合于某物/某人
to be convenient for
[+person] 适合于
skiing is not for me
滑雪不适合我
it suits him down to the ground
[BRIT] [inf] 这完全适合他
to suit sth to sb/sth
使某物适合于某人/某物
to be unfit for sth/to do sth
不胜任某事/不适合做某事
This assessment can help you to understand your memory pattern and to develop your own efficient way of learning.
这个评估可以帮你了解自己的记忆模式，并有助于形成适合你的有效学习方法。

你试试看，衣服合适不？
Nǐ shìshìkàn，yīfu héshì bù?

我不知道谁是最合适的统摄三军的人选。
Wǒ bùzhīdào shéi shì zuì héshì de tǒngshè sānjūn de rénxuǎn。
I don\'t know who is the most suitable person to command the army, navy and air forces.
她对学外语不感兴趣，让她学学绘画看，倒许合适。

这里的地气不适合种植水稻。

不稀不稠，正合适

这个颜色不适合你，它更适合皮肤白些的人。

我觉得《安娜·卡列尼娜》不适合作为在机场候机时的消遣读物。

我想这种天气肯定不适合学潜水。

经济不景气，所以现在不适合买房。

那个颜色不适合你，试试红色的。

穿高跟鞋不适合跑步。

这中布料质地粗糙，不适合制作儿童服装。

这部电影不适合14岁以下儿童观看。

她天生波浪状卷发，但并不适合她。

滑雪不适合我
to be unfit for sth/to do sth
不胜任某事/不适合做某事

她脸皮太薄，不适合在广告公司担任业务人员。

她不适合穿颜色这么艳丽的衣服。
