批评家们称这个方法太粗暴了不适合使用在这样精美的画作上。
There is sufficient reason to judge that they will be unfit to practise medicine.
Yǒu zúgòu de lǐyóu pànduàn tāmen bú shìhé xíngyī。
有足够的理由判断他们不适合行医。
Engaging in a dangerous activity is not for the timid.
Dǎnxiǎo de rén bú shìhé cóngshì wēixiǎn huódòng。
胆小的人不适合从事危险活动。
This program is not suitable to be aired during prime time.
Zhège jiémù zài huángjīnshíjiān bú shìhé bōchū。
这个节目在黄金时间不适合播出。

我不适合住在这种庄严的环境中。
Extrreme sports are not for the cautious.

极限运动不适合那些胆小鬼。

The conditions were too rainy for playing in the snow.

It\'s difficult to place a pair of steps in the right place for hanging the paper.

合适优美诗歌的读者，能够分辨那些打动他心弦，给他留下永久心伤的时刻—他将永远也不能将它忘怀。
不适当地强调情况特殊
búshìdàng de qiángdiào qíngkuàngtèshū
lay undue stress on special circumstances
急切间找不着适当的人
jíqiè jiān zhǎo bu zháo shìdāng de rén 
cannot find the right person on such short notice
根据不同情况作适当的变通
gēnjù bùtóng qíngkuàng zuò shìdàng de biàntōng 
make appropriate adaptations in the light of specific conditions
不能对孩子一味惯纵，管教要适当严厉些。
Bùnéng duì háizi yíwèi guànzòng，guǎnjiào yào shìdàng yánlì xiē。
We shouldn\'t spoil the child all the time. Parents should be moderately strict with their children.
It would be improper to...
…是不适当的
If the rumor is true，can anything be more inept than to repeat it now?
Rúguǒ zhège chuánwén shì zhēn de huà，háiyǒu shénme shìqing bǐ xiànzài chóngfù tā gèng bú shìdàng de ma？
如果这个传闻是真的话，还有什么事情比现在重复它更不适当的吗？
This function is ineptly left to a small voice.

这项任务不适当地交给了一个声音小的人。
Without proper technical knowledge, future development will be much more difficult.

lüè gǎn búshì

shēntǐ lüè gǎn búshì
not feel very well; be under the weather; be out of sorts

I happened to be ill yesterday.

不适当地强调情况特殊
búshìdàng de qiángdiào qíngkuàngtèshū
lay undue stress on special circumstances
全身不适
quánshēn bú shì
general malaise
感到不适
gǎn dào bú shì
not feel well

Zhè dì tài wā，bú shì yú zhòngmiánhua。
This is low-lying land and not suitable for cotton.

Having problems with his digestive system recently, he decides to take a barium meal.
您这个箱子超长，不适宜随身携带。
Nín zhège xiāngzi chāocháng，bú shìyí suíshēn xiédài。
Your suitcase is too large to take with you.
粗放经营越来越不适应现在的科技时代了。

Extensive farming is becoming more and more unsuitable for the present technological era.
由于不适应目前的工作，他提出了调转申请。

He applied for a transfer because he couldn\'t adapt to his current work.
她是南方人，不适应北方的冬寒气候。
Tā shì nánfāngrén，bùshìyìng běifāng de dōnghán qìhou。
She comes from the south and is not accustomed to the cold winter of the north.
这件衣服的服式不适合你。
Zhèjiàn yīfu de fúshì bú shìhé nǐ。
The style of these clothes does not suit you.
这是个人隐私，不适合公之于众。

This is personal and it is inappropriate to reveal it to the public.
他说“你会找到更好的”的话外音是“我不适合你”。

这间教室很欢闹，实在不适宜学习。
Zhè jiān jiàoshì hěnhuānnào，shízai bú shìyí xuéxí。
This classroom is very noisy, and really not suitable for studying.
她声音过于尖细，不适合唱歌。
Tā shēngyīn guòyú jiānxì，bú shìhé chànggē。
Her voice is too small and shrill, which prevents her from being a singer.
缣帛很轻，就是造价有点高，不适合用来写字。
Jiāboó hěnqīng，jiùshì zàojià yǒu diǎn gāo，bú shìhé yònglái xiězì。
Fine silk is light, but it is expensive, therefore it is not the best choice as a writing material.
经过实验，这种植物不适宜在碱土里种植。
Jīngguò shíyàn，zhèzhǒng zhíwù bú shìyí zài jiǎntǔ lǐ zhòngzhí。
This alkaline soil has been tested and found unsuitable for growing this kind of plant.
他脖子短，不适合穿立领的毛衣。
Tā bózi duǎn，bú shìhé chuān lìlǐng de máoyī。
Having a short neck, he is not suitable to wear a turtle neck sweater.
北方人到了两广地区，在各个方面都不适应。
Běifāngrén dào le liǎngguǎng dìqū，zài gègè fāngmiàn dōu búshìyìng。
When people from the north come to Guangdong and Guangxi, they are unable to adapt to the environment.
皇帝的龙准最近有些不适。
Huángdì de lóngzhǔn zuìjìn yǒuxiē búshì。
The emperor\'s nose hasn’t felt well in recent days.
这种气候不适合落叶植物的生长。
Zhèzhǒng qìhou bú shìhé luòyè zhíwù de shēngzhǎng。
The climate is not suitable for deciduous vegetation.
他身体不适，经过中医评脉，诊断出他是得了肠胃炎。
Tā shēntǐ búshì，jīngguò zhōng yī píngmài，zhěnduàn chū tā shì dé le chángwèiyán。
He didn\'t feel well, and he was diagnosed with gastroenteritis after having his pulse felt.
他不会跳舞，坐在这个充满奇光异彩的舞厅里，感觉很不适应。
Tā búhuì tiàowǔ，zuòzài zhège chōngmǎn qíguāng yìcǎi de wǔtīng lǐ，gǎnjué hěnbú shìyìng。
He doesn\'t know how to dance, so  he feels uncomfortable when he sits in a ballroom full of extraordinary splendor.
沙壤土不适合种植这种高大树木。
Shārǎngtǔ bú shìhé zhòngzhí zhèzhǒng gāodà shùmù。
Sand soil is not fit to plant such tall trees.
这件衣服确实漂亮，但对她来说并不适体。
Zhèjiàn yīfu quèshí piàoliàng，dàn duì tā lái shuō bìng bú shìtǐ。
This garment is really pretty, but doesn\'t suit her.
她一到外地就水土不服，看来很不适于出差。
Tā yídào wàidì jiù shuǐtǔ bùfú，kànlái hěnbú shìyú chūchāi。
She is not accustomed to the climate of new places, and so doesn\'t seem fit for business trips.
无如身体不适，我只好放弃这次期盼已久的旅行。
Wúrú shēntǐ búshì，wǒ zhǐhǎo fàngqì zhècì qīpàn yǐjiǔ de lǚxíng。
Due to my poor health, I have to give up this long expected trip.
硬面虽然不适合包饺子，却适合做刀削面。
Yìngmiàn suīrán bú shìhé bāojiǎozi，què shìhé zuò dāoxuēmiàn。
Though not suitable for making steamed stuffed buns, stiff dough is suitable for making shaved noodles.
有些人不适合做老师，比如小王。
Yǒuxiērén búshìhé zuòlǎoshī，bǐrú Xiǎo Wáng。
Some people are not suited to teaching, Xiao Wang for instance.
他觉得我不适合做这项工作。
Tā juéde wǒ bú shìhé zuò zhèxiàng gōngzuò.
He doesn\'t think I\'m suited for this work.
他最近身体不适。
Tā zuìjìn shēntǐ búshì。
He\'s not been well recently.
吃止痛药后不适宜饮酒。
Chī zhǐtòngyào hòu bú shìyí yǐnjiǔ。
After taking painkillers it\'s not advisable to drink alcohol.
这种水硬度太高，不适合饮用。
Zhèzhǒng shuǐ yìngdù tài gāo，bú shìhé yǐnyòng。
This kind of water is too hard: it\'s not suitable for drinking.
急切间找不着适当的人
jíqiè jiān zhǎo bu zháo shìdāng de rén 
cannot find the right person on such short notice
这种木料太松，做家具不合适。
Zhèzhǒng mùliào tài sōng，zuò jiājù bù héshì。
The wood is too soft for making furniture.
屉跟锅不合适。
Tì gēn guō bùhéshì。
The steamer tray doesn\'t fit into the pot.
这鞋如果不合适，商店管退钱。
Zhè xié rúguǒ bùhéshì，shāngdiàn guǎn tuìqián。
If the shoes do not wear well, the shop will refund your money.
这篇课文不合适，一则太长，二则太难。
Zhèpiān kèwén bùhéshì，yì zé tài cháng，èr zé tài nán。
This text is unsuitable. For one thing it\'s too long, for another it\'s too difficult.
他在技术方面进步很慢，已经不再适合参加这个等级赛了。
Tā zài jìshù fāngmiàn jìnbùhěnmàn，yǐjing búzài shìhé cānjiā zhège děngjísài le。
He skills are improving too slowly to participate in games at this level.
我怕这么做不合适。
Wǒ pà zhème zuò bù héshì.
I\'m afraid it\'s not appropriate to do it this way.
适合于她的情况不一定都会适合于你，你看问题不要太模式化了。
Shìhéyú tā de qíngkuàng bùyídìng dōuhuì shìhéyú nǐ，nǐ kàn wèntí búyào tài móshìhuà le。
What suits her may not suit you. You should not standardize things.
这件事你办最合适，不必过谦了。
Zhèjiànshì nǐ bàn zuì héshì，búbì guòqiān le。
You are the best person for the job. Don\'t be so modest.
您来主持这个讨论最合适，不要谦让了。
Nín lái zhǔchí zhège tǎolùn zuì héshì，búyào qiān ràng le。
You\'re just the person to chair the discussion. Don\'t decline out of modesty.
服务性行业并不是只适合女性从业者。
Fúwùxìng hángyè bìng búshì zhǐ shìhé nǚxìng cóngyèzhě。
The service industry is not confined to women only.
这条裤子横裆处做得不很合适。
Zhè tiáo kùzi héngdāng chù zuò de bùhěnhéshì。
The crosspiece of the trousers is not made well.
这服药专治精气不足，很适合病人服用。
Zhè fú yào zhuānzhì jīngqì bùzú，hěnshìhé bìngrén fúyòng。
This kind of medicine can deal with a lack of kidney Qi effectively, and is very suitable for patients.
这个螺口的大小不太合适，需要换一个。
Zhège luókǒu de dàxiǎo bú tài héshì，xūyào huàn yí gè。
This screw is not suitable; give me another type.
这盘菜的佐料配搭不太合适，盐放多了。
Zhè pán cài de zuǒliào pèidā bú tài héshì，yán fàng duō le。
The dish is seasoned inappropriately, there is too much salt.
你试试看，衣服合适不？
Nǐ shìshìkàn，yīfu héshì bù?
Why don\'t you try on the clothes and see if they fit?
我想我们不太合适。
Wǒ xiǎng wǒmen bú tài héshì 。
I think we\'re not a very good fit.
时代变了，这些旧例不再具有适用性。
Shídài biàn le，zhèxiē jiùlì búzài jùyǒu shìyòngxìng。
Time changes and these old regulations are no longer applicable.
因循守旧的人必然适应不了时代的发展。
Yīnxún shǒujiù de rén bìrán shìyīng bùliǎo shídài de fāzhǎn。
People who get stuck in a groove aren\'t able to adapt themselves to the times.
适应不同需要的各类职业大学遍及全国。
Shìyìng bùtóng xūyào de gè lèi zhíyè dàxué biànjí quánguó。
There are various kinds of vocational colleges all around the country that satisfy different needs.
根据不同情况作适当的变通
gēnjù bùtóng qíngkuàng zuò shìdàng de biàntōng 
make appropriate adaptations in the light of specific conditions
房间不大，但很舒适。
Fángjiān bú dà，dàn hěn shūshì。
The rooms are not big but they\'re very cosy.
初练长跑要适可而止，不能过量。
Chū liàn chángpǎo yào shìkě\'érzhǐ，bùnéng guòliàng。

小刚是个闲不住的人，很不喜欢这种闲适的生活。

Xiao Gang is a person who hates to be idle, therefore this kind of easy life doesn\'t suit him.
今天是不容错过的吉期，适于操办婚事。
Jīntiān shì bùróng cuòguò de jíqī，shìyú cāobàn hūnshì。
Today is an unmissable auspicious day, suitable for holding a wedding.
我不知道谁是最合适的统摄三军的人选。
Wǒ bùzhīdào shéi shì zuì héshì de tǒngshè sānjūn de rénxuǎn。
I don\'t know who is the most suitable person to command the army, navy and air forces.
不经过社会的历练，他很难适应这复杂的工作。
Bùjīngguò shèhuì de lìliàn，tā hěnnán shìyìng zhè fùzá de gōngzuò。
If he hasn\'t been tempered by society, it will be difficult for him to acclimatize himself to the complicated job.
不能对孩子一味惯纵，管教要适当严厉些。
Bùnéng duì háizi yíwèi guànzòng，guǎnjiào yào shìdàng yánlì xiē。
We shouldn\'t spoil the child all the time. Parents should be moderately strict with their children.
她对学外语不感兴趣，让她学学绘画看，倒许合适。
Tā duì xué wàiyǔ bùgǎnxìngqù，ràng tā xuéxue huìhuà kàn，dào xǔ héshì。
She is not interested in foreign languages. Let her try painting; maybe she has an aptitude for that.
进入不惑之年的他仍然在努力学习新的知识，适应新的环境。
Jìnrù búhuò zhī nián de tā réngrán zài nǔlì xuéxí xīn de zhīshi，shìyīng xīn de huánjìng。

他今天身体有些不适，但还不至于讲不了课

[BRIT] [inf] 感觉不适
to be unfit for sth/to do sth
不胜任某事/不适合做某事
to be unsuitable for sth/for doing sth
不适于某事/做某事
She is too thin-skinned to be an account executive in an advertising agency.
她脸皮太薄，不适合在广告公司担任业务人员。
New arrivals were unaccommodated to the heat of the tropics.
新来者不适应热带的炎热

她不适合穿颜色这么艳丽的衣服。
The clergyman\'s health is so inadequate to sustain the hardships of a forest life.
这位牧师的健康状况极不适合忍受森林中的艰苦生活。
Critics argue that the solvent was too fierce to use on such a delicate painting.

批评家们称这个方法太粗暴了不适合使用在这样精美的画作上。
There is sufficient reason to judge that they will be unfit to practise medicine.

有足够的理由判断他们不适合行医。
Engaging in a dangerous activity is not for the timid.

胆小的人不适合从事危险活动。

He was very unfit, in my opinion, to perform the duty that had been entrusted to him.

依我看来，他非常不适合履行委托给他的职责。
Many of the lovely blue Pacific waves were not fit to swim or surf.

She felt no discomfort as the dentist drilled her deadened tooth.

Píngwěimen jiù tā bú shìhé nà xiàng rènmìng de yìjiàn dáchéngle yízhì。

这时间不合适做…
to be unsuitable for sb
对某人不合适
The species that fail to adjust to the changing conditions of existence will gradually become extinct.
不能适应生存环境改变的物种会逐渐灭绝。
With the progress of history, the old political system had become unadaptable to the requiremts of economic and social development.
随着历史的发展，旧的政治制度已经不能适应经济和社会发展的要求。
Again, we still meet in the unbefitting time.
终究我们还是在不合适的时间相遇.
The traditional social relief system with its unstandardized working system fails to meet the demands of the socialist market economy.
传统的社会救济制度由于其工作制度不够规范，不能适应社会主义市场经济的要求。
This bus is not well-suited to rough roads.
这公共汽车不太适合跑粗糙的路。
Making up the beds with sheets is rather awkward.
Yòng chuángdān chōngdāng bèirù fēicháng bù héshì。
用床单充当被褥非常不合适。

He was unsuitably hatted.
Tā dàile gè bù héshì de màozi。

Tā de zhíniù yǐ dádào búzài shìhé de chéngdù。

Wǒ zàicì kòudòngle shǒuqiāng de bānjī。
我再次扣动了手枪的扳机。
He put a finger to his temple like a pistol.
Tā bǎ shǒuzhǐ xiàng shǒuqiāng yíyàng zhǐzhe tàiyángxué。
他把手指像手枪一样指着太阳穴。
The agent pulled out a gun and shot at him.
Tègōng tāochū shǒuqiāng cháo tā kāihuǒ。
特工掏出手枪朝他开火。
Police officers with revolvers and wearing bullet-proof vests ringed the court.

佩带左轮手枪穿着马甲的警官站在法庭周围。
A loaded revolver flying through the air brings extra instability into an already volatile situation.
Yì bǎ zhuāngyǒu zǐdàn de zuǒlúnshǒuqiāng fēiguò，gěi yǐjīng chūyú bàofā xià de júmiàn zēngjiāle gèngduō bù wěndìngxìng。

He had very little ordinary revolver practice on the range.

他在靶场很少用普通的左轮手枪练习。
His 7.65 mm Walther pistol lay by his foot.
Tā de qī diǎn liùwǔ háomǐ kǒujìng de Wǎ\'ěrtè shǒuqiāng fàngzài tā jiǎobiān。
他的7.65毫米口径的瓦尔特手枪放在他脚边。
The pistol wasn\'t pointed at Trent.

那只手枪没有指向特伦特。

相反，拔出你的左轮手枪并连续射击。
She waved her gun.
Tā huīwǔzhe shǒuqiāng。

There were four notches in the handle of his revolver.

他的左轮手枪枪柄上有四个凹槽。
He wore his firearm in a shoulder holster.

His hand trembled a bit, because it was his first time to shoot at a target with a gun.
警察及时地击毙了持枪歹徒，确保了人质的安全。
Jǐngchá jíshí de jībì le chíqiāng dǎitú，quèbǎo le rénzhì de ānquán。
In time the police killed the gunmen, and secured the safety of the hostage.
警察叱令劫匪放下手中的枪。
Jǐngchá chìlìng jiéfěi fàngxià shǒu zhōng de qiāng。
Police yelled at the robbers, ordering them to put down their guns.
你胡乱打枪，会吓跑猎物的。
Nǐ húluàn dǎqiāng，huì xiàpǎo lièwù de。
Your random firing will scare away the prey.
这次考试他竟敢请人打枪，发现后被取消了考试资格。
Zhècì kǎoshì tā jìnggǎn qǐng rén dǎqiāng，fāxiàn hòu bèi qǔxiāo le kǎoshì zīgé。
He dared to ask someone to take the examination for him, but was disqualified when his substitute was discovered.
金枪鱼不是淡水鱼。
Jīnqiāngyú búshì dànshuǐyú.
Tuna is not a freshwater fish.
这把步枪可以连发，也可以快速点发。
Zhèbǎ bùqiāng kěyǐ liánfā，yě kěyǐ kuàisù diǎnfā。
This rifle can give running fire and rapid bursts of fire.
战士们手握钢枪、迈着正步。
Zhànshìmen shǒuwò gāngqiāng、mài zhe zhèngbù。
Soldiers are marching in parade, with rifles in hand.
他用这架高射机枪射中了敌人的飞机。
Tā yòng zhè jià gāoshè jīqiāng shèzhòng le dírén de fēijī。
He shot the enemy\'s airplane with this antiaircraft machine gun.
为了防止海匪的袭击，每个人都荷枪实弹，严阵以待。
Wèile fángzhǐ hǎifěi de xíjī，měigèrén dōu héqiāng shídàn，yánzhèn yǐdài。
Everyone is at attention at their stations with live ammunitions in order to prevent pirate attacks.
盒子枪现在只能在电影里看到。
Héziqiāng xiànzài zhǐnéng zài diànyǐng lǐ kàndào。
Mauser pistols can only be seen in films nowadays.
这支枪的后坐力很强，使用的时候要小心。
Zhèzhī qiāng de hòuzuòlì hěnqiáng，shǐyòng de shíhou yào xiǎoxīn。
The reactive force of this gun is very strong, be careful when using it.
他的冲锋枪吐出一条火蛇为队伍开辟了道路。
Tā de chōngfèngqiāng tǔchū yìtiáo huǒshé wèi duìwu kāipì le dàolù。
Bursts of fire from his sub-machine-gun opened up a path for the army.
他用机关枪不停地扫射，掩护自己的战友。
Tā yòng jīguānqiāng bùtíng de sǎoshè，yǎnhù zìjǐ de zhànyǒu。
He kept on shooting with his machine gun, covering his battle companions.
中枪的野猪挣扎了一会后就僵卧在地上，一动不动了。
Zhòngqiāng de yězhū zhēngzā le yíhuì hòu jiù jiāngwòzàidìshàng，yídòng búdòng le。
The wild boar lay stiff and rigid after being shot.
这名狙击手的枪法很准，没人能逃过他的狙击。
Zhè míng jūjīshǒu de qiāngfǎ hěnzhǔn，méirén néng táoguò tā de jūjī。
The sniper shoots so exactly that no one can escape his shots.
他的快枪是从敌人那里缴获的。
Tā de kuàiqiāng shì cóng dírén nàlǐ jiǎohuò de。
His fast loading rifle was seized from an enemy.
《红岩》中的双枪老太婆令敌人们闻风丧胆。
《Hóngyán》zhōng de shuāngqiāng lǎotàipó lìng dírénmen wénfēngsàngdǎn。
The old women with two guns in &quot;Hongyan&quot; make enemies panic-stricken.
警察在他们的老窝中发现了十几支手枪和几百发子弹。
Jǐngchá zài tāmen de lǎowō zhōng fāxiàn le shí jǐ zhī shǒuqiāng hé jǐ bǎi fā zǐdàn。
The police found more than ten guns, and several hundred bullets in their nest.
这些吕制板，可以用铆钉枪固定在一起。
Zhèxiē lǚzhìbǎn，kěyǐ yòng mǎodīngqiāng gùdìng zài yìqǐ。
These aluminium boards can attached with rivets.
裁判鸣枪后，参加长跑的运动员们都跑了出去。
Cáipàn míngqiāng hòu，cānjiā chángpǎo de yùndòngyuánmen dōu pǎo le chūqù。
After the referee fired his gun, the long-distance running athletes began running.
水枪是孩子们爱玩儿的一种玩具喷射器。
Shuǐqiāng shì háizimen ài wánr de yìzhǒng wánjù pēnshèqì。
The water gun is a kind of spraying apparatus loved by children.
从匹马单枪到团队合作，他们的生意越做越好了。
Cóng pǐmǎ dānqiāng dào tuánduì hézuò，tāmen de shēngyì yuè zuò yuè hǎo le。
Going from individual work to teamwork, their business is getting better.
机智的警察在匪徒掏枪的瞬间将其扑倒，避免了伤亡。
Jīzhì de jǐngchá zài fěitú tāoqiāng de shùnjiān jiāng qí pūdǎo，bìmiǎn le shāngwáng。
The wise policeman threw himself at the gangster and knocked him down just as he was pulling out the gun, avoiding injuries and deaths.
这家军用品商店经国家批准可出售骑枪。
Zhèjiā jūnyòngpǐn shāngdiàn jīng guójiā pīzhǔn kě chūshòu qíqiāng。
The military supplies store is approved by the government to sell cabin guns.
他真想亲手枪崩了那个十恶不赦的罪犯。
Tā zhēn xiǎng qīnshǒu qiāngbēng le nàge shíè bùshè de zuìfàn。
He really wants to shoot the heinous criminal himself.
放下你们手中的枪杆子，我们会申请对你们宽大处理的。
Fàngxià nǐmen shǒu zhōng de qiānggǎnzi，wǒmen huì shēnqǐng duì nǐmen kuāndà chǔlǐ de。
Put down your arms, and we will apply for lenient treatment for you.
他在舞台上耍了个枪花，赢得了观众长时间的掌声。
Tā zài wǔtái shàng shuǎ le gè qiānghuā，yíngdé le guānzhòng cháng shíjiān de zhǎngshēng。
He played with a short spear on stage, which won the audience\'s prolonged applause.
这个地方治安很乱，时常发生枪击事件。
Zhège dìfāng zhì\'ān hěnluàn，shícháng fāshēng qiāngjī shìjiàn。
Public order is poor in this area, there are shooting incidents every so often.
第三届枪术比赛正式结束。
Dìsān jiè qiāngshù bǐsài zhèngshì jiéshù。
The third shooting competition has formally come to a conclusion.
枪战进行了一天一夜，双方都损失惨重。
Qiāngzhàn jìnxíng le yìtiān yí yè，shuāngfāng dōu sǔnshī cǎnzhòng。
The gunfight endured all day long, both sides suffering heavy loss.
昨天警察局门口竟发生了一起枪战。
Zuótiān jǐngchájú ménkǒu jìng fāshēng le yì qǐ qiāngzhàn。
There was a gun battle in front of the doorway of the police station yesterday.
这次战斗中，轻机枪是士兵们主要的作战武器。
Zhècì zhàndòu zhōng，qīngjīqiāng shì shìbīngmen zhǔyào de zuòzhàn wǔqì。
In battle, light machine guns are soldiers\' main weapon.
战士们正在射击场上苦练枪法。
Zhànshìmen zhèngzài shèjīchǎng shàng kǔliàn qiāngfǎ。
The soldiers are diligently practicing their marksmanship.
他用麻醉枪把麻醉药剂射入了发疯的大象的体内。
Tā yòng mázuìqiāng bǎ mázuì yàojì shèrù le fāfēng de dà xiàng de tǐnèi。
He used an anesthetic rifle to inject the drug into the body of the mad elephant.
我们从这个犯罪团伙的老窝，搜缴了大量的枪支和毒品。
Wǒmen cóng zhège fànzuì tuánhuǒ de lǎowō，sōujiǎo le dàliàng de qiāngzhī hé dúpǐn。
We captured a lot of guns and drugs in this criminal band\'s headquarters.
现在的军事武器不知要比旧式抬枪的威力大多少倍。

Military weapons today are far more powerful than the jingalls of old times.
武工队员们腰间都别着一支匣子枪。

The members of the military team have a Mauser pistol attached to their waist.
信号枪响了，咱们该发动进攻了。

The signal pistol has been fired. It\'s time to launch our attack.
他的枪法真准，一个移动靶都没有漏射。
Tā de qiāngfǎ zhēn zhǔn，yígè yídòngbǎ dōu méiyǒu lòushè。
He is good with a gun, he doesn\'t miss any moving target.
你的车是银样鄾枪头，中看不中用。
Nǐ de chē shì yínyàngyōu qiāngtóu，zhōng kàn bù zhōng yòng。
Your car is good-looking but useless.
红缨枪的缨络垂了下来，挡住了她的视线。
Hóngyīngqiāng de yīngluò chuí le xiàlái，dǎngzhù le tā de shìxiàn。
The tassels dropped and blocked her sight.
他用鸟枪瞄准了一只正在啄食的小鸟。
Tā yòng niǎoqiāng miáozhǔn le yìzhī zhèngzài zhuóshí de xiǎoniǎo。
He pointed an air gun at a bird pecking at its food.
歹徒手持自动步枪绑架人质，被公安干警拿下。

The bandit who kidnapped the hostage with an automatic rifle was seized by police.
看到前方发生警匪枪战，他赶快走避躲藏。

Seeing the gun fight between the police and the bandits, he immediately ran away and hid.
连长在冲锋枪的掩护下冲到了敌人的碉堡下面。

装上消声器的手枪只会发出很小的声音。

Guns with silencers only make a little noise.

Muskets were not very accurate weapons, since the barrels were not rifled to make the musket ball spin.
Bùqiāng bìng búshì hěn jīngquè de wǔqì，yīnwèi qiāngguǎn méiyǒu kè chūlái fùxiàn yǐ shǐ bùqiāngqiú xuánzhuǎn。

他用枪指着她的头说：“再动我就开枪了！”

The police claimed the police car at the shooting scene had bullet holes from shots fired by the accused.

the shot which you heard/which killed him

The soldier told me where the firing mechanism of a rifle was.
那个士兵告诉了我步枪开枪装置的位置。

This old and rusty rifle is a dead shot.

正是这只老旧的来福枪命中了那致命的一枪。
I drew my gun from the holster.
Wǒ cóng shǒuqiāngtào qǔchū shǒuqiāng。
我从手枪套取出手枪。
My first gun was a bolt-action rifle that my grandfather bought me for my fourteenth birthday.
Wǒ yōngyǒu de dì-yī zhī qiāng shì yéye zài wǒ shísìsuì shēngrì shí wèi wǒ mǎi de yì zhī bànzìdòng shuānshì láifùbùqiāng。
我拥有的第一支枪是爷爷在我十四岁生日时为我买的一支半自动闩式来复步枪。
I saw them actually fighting with real swords, not the fakes ones like on television.
Wǒ kàndào tāmen zhēndāozhēnqiāng de dǎ qǐlái le，érbúshì xiàng diànshì shàngyǎn de nàzhǒng jiǎdāojiǎqiāng。

open fire

fire away
【口语】开始(讲话或提问)(常用于祈使句)；继续开枪(或发炮)
to instruct a sentry to shoot
命令卫兵开枪
shoot if you must
需要的话，(你)可以开枪

猎人瞄准天空中飞翔的小鸟后，开枪了。

（朝某人/某物）开枪

理论上的错误必然导致实践上的失败。
Lǐlùn shàng de cuòwù bìrán dǎozhì shíjiàn shàng de shībài。
Errors in theory inevitably result in failures in practice.
不要因失败而灰心，也不要因成功而骄傲。
Búyào yīn shībài ér huīxīn，yě búyào yīn chénggōng ér jiāo\'ào。
Don\'t be discouraged by failure or get dizzy with success.
敌人对于他们的失败是不会甘心的。
Dírén duìyú tāmen de shībài shì búhuì gānxīn de。
The enemy will not resign themselves to defeat.
以失败告终
yǐ shībài gàozhōng
end in failure
成功不骄傲，失败不灰心。
Chénɡɡōnɡ bù jiāo\'ào, shībài bù huīxīn。 
When you succeed don\'t get conceited; when you fail don\'t be dejected.
进场失败
jìnchǎngshībài
missed approach
失败乃成功之母。
Shībài nǎi chénɡɡōnɡ zhī mǔ。
Failure is the mother of success.
万一失败，那就“宁为玉碎，不为瓦全”。
Wànyī shībài，nà jiù“nìngwèiyùsuì，búwèiwǎquán”。
In the event that we fail we\'d rather fall to pieces like broken jade than remain intact as a worthless tile.
失败并没有使他气短。
Shībài bìngméiyǒu shǐ tā qìduǎn。
He was not discouraged by failure.
他们试验失败对我们是个前车之鉴。
Tāmen shìyàn shībài duì wǒmen shì gè qiánchēzhījiàn。
The failure of their experiment should be a warning to us.
我失败了，然而还要试试。
Wǒ shībài le，rán\'ér háiyào shìshi。
I have failed, yet I shall try again.
遭到了可耻的失败
zāodào le kěchǐ de shībài
meet with ignominious defeat
这项试验失败了不止一次。
Zhè xiàng shìyàn shībài le bùzhǐ yícì。
The experiment has failed more than once.
不以失败自馁，不以成功自满
Bù yǐ shībài zìněi, bù yǐ chénɡɡōnɡ zìmǎn。 
not lose heart because of failure nor feel conceited because of success
遭到失败
zāodào shībài
suffer (or meet with) defeat
招致失败
zhāozhì shībài 
cause defeat
注定要失败
zhùdìngyào shībài 
be doomed to failure
不要害怕失败，鼓起精神，准备再试锋镝。
Búyào hàipà shībài，gǔqǐ jīngshén，zhǔnbèi zàishì fēngdī。
Never lose heart, put yourself together and try again!
因为比赛失败，队员们都灰头土脸的。
Yīnwéi bǐsài shībài，duìyuánmen dōu huītóu tǔliǎn de。
All the players were depressed, because they lost the game.
这次任务他格外卖力，想将功折罪以弥补上次的失败。

This time he is going to do his utmost to make amends for the failure last time.
虽然这次创业失败了，但是我绝不认头！
Suīrán zhècì chuàngyè shībài le，dànshì wǒ juébú rèntóu！
Although I failed to start my own business this time, I will never resign myself to failure
疏略细节是你失败的主要原因。
Shūlüè xìjié shì nǐ shībài de zhǔyào yuányīn。
The main reason for your failure is your neglect of details.
统观全局自然能总结出这个事情失败的原因。
Tǒngguān quánjú zìrán néng zǒngjié chū zhège shìqing shībài de yuányīn。
A general review of the situation can lead us to the reason for this failure.
由于你没能在限时完成任务，挑战失败。
Yóuyú nǐ méinéng zài xiànshí wánchéng rènwù，tiǎozhàn shībài。
Since you didn\'t finish your task within the time limit, you failed.
炒股失败，他阳狂躲债。
Chǎogǔ shībài,tā yángkuáng duǒzhai.
He failed in stock speculation, and feigned madness to escape a debt.

大家都认为他会失败，与此相反，他却成功了。

As the detachment leaked the information, the surprise attack failed.

muster the remnants of the army, intending to stage a comeback

大败敌军
dà bài díjūn 
inflict a crushing defeat on the enemy
理论上的错误必然导致实践上的失败。
Lǐlùn shàng de cuòwù bìrán dǎozhì shíjiàn shàng de shībài。
Errors in theory inevitably result in failures in practice.
不要因失败而灰心，也不要因成功而骄傲。
Búyào yīn shībài ér huīxīn，yě búyào yīn chénggōng ér jiāo\'ào。
Don\'t be discouraged by failure or get dizzy with success.
腐败的食物
fǔbài de shíwù
putrid food

腐败无能
fǔbài wúnéng
corrupt and incompetent
消除腐败现象
xiāochú fǔbài xiànxiàng
put an end to corrupt dealings
政治腐败
zhèngzhì fǔbài
political corruption
敌人对于他们的失败是不会甘心的。
Dírén duìyú tāmen de shībài shì búhuì gānxīn de。
The enemy will not resign themselves to defeat.
以失败告终
yǐ shībài gàozhōng
end in failure
成败的可能性各半。
Chéngbài de kěnéngxìng gèbàn。
The chances of success are fifty-fifty.
几个战胜国无情地瓜分了这个战败国，各自攫取了同样大小的一片土地。
Jǐ gè zhànshèngguó wúqíng de guāfēn le zhège zhànbàiguó，gè zì juéqǔ le tóngyàngdàxiǎo de yípiàn tǔdì。
The victors mercilessly carved up the defeated country, each taking an equal share.
成功不骄傲，失败不灰心。
Chénɡɡōnɡ bù jiāo\'ào, shībài bù huīxīn。 
When you succeed don\'t get conceited; when you fail don\'t be dejected.
一小撮祸国殃民的民族败类
yìxiǎocuō huòguóyāngmín de mínzú bàilèi 
dregs of the nation who wreck the country and ruin the people
他以三比一击败了对手。
Tā yǐ sān bǐ yī jībài le duìshǒu。
He beat his opponent 3 to 1.
极端腐败
jíduān fǔbài 
rotten to the core
节节败退
jiéjié bàituì 
retreat in defeat again and again; keep on retreating
进场失败
jìnchǎngshībài
missed approach
不论时局发展的情况如何，我们均须作持久打算，才能立于不败之地。
Búlùn shíjú fāzhǎn de qíngkuàngrúhé，wǒmen jūn xū zuò chíjiǔ dǎsuàn，cáinéng lìyú búbàizhīdì。
No matter how the situation develops, we must always calculate on a long-term basis, if our position is to be invincible.
失败乃成功之母。
Shībài nǎi chénɡɡōnɡ zhī mǔ。
Failure is the mother of success.
万一失败，那就“宁为玉碎，不为瓦全”。
Wànyī shībài，nà jiù“nìngwèiyùsuì，búwèiwǎquán”。
In the event that we fail we\'d rather fall to pieces like broken jade than remain intact as a worthless tile.
我们大家齐心协力，一定能打败他们！
Wǒmen dàjiā qíxīnxiélì，yídìngnéngdǎbài tāmen！
If we all pull together, there\'s no doubt we can beat them!
失败并没有使他气短。
Shībài bìngméiyǒu shǐ tā qìduǎn。
He was not discouraged by failure.
他气急败坏地跑回来把发生的事情告诉我们。
Tā qìjíbàihuài de pǎo huílái bǎ fāshēng de shìqinggàosu wǒmen。
He ran back, panting and dismayed, to tell us what had happened.
排球队以不可阻挡的气势，直落三局击败对手。
Páiqiúduì yǐ bùkě zǔdǎng de qìshì，zhí luò sān jú jībài duìshǒu。
The volleyball team overwhelmed their opponent in three straight games.
他们试验失败对我们是个前车之鉴。
Tāmen shìyàn shībài duì wǒmen shì gè qiánchēzhījiàn。
The failure of their experiment should be a warning to us.
我们轻而易举地就把对手打败了。
Wǒmen qīng\'éryìjǔ de jiù bǎ duìshǒu dǎbài le。
We beat our opponents hands down.
轻松地打败对手
qīngsōng de dǎbài duìshǒu
beat one\'s opponent with ease
这种药的主要缺点是败胃。
Zhèzhǒng yào de zhǔyào quēdiǎn shì bàiwèi。
The chief drawback of this medicine is that it spoils your appetite.
我失败了，然而还要试试。
Wǒ shībài le，rán\'ér háiyào shìshi。
I have failed, yet I shall try again.
日见衰败
rìjiàn shuāibài
decline day by day
敌人这一仗打败了，但决不会善罢甘休的。
Dírén zhè yí zhàngdǎbài le，dàn jué bú huì shànbàgānxiū de。
The enemy will not take their defeat lying down.
身败名裂，遗臭万年
Shēnbàimíngliè，yíchòuwànnián
bring ruin and eternal shame on oneself
遭到了可耻的失败
zāodào le kěchǐ de shībài
meet with ignominious defeat
这项试验失败了不止一次。
Zhè xiàng shìyàn shībài le bùzhǐ yícì。
The experiment has failed more than once.
他们失败多次，但是并没有完全失望。
Tāmen shībài duō cì，dànshì bìng méiyǒu wánquán shīwàng。
They failed time and again, but they never gave up hope.
我曾两次败在她手下。
Wǒ céng liǎng cì bài zài tā shǒuxià。
I have been defeated by her twice.
衰草败叶
shuāicǎo bàiyè
withering grass and fallen leaves
腐败透顶
fǔbài tòudǐnɡ 
thoroughly corrupt; rotten to the core; decadent in the extreme
挽回败局
wǎnhuí bàijú 
retrieve a defeat
妄想挽回败局
wànɡxiǎnɡ wǎnhuí bàijú 
in a vain attempt to retrieve the defeat
官僚主义是贿赂和腐败的温床。
Guānliáozhǔyì shì huìlù hé fǔbài de wēnchuáng。
Bureaucracy is a hotbed of bribery and corruption.
教练无能，该队屡遭败绩。
Jiàoliàn wúnéng，gāi duì lǚ zāo bàijì。
The coach was incompetent and the team suffered repeated defeats.
成败系于此举
chéngbài xì yú cǐjǔ
stand or fall by this
我们有准备，决不会一败涂地。
Wǒmen yǒu zhǔnbèi，jué bú huì yíbàitúdì。
We just can\'t possibly fail completely, after all the preparations we\'ve made.
他们去年赢了我们，这回我们以二比一击败他们，报了一箭之仇。
Tāmen qùnián yíng le wǒmen，zhè huí wǒmen yǐ èr bǐ yī jībài tāmen，bào le yíjiànzhīchóu。
Last year they defeated us, but now we have got even with them by beating them 2∶1.
不以失败自馁，不以成功自满
Bù yǐ shībài zìněi, bù yǐ chénɡɡōnɡ zìmǎn。 
not lose heart because of failure nor feel conceited because of success
主队败于客队。
Zhǔduì bàiyú kèduì。 
The home team was defeated by the visiting team.
遭到失败
zāodào shībài
suffer (or meet with) defeat
诈败
zhàbài
feign defeat
敌军战败了。
Díjūn zhànbài le。
The enemy troops were defeated.
招致失败
zhāozhì shībài 
cause defeat
战败被执
zhànbài bèi zhí 
be captured after being defeated in battle
注定要失败
zhùdìngyào shībài 
be doomed to failure
转败为胜
zhuǎn bài wéi shèng
turn defeat into victory
击败
jībài
defeat; beat; vanquish
成败
chéngbài
success or failure
乘兴而来，败兴而归
Chéngxìng\'érlái，bàixìng\'érguī
set out cheerfully and come back disappointed
不败之地
búbàizhīdì
invincible position
反败为胜
fǎnbàiwéishèng
turn defeat into victory; turn the tide
成败之机，其在斯乎？
Chéngbàizhījī，qízàisīhū?
Does not success or failure hinge on this?
那边的树下有一片败草。
Nàbiān de shù xià yǒu yípiàn bàicǎo。
The grass is withered under the tree there.
我上火了，医生说吃这药可以败毒清热。
Wǒ shànghuǒ le，yīshēng shuō chī zhè yào kěyǐ bàidú qīngrè。
I\'m running a fever. The doctor says that this medicine is a great antidote for the fever.
他手下只有一些残兵败将。
Tā shǒu xià zhǐyǒu yìxiē cánbīng bàijiāng。
He leads a defeated army.
商场上没有永远的败将，也没有常胜将军。
Shāngchǎng shàng méiyǒu yǒngyuǎn de bàijiàng，yě méiyǒu chángshèng jiāngjūn。
There are no permanent losers in the business world, neither are there permanent winners.
他是生意上的败军之帅，可他并不灰心。
Tā shì shēngyì shàng de bàijūn zhī shuài，kě tā bìng bùhuīxīn。
Though he has failed a lot in business, he is not dejected.
他棋艺不高，败象纷生。
Tā qíyì bùgāo，bàixiàng fēngshēng.
He is not a good chess player. It seems to me that this time, he is destined to lose.
她舍不得扔掉那些已经败谢的玫瑰。
Tā shěbùdé rēngdiào nàxiē yǐjing bàixiè de méiguī。
She is unwilling to throw away those withered roses.
金玉其外，败絮其中。
Jīnyù qíwài，bàixù qí zhōng。
Fair on the outside, but foul on the inside.
《召南·甘棠》曰：““蔽芾甘棠，勿翦勿伐，召伯所茇。 蔽芾甘棠，勿翦勿败，召伯所憩。 蔽芾甘棠，勿翦勿拜，召伯所说。”
《Zhàonán·gāntáng》yuē：“bìfèi gāntáng,wùjiǎn wùfá,zhàobó suǒbá.bìfèi gāntáng,wùjiǎn wùbài,zhàobó suǒqì.bìfèi gāntáng,wùjiǎn wùbài,zhàobó suǒshuō.”
A poem in The Book of Odes goes like this: &quot;Do not cut the birchleaf pear tree, for Zhao Gong once rested under it.&quot;
战争结束后，原本繁华的城市已是花草残败，一片萧条。
Zhànzhēng jiéshù hòu，yuánběn fánhuá de chéngshì yǐ shì huācǎo cánbài，yí piàn xiāotiáo。
After the war, the cities were in ruins.
他这人成事不足败事有余，不能依靠。
Tā zhè rén chéngshì bùzú bàishì yǒuyú，bùnéng yīkào。
He can never make but always break, you can\'t count on him.
由于武器装备太落后了，我们这次吃败仗了。
Yóuyú wǔqì zhuāngbèi tài luòhòu le，wǒmen zhècì chī bàizhàng le。
We were defeated this time because our weapons are outdated.
丑行败露后，她畏罪自杀了。
Chǒuxíng bàilù hòu，tā wèizuì zìshā le。
When the scandal was disclosed, she committed suicide dreading her punishment.
他们付出了很大的努力，但终因方法欠妥功败垂成。
Tāmen fùchū le hěndà de nǔlì，dàn zhōng yīn fāngfǎ qiàntuǒ gōngbài chuíchéng。
Although they tried very hard, they failed on the verge of success because of improper approach.
最近遭遇三连败，球队的士气大受挫损。
Zuìjìn zāoyù sānliánbài，qiúduì de shìqì dàshòu cuòsǔn。
Recently, with three defeats in succession, the morale of the team has fallen greatly.
这份家业迟早要凋败在那几个好吃懒做的儿子手里。
Zhè fèn jiāyè chízǎo yào diāobài zài nà jǐgè hàochī lǎnzuò de érzi shǒulǐ。
The family property will be exhausted by those parasitic sons before long.
不要害怕失败，鼓起精神，准备再试锋镝。
Búyào hàipà shībài，gǔqǐ jīngshén，zhǔnbèi zàishì fēngdī。
Never lose heart, put yourself together and try again!
这一高着扭转了败局。
Zhè yì gāozhāo niǔzhuǎn le bàijú。
The clever move reversed the defeat.
昨晚的比赛，我们队告败。
Zuówǎn de bǐsài，wǒmenduì gàobài。
Our team lost the match last night.
反腐败斗争关系国本，一定要长抓不懈。
Fǎnfǔbài dòuzhēng guānxì guóběn，yídìng yào chángzhuā búxiè。
We should persevere with the fight against corruption, one of the fundamental principles for governing a country.
教育事业的成败关乎国脉的盛衰。
Jiàoyù shìyè de chéngbài guānhū guómài de shèngshuāi。
Education is the lifeblood of the country.
因为比赛失败，队员们都灰头土脸的。
Yīnwéi bǐsài shībài，duìyuánmen dōu huītóu tǔliǎn de。
All the players were depressed, because they lost the game.
这次任务他格外卖力，想将功折罪以弥补上次的失败。
Zhècì rènwù tā géwài màilì，xiǎng jiānggōng zhézuì yǐ míbǔ shàngcì de shībài。
This time he is going to do his utmost to make amends for the failure last time.
战胜国要求战败国向其进奉贡品。
Zhànshèngguó yāoqiú zhànbàiguó xiàng qí jìnfèng gòngpǐn。
The victorious nations are demanding tribute from their former enemies.
腐败的晚清政府没有能力光复旧物。
Fǔbài de wǎnqīng zhèngfǔ méiyǒu nénglì guāngfù jiùwù。
The corrupt late Qing government was not able to recover lost territories.
看到他们家衰败的样子，他不禁喟然长叹命运的无常。
Kàndào tāmen jiā shuāibài de yàngzi，tā bùjīn kuìrán chángtàn mìngyùn de wúcháng。
Thinking of his declining family, he heaves a deep sigh over the fleetness of fate.
我们只有不断地完善自己，不断地向高峰攀登，才能立于不败之地。
Wǒmen zhǐyǒu búduàn de wánshàn zìjǐ，búduàn de xiàng gāofēng pāndēng，cáinéng lìyú búbài zhī dì。
Only when we improve ourselves constantly, and scale heights ceaselessly can we remain invincible.
令郎的武艺我是领教过的，在下甘败下风。
Lìngláng de wǔyì wǒ shì lǐngjiào guò de，zàixià gānbài xiàfēng。
I’ve encountered your son’s martial arts skills, and I sincerely acknowledge his superiority.
在军事演习中，蓝军企图摸营，被红军挫败。
Zài jūnshì yǎnxí zhōng，lánjūn qǐtú mōyíng，bèi hóngjūn cuòbài。
In the military maneuver, the blue army attempted to attack the red army’s sentinels in the dark, but was defeated.
女真部落打败了明朝，建立了清朝。
Nǚzhēn bùluò dǎbài le Míngcháo，jiànlì le Qīngcháo。
The Nüzhen tribe defeated the Ming dynasty and founded the Qing dynasty.
虽然这次创业失败了，但是我绝不认头！
Suīrán zhècì chuàngyè shībài le，dànshì wǒ juébú rèntóu！
Although I failed to start my own business this time, I will never resign myself to failure
他没有抓住最好的胜机，结果被对手反败为胜了。
Tā méiyǒu zhuāzhù zuìhǎo de shèngjī，jiéguǒ bèi duìshǒu fǎnbài wéishèng le。
He didn\'t take the best winning chances, and was beaten by his opponent instead.
他眼看着自己手创的家业被儿子败光，心里无限悲哀。
Tā yǎnkàn zhe zìjǐ shǒuchuàng de jiāyè bèi érzi bàiguāng，xīnlǐ wúxiàn bēiāi。
He felt very aggrieved on seeing his son squandering all the family property he had earned himself, cent by cent.
疏略细节是你失败的主要原因。
Shūlüè xìjié shì nǐ shībài de zhǔyào yuányīn。
The main reason for your failure is your neglect of details.
这些鱼肉酸败了，发出很难闻的气味。
Zhèxiē yúròu suānbài le，fāchū hěnnánwén de qìwèi。
The fish has gone bad, and smells terrible.
统观全局自然能总结出这个事情失败的原因。
Tǒngguān quánjú zìrán néng zǒngjié chū zhège shìqing shībài de yuányīn。
A general review of the situation can lead us to the reason for this failure.
佞臣当道，致使国势颓败。
Nìngchén dāngdào，zhìshǐ guóshì tuíbài。
Because crafty and fawning officials are in charge of the imperial government, the country is becoming more and more decadent.
在村里举行这种活动简直就是颓风败俗。
Zài cūn lǐ jǔxíng zhèzhǒng huódòng jiǎnzhí jiùshì tuífēng bàisú。
Holding such an activity in the village is indeed corrupting to public morals.
这个弱小的国家最终打败了外军的入侵。
Zhège ruòxiǎo de guójiā zuì zhōng dǎbài le wàijūn de rùqīn。
This small country successfully defended against the invasion of foreign troops in the end.
我们公司的足球队又一次客场以0：2完败。
Wǒmen gōngsī de zúqiúduì yòu yícì kèchǎng yǐ líng bǐ èr wánbài。
Our company\'s team was defeated 0 to 2 away.
四场比赛后甲队以一分之差惜败。
Sì chǎng bǐsài hòu jiǎduì yǐ yìfēn zhī chā xībài。
After four games, the first team lost by only one point.
由于你没能在限时完成任务，挑战失败。
Yóuyú nǐ méinéng zài xiànshí wánchéng rènwù，tiǎozhàn shībài。
Since you didn\'t finish your task within the time limit, you failed.
又打败一名骁悍战将，老将军十分高兴。
Yòu dǎbài yìmíng xiāohàn zhànjiàng，lǎojiāngjūn shífēn gāoxīng。
The old general is very happy to beat another brave general.
这支球队以不败的战绩雄居积分榜首。
Zhèzhī qiúduì yǐ búbài de zhànjì xióngjū jīfēn bǎngshǒu。
This team ranks first on the tally with an undefeated record.
纪检机关要严查干部腐败的问题，不能讲私情。
Jìjiǎn jīguān yào yánchá gànbùfǔbài de wèntí，bùnéng jiǎng sīqíng。
The committee for discipline investigation should be tough with corrupt officials and allows no personal relations to be involved in the investigations.
炒股失败，他阳狂躲债。
Chǎogǔ shībài,tā yángkuáng duǒzhai.
He failed in stock speculation, and feigned madness to escape a debt.
他佯败，其实是在积极准备反击。
Tā yángbài，qíshí shì zài jījí zhǔnbèi fǎnjī。
He pretend to be defeated; actually, he is actively preparing for a counterattack.
国民党军队依凭长江险要，积极反抗，还是失败了。
Guómíndǎng jūnduì yīpíng Cháng Jiāng xiǎnyào，jījí fǎnkàng，háishi shībài le。
Depending on the Changjiang River, the Kuomintang armies fought actively against their enemies, but they were still defeated.
我们要在实践中不断总结前人失败的殷鉴。
Wǒmen yào zài shíjiàn zhōng búduàn zǒngjié qiánrén shībài de yīnjiàn。
In practice, we need to continually summarize our predecessors\' historical failures.
清朝末期官员营私舞弊，政治十分腐败。
Qīngcháo mòqī guānyuán yíngsī wǔbì，zhèngzhì shífēn fǔbài。
The corrupt officers during the last phase of the Qing Dynasty were engaged in fraud for selfish ends.
你们二虎相争，两败俱伤，不是让别人坐收渔人之利吗？
Nǐmen èr hǔ xiāngzhēng，liǎngbài jùshāng，búshì ràng biérén zuòshōu yúrén zhī lì ma？
You two fight until both are weakened; isn\'t this letting a third party reap the profit?
大家都认为他会失败，与此相反，他却成功了。
Dàjiā dōu rènwéi tā huì shībài，yǔcǐ xiāngfǎn，tā què chénggōng le。
Everybody thought he would fail, but he suceeded.
战败后，他自戕于这座桥上。
Zhànbài hòu，tā zìqiāng yú zhèzuò qiáoshàng。
After losing the battle, he committed suicide on this bridge.
由于小分队走露了风声，这次突袭失败了。
Yóuyú xiǎofēnduì zǒulù le fēngshēng，zhècì tūxí shībài le。
As the detachment leaked the information, the surprise attack failed.
阻力点的选择很重要，这决定了实验的成败。
Zǔlìdiǎn de xuǎnzé hěn zhòngyào，zhè juédìng le shíyàn de chéngbài。
Choosing the resistance point is very important; it decides whether this experiment can be sucessful.
只要总结好经验教训，败亡之后还可重生。

As long as you learn from your failures, you always have the chance to succeed.

具有讽刺意味的是，精心设计的计划如此彻底地失败了。

我们将击败他们！

据报载，今年反腐斗争将有新举措。
没有历史记载的荒古年代。
他今天去购物了，满载而归。
Tā jīntiān qù gòuwù le，mǎnzǎi ér guī。
He went shopping today and returned fully loaded.
他带着今天的猎物满载而归。
Tā dài zhe jīntiān de lièwù mǎnzǎi ér guī。
He came back with fruitful results, carrying the game he had hunted today.

mǎnzài chīshuǐ

The newspaper carried a few articles about laser technology.

详细地记载事情经过
xiángxì de jìzǎi shìqingjīngguò 
record the incident in detail
有文字记载的历史
yǒu wénzì jìzǎi de lìshǐ 
recorded history
地方志中有关于这次旱灾的记载。
dìfāngzhì zhōng yǒu guānyú zhècì hànzāi de jìzǎi。
There is an account of this drought in the local chronicles.
这个国家有将近四千年有记载的历史。
Zhège guójiā yǒu jiāngjìn sìqiān nián yǒu jìzǎi de lìshǐ。
This country has nearly 4,000 years of recorded history.
据史书记载
jù shǐshū jìzǎi
according to historical records
详尽的记载
xiángjìn de jìzǎi
a detailed record
书上记载：此地拔海350米。
Shūshàng jìzǎi：cǐdì báhǎi sānbǎiwǔshí mǐ。
According to the book, this place is 350 meters above the sea level.
这本书记载了当时北曲演员的艺术活动。
Zhèběnshū jìzǎi le dāngshí běiqǔ yǎnyuán de yìshù huódòng。
The book describes the artistic life of  Beiqu (operas popular in the North of China) actors at that time.
这本书里记载了关于扶桑的传说。
Zhèběnshū lǐ jìzǎi le guānyú Fúsāng de chuánshuō。
This book includes many stories about the legends of the huge mulberry tree beyond the seas from which the sun rises.
历史学家在对福音书里记载的历史事件进行考证。
Lìshǐxuéjiā zài duì fúyīnshū lǐ jìzǎi de lìshǐ shìjiàn jìnxíng kǎozhèng。
Historians are researching the historic events recorded in the Gospel.
这部史书记载了汉朝一些公卿大臣的生平。
Zhèbù shǐshū jìzǎi le Hàncháo yìxiē gōngqīng dàchén de shēngpíng。
This historical book records the lives of some officials in the Han Dynasty.
古代数学书籍中有很多关于勾股形的记载。
Gǔdài shùxué shūjí zhōng yǒu hěnduō guānyú gōugǔxíng de jìzǎi。
There are many records on right-angle triangles in ancient mathematics books.
他的花名叫张永，这是记载在花名册上的。
Tā de huāmíng jiào Zhāng Yǒng，zhè shì jìzǎi zài huāmíngcè shàng de。
His name is Zhong Yong, which is recorded on the registration book.
这部会要详细记载了唐代的历史。
Zhèbù huìyào xiángxì jìzǎi le Tángdài de lìshǐ。
This compilation of state regulations gives us a detailed description of the Tang history.
这本警籍记载着整个公安局警务人员的信息。
Zhèběn jǐngjí jìzǎi zhe zhěnggè gōng\'ānjú jǐngwù rényuán de xìnxī。
The police records include all the information of the staff of the Public Security Bureau.
据史料记载，长沙用麻石铺路始于清雍正年间，至清光绪元年左右就不再使用了。
Jù shǐliào jìzǎi，Chángshā yòng máshí pūlù shǐyú Qīng Yōngzhèng niánjiān，zhì Qīng Guāngxù yuánnián zuǒyòu jiù búzài shǐyòng le。
It is recorded in historical sources that Changsha paved road with chiseled stones from the Yongzheng reign to the Guangxu reign of the Qing dynasty.
《山海经》中记载了很多远古的神话传说。
《Shānhǎijīng》zhōng jìzǎi le hěnduō yuǎngǔ de shénhuàchuánshuō 。
Many ancient fables and tales are recorded in Shanhai Jing.
这件史事在史书中是有详细记载的。
Zhèjiàn shǐshì zài shǐshū zhōng shì yǒu xiángxì jìzǎi de。
This historical event is recorded in detail in historical books.
根据家谱的记载，我的先祖是清末一名举人。
Gēnjù jiāpǔ de jìzǎi，wǒ de xiānzǔ shì qīngmò yìmíng jǔrén。
According to my family record, my late grandfather was a second degree candidate in the provincial examination.
乙部是我国古代专门记载历史的部门。
Yǐbùshì wǒguó gǔdài zhuānmén jìzǎi lìshǐ de bùmén。
The history department specialized in recording history in ancient China.
这种稗官野史中记载的未必都是史实。
Zhèzhǒng bàiguān yěshǐ zhōng jìzǎi de wèibì dōushì shǐshí。
These are all anecdotes, but what they describe are not necessarily historical facts.
这本书上记载了许多海外奇谈，我拿起来就放不下了。
Zhèběnshū shàng jìzǎi le xǔduō hǎiwài qítán，wǒ ná qǐlái jiù fàng búxià le。
I am totally taken by the book where many tall tales are recorded.
这篇文章记载了当时的情况。
Zhè piān wénzhāng jìzǎile dāngshí de qíngkuàng.
This essay records the situation at that time.
请据实记载事情经过。
Qǐng jùshí jìzǎi shìqing jīngguò.
Please write down exactly what happened.
这个笔记本承载着我童年时的一段记忆。
Zhège bǐjìběn chéngzǎi zhe wǒ tóngnián shí de yíduàn jìyì。
This notebook carries my childhood memories.

zǎirù jìlù

When things here settle down a bit, I\'ll be writing about it in my journal.

unloading

Búyào ràng chē chāozài。

he clasped her to him
他紧紧地抱住她
Phillis gathered up the infant，Rab went through to the room.
Fēilìpǔsī bàojǐn yīnghái，Lābó cóng fángjiān chuānguò。
菲利普斯抱紧婴孩，拉伯从房间穿过。
He gathered up the puppet in his arms.
Tā bàojǐn le huáizhōng de wán\'ǒu。
他抱紧了怀中的玩偶。
She yelled out loud，then shouted again as strong fingers closed round her arms.
Tā dàjiàozhe，suíhòu yòu bàojǐn zìjǐ de shǒubì yāohe qǐlái。
她大叫着，随后又抱紧自己的手臂吆喝起来。
They were locked in embrace.
Tāmen jǐnjǐn de yōngbào zài yìqǐ。
他们紧紧地拥抱在一起。
She was holding onto that bag so tightly that I was sure it was going to burst.
她把那个包抱得那么紧，肯定一会儿就会把它挤破。
群山环抱的村庄
qúnshān huánbào de cūnzhuāng
a village nestling among the hills
面对日益变换的社会环境，我们不应该抱怨自己的时运不济，而是应该识时务，而后应时而动。
Miànduì rìyì biànhuàn de shèhuì huánjìng，wǒmen bùyīnggāi bàoyuàn zìjǐ de shíyùn bújì，ér shì yīnggāi shí shíwù，ér hòu yìngshí ér dòng。
Faced with the ever-changing society, we should rather make good judgment about current affairs and take corresponding actions than complain about bad luck.
层林环抱。
青山环抱着寺院。
环状水景和声控喷泉环抱着山石，显得恢宏典雅
两江环抱，雾霭萦绕。
环山抱水，风景秀丽。
That kid is always folding her arms around her mom\'s leg.
那个小女孩总喜欢双手环抱住妈妈的腿。
The city of Kyoto, the cultural capital of Japan, lies surrounded by hills.
Jīngdū，Rìběn de wénhuà zhōngxīn，wèiyú qúnshānhuánbào zhīzhōng。
京都，日本的文化中心，位于群山环抱之中。
His arm caught her，lashing around her waist and holding her still.
Tā jǐnjǐn bàozhù tā，shǒubì huán zhù tā de yāo láihuíbǎidòng。
他紧紧抱住她，手臂环住她的腰来回摆动。
We can complain about our circumstances, or try to make the best of a bad situation.
Wǒmen kěyǐ bàoyuàn wǒmen de huánjìng， huòzhě hǎohao lìyòng zuì huài de huánjìng。
我们可以抱怨我们的坏境，或者好好利用最坏的环境。

huáibào zhe yīng\'ér
carry a baby in one\'s arms

Tā bǎ háizi lǒu zài huáibào lǐ。
She held the child to her bosom.

huídào zǔguó de huáibào
return to the embrace of one\'s homeland

huáibào yuǎndà de lǐxiǎng

tóurù mǒurén de huáibào 
nestle in the arms of...

Lìlì zǒngshì zài shòudào shānghài shí xiǎngqǐ māma wēnrè de huáibào。
Lily misses the warm embrace of her mother whenever she feels hurt.

The girl held a cat in her arms.

Tā kěwàng huídào zǔguó de huáibào.

Tā bìxū zàicì huáibào xīwàng。

The little cottage nestles in the forest.
Zhè zuò xiǎo cūnshè tǎng zài shùlín de huáibào lǐ。
这座小村舍躺在树林的怀抱里。
The child tried to wriggle free from his aunt\'s embrace.

这孩子扭动着身体，试图从他姑姑的怀抱中挣脱出来。

他对妻子怀孕抱有希望。
He took the baby in his arm and smiled.
他把孩子抱在怀里，笑了。

Tā xiàng tā chōng guòqù，jiāng tā de tóu bàozài huáilǐ。

She held the baby in her arms.
Tā bǎ yīnger bàozài huáizhōng。
她把婴儿抱在怀中。

Tā bàojǐn le huáizhōng de wán\'ǒu。

使某人对某事抱有偏见/怀有好感
She is unassumingly skeptical of her own work.
Tā duì zìjǐ de gōngzuò bàozhe qiānxùn de huáiyí tàidù。

这棵参天古树，足以五人合抱。

The ancient towering tree is so thick that it takes fives people to put their arms around it.
合抱。
四人合抱的古槐。
It measures fifteen feet around the trunk.
树干合抱有15英尺。

Tā gēge xiàng tā qiúzhù de shíhou，tā shuāngbì hébào zài xiōngqián。

他是个爱打抱不平的人。

He was always ready to defend the weak and helpless.

Those with a hired-hand mentality will never do a good job.

bàoyǒu huànxiǎng
cherish illusions
抱有不同见解
bàoyǒu bútóng jiànjiě

Tā duì wǒ yìzhí bàoyǒu chénjiàn。
He is always prejudiced against me.

The father has great expectations for his son, hoping he can bring honor to their ancestors and prosperity to their descendants.
很有抱负
hěn yǒu bàofù
have high aspirations; cherish high ambitions
这棵树有一抱粗。
Zhè kē shù yǒu yí bào cū。
You can just get your arms around this tree trunk.
后面的抱厦上绘有精美的壁画。
Hòumiàn de bàoxià shàng huì yǒu jīngměi de bìhuà。
There is an exquisite fresco on that porch.
有一种人，抱着一技之长和一孔之见，再也没有进步。

没有理由抱怨
méiyǒu lǐyóu bàoyuàn

Nowadays, some young people treat their lives merely as games.

Lao Li used to complain a lot about seeing no future because of his age.
有些学生平时不努力，考前临时抱佛脚。

to cherish a hope
抱有希望
foster a hope
抱有希望
He gave up on looking good for the party and just went.
他对这个政党不再抱有希望，决然地离开了。

树干合抱有15英尺。
to hope against hope that...
抱有一线希望…
to be hopeful that...
对…抱有希望
surgeons are hopeful of saving her
外科医生对挽救她抱有希望
to have no illusions about sth
对某事不抱有幻想
to prejudice sb against/in favour of sth
使某人对某事抱有偏见/怀有好感
I never conceive prejudice against people who used to argue with me.
我从不对那些与我有过争论的人抱有成见。
New ideas will not enter your mind while you are holding your prejudice on this issue.
当你对这个问题抱有成见时，你就不会有新的主意。
His words prejudice his children against the poor people.
他的话使他的孩子对穷人抱有偏见。
With so much gossip, she has been prejudiced against her professor\'s teaching skill.
由于有这么多闲话，她一直对她教授的教学技能抱有成见。
He did not want them to follow him under any false delusions.
Tā bùxiǎng ràng tāmen bào yǒu rènhé cuòwù de wàngxiǎng qù zhuīsuí tā。
他不想让他们抱有任何错误的妄想去追随他。
A relative stressed that they were not building up their hopes.
Yí gè qīnqi qiángdiào， tāmen búzài bàoyǒu xīwàng。
一个亲戚强调，他们不再抱有希望。
Having despaired of getting her son to go shopping for her, Anna decided to go herself.
Duì érzi péi tā qù gòuwù yǐ bú zài bào yǒu rènhé xīwàng，Annà juédìng zìjǐ yí gè rén qù。
对儿子陪她去购物已不再抱有任何希望，安娜决定自己一个人去。
They still held out hope that he could win.
Tāmen yīrán duì qǔdé shènglì bàoyǒu xīwàng。
他们依然对取得胜利抱有希望。
They are holding out hope for a better job.
Tāmen duì hǎogōngzuò bàoyǒu xīwàng。
他们对好工作抱有希望。
I\'ve been hoping against hope you two would get together!
Wǒ yìzhí duì nǐmen kěnéng zǒudào yìqǐ bàoyǒu yí xiàn xīwàng。
我一直对你们可能走到一起抱有一线希望。
They hope against hope that all would come well.

这孩子扭动着身体，试图从他姑姑的怀抱中挣脱出来。
很有抱负
hěn yǒu bàofù
have high aspirations; cherish high ambitions
他是一个很有抱负的青年。
施展抱负
远大的抱负。
辜负了老师的期望，抱愧得很。
to achieve one\'s ambition
实现自己的抱负
As an aspiring thespian he worked at an ice-cream parlour before moving on to a series of minor roles in the theatre.
作为一个有抱负的演员，他在进入剧院出演一些小角色之前，曾经在一个冰激凌店工作。
the height of one\'s ambition
最大的抱负
The hard experiences in the early years reinforced his ambition of going ahead in business career.
他在早年的艰难经历坚定了他要在职业上出人头地的抱负。
His great ambition, however, is to write a travel book.
Rán\'ér，tā de yuǎndà bàofù shì yào xiě yì běn lǚyóu zhuànjì。
然而，他的远大抱负是要写一本旅游传记。
The failure was an unfortunate blow to his ambitions.
Zhècì shībài duì tā de bàofù shì yí gè chénzhòng de dǎjī。
这次失败对他的抱负是一个沉重的打击。
It was also important for any aspiring young gallant to give good parties.
Duìyú rènhé yǒu bàofù de niánqīngrén láishuō，jǔbàn hǎo de jùhuì tóngyàng zhòngyào。
对于任何有抱负的年轻人来说，举办好的聚会同样重要。
A career or vengeance so direful that London was shocked.
Zhèzhǒng bàofùxīn huò bàofùxīn rúcǐ kěpà，zhěnggè lúndūn dōu jīngdāi le。
这种抱负心或报复心如此可怕，整个伦敦都惊呆了。
有些学生平时不努力，考前临时抱佛脚。
Yǒuxiē xuésheng píngshí bùnǔlì，kǎoqián línshíbàofójiǎo。
Some students are lazy most of the time, and then try to cram just before the exams.
平时不用功学习，临考时抱佛脚，晚啦！
She stayed up late desperately cramming for the exam the next day.
Tā zuówǎn hěn wǎn dōu méi shuì，pīnmìng wèi dì-èr tiān de kǎoshì línshí bàofójiǎo。
她昨晚很晚都没睡，拼命为第二天的考试临时抱佛脚。
我已抱定决死的信念。
Wŏ yǐ bàodìng juésǐ de xìnniàn。
因为准备充分，赛前他就抱定了必胜的信心。
Yīnwéi zhǔnbèi chōngfèn，sài qián tā jiù bàodìng le bìshèng de xìnxīn。
Because of good preparation, he is fully confident before the match that he will win.
他做出了一个让自己抱恨终生的决定。
Tā zuòchū le yígè ràng zìjǐ bàohèn zhōng shēng de juédìng。
He has made a decision that he is going to regret for the rest of his life.
抱定必胜的决心。
Manufacturers complained that the new regulation would cause a rise in their costs.
Zhìzàoshāngmen bàoyuàn xīn guīdìng jiāng dǎozhì tāmen chéngběn shàngzhǎng。
制造商们抱怨新规定将导致他们成本上涨。
He complained sourly that the new rules only benefitted the managers.
Tā jiānkè de bàoyuàn shuō xīn guīdìng zhǐ duì guǎnlǐ rényuán yǒu hǎochù。
他尖刻地抱怨说新规定只对管理人员有好处。
She was holding onto that bag so tightly that I was sure it was going to burst.
她把那个包抱得那么紧，肯定一会儿就会把它挤破。
Having despaired of getting her son to go shopping for her, Anna decided to go herself.
Duì érzi péi tā qù gòuwù yǐ bú zài bào yǒu rènhé xīwàng，Annà juédìng zìjǐ yí gè rén qù。
对儿子陪她去购物已不再抱有任何希望，安娜决定自己一个人去。
The hard experiences in the early years reinforced his ambition of going ahead in business career.
他在早年的艰难经历坚定了他要在职业上出人头地的抱负。
有人替他抱不平。
Yǒu rén tì tā bào bùpíng。
Some felt indignant on his behalf.
他是个爱打抱不平的人。
Tā shì gè ài dǎbàobùpíng de rén。
He was always ready to defend the weak and helpless.
她抱怨不平等的待遇。
Tā bàoyuàn bùpíngděngde dàiyù。
She complained about the unfair treatment.
他仰望天空狂呼，抱怨命运的不公平！
Tā yǎngwàng tiānkōng kuánghū，bàoyuàn mìngyùn de bùgōngpíng！
Looking up at the sky, he shouts and complains about the  unfairness of fate.
有些学生平时不努力，考前临时抱佛脚。

Some students are lazy most of the time, and then try to cram just before the exams.
替受冤枉的人抱不平。
平时不用功学习，临考时抱佛脚，晚啦！
Complaints about corruption and social inequality are also rising.
duì fǔbài hé shèhuì bùpíngděng de bàoyuàn yě zài zēngduō。
对腐败和社会不平等的抱怨也在增多。
抱病工作
bàobìng gōngzuò 
go on working in spite of ill health
抱病。
抱病指挥战斗。
抱病理事。
He is still sick but no longer has a fever.
他仍抱病在身，但已经不发烧了。
Ruth is forever complaining about her husband\'s gambling problem.
路德总是抱怨他丈夫的赌博毛病。
几个老乡爱抱团儿，大家抱成团儿才有力量。
他做了错事不从自身找原因，却抱怨这个，抱怨那个。
几个老乡爱抱团儿，大家抱成团儿才有力量。
Come to my arms，my beamish boy!
Lái，ràng wǒ bàobào，guāi háizi！
来，让我抱抱，乖孩子！
The woman carried her tired child upstairs to his bedroom.
那个女人抱着筋疲力尽的孩子，把他抱到了楼上的卧室。
他抱着半信半疑的态度去试一试。
Tā bào zhe bànxìnbànyí de tàidu qù shìyishì。
Not quite convinced, he went to try it himself.
把小孩子抱起来
bǎ xiǎoháizi bàoqǐlái 
take a child in one\'s arms
不要抱住错误观点不放。
Búyào bàozhù cuòwù guāndiǎn búfàng。
Don\'t stick to your wrong views.
她快抱孙子了。
Tā kuài bào sūnzi le。

Tā de nǚ\'ér shì bào de。

bàochéng yì tuán

bú bào huànxiǎng

yí bào cǎo 
an armful of hay

母鸡抱窝了。
Mǔjī bàowō le。
The hen is sitting.

Búyào zǒngshì bàoyuàn biéren duì nǐ bāngzhù búgòu。

qúnfēng gǒngbào de shānwù
a cove surrounded by cliffs

huáibào zhe yīng\'ér
carry a baby in one\'s arms

bàoyǒu bútóng jiànjiě

Tāmen xiāngjiàn shí kuángxǐ de yōngbàoqǐlái。
When they met, they hugged each other in an ecstasy of delight.
拦腰抱住
lányāo bàozhù
seize sb. by the waist (or round the middle) from behind
没有理由抱怨
méiyǒu lǐyóu bàoyuàn 
have no grounds for complaint
小姑娘亲热地搂抱着小猫。
Xiǎo gūniangqīnrè de lǒubào zhe xiǎo māo。
The little girl cuddled her pet cat.
她总是埋怨自己不好，从不抱怨别人。

She always puts the blame on herself, and never on others.

Tā bǎ háizi bàoqǐlái。
He took the child up in his arms.
这孩子怯生，客人一抱他就哭。

The baby is shy with strangers and will cry whenever a guest holds him.
他给一位抱孩子的妇女让了座。

He eagerly offered his bus seat to a woman carrying a baby.
我对此不抱奢望。
Wǒ duì cǐ bú bào shēwànɡ。
I entertain no high hopes in this regard.

wànfēn bàoqiàn

The little girl cuddled her doll.
他虽然每日抱怨，也无可奈何了。
Tā suīrán měi rì bàoyuàn，yě wúkěnàihé le。
Grumble as he might, he had to put up with it.
她抱起琵琶，信手弹来，竟十分动听。
Tā bàoqǐ pípá，xìnshǒu tánlái，jìngshífēn dòngtīng。
She took up the pipa and began to play, effortlessly and melodiously.
有一种人，抱着一技之长和一孔之见，再也没有进步。

两国选手热烈拥抱，互致问候。

我已抱定决死的信念。
Wŏ yǐ bàodìng juésǐ de xìnniàn。
老李常抱怨：到这岁数儿，还有啥熬头儿啊！
Lǎo Lǐ cháng bàoyuàn：dào zhè suìshùr，háiyǒu shá áotóur a！
Lao Li used to complain a lot about seeing no future because of his age.
他不停地抱怨不好的天气。
Tā bùtíng de bàoyuàn bùhǎo de tiānqì。
He keeps complaining about the bad weather.
因为准备充分，赛前他就抱定了必胜的信心。

Because of good preparation, he is fully confident before the match that he will win.
他抱憾错过了这场精彩的比赛。
Tā bàohàn cuòguò le zhèchǎng jīngcǎi de bǐsài。
He regretted missing this wonderful match.
他做出了一个让自己抱恨终生的决定。
Tā zuòchū le yígè ràng zìjǐ bàohèn zhōng shēng de juédìng。
He has made a decision that he is going to regret for the rest of his life.
他冲我抱拳拱手。
Tā chòng wǒ bàoquán gǒngshǒu。
He congratulated me.
后面的抱厦上绘有精美的壁画。
Hòumiàn de bàoxià shàng huì yǒu jīngměi de bìhuà。
There is an exquisite fresco on that porch.
只要大家抱团儿，什么都难不倒我们。
Zhǐyào dàjiā bàotuánr，shénme dōu nánbùdǎo wǒmen。
As long as we make concerted efforts, nothing can beat us.
我真替他抱委屈。
Wǒ zhēn tì tā bào wěiqū。
I feel really bad that he has been wronged by others.
他含恨抱冤却无处可诉。
Tā hánhèn bàoyuān què wúchù kěsù。
Though he feels strongly aggrieved, he has nowhere to complain to.
这座亭子的柱上嵌刻着一副抱柱对儿。
Zhèzuò tíngzi de zhù shàng qiànkè zhe yífù bàozhùduìr。
On the pillar of this pavilion, there is an antithetical couplet.
他希望有机会抱罪立功。
Tā xīwàng yǒu jīhuì bàozuì lìgōng。
He hopes that there is a chance for him to do something to make up his wrong deeds.
他对我一直抱有陈见。
Tā duì wǒ yìzhí bàoyǒu chénjiàn。
He is always prejudiced against me.
实在抱歉，此事我还想动问一句。
Shízài bàoqiàn，cǐ shì wǒ hái xiǎng dòngwèn yí jù。
Excuse me, may I ask a question about this matter?
父亲对儿子抱有很大希望，一心盼着他光前裕后。
Fùqīn duì érzi bàoyǒu hěndà xīwàng，yìxīn pàn zhe tā guāngqián yùhòu。
The father has great expectations for his son, hoping he can bring honor to their ancestors and prosperity to their descendants.
她抱的希望过大，所以受的打击也大。
Tā bào de xīwàng guòdà，suǒyǐ shòu de dǎjī yě dà。
Her fervent hope resulted in a big blow.
这棵参天古树，足以五人合抱。
Zhè kē cāntiān gǔshù，zúyǐ wǔ rén hébào。
The ancient towering tree is so thick that it takes fives people to put their arms around it.
很多农村妇女都抱着嫁鸡随鸡的想法。
Hěnduō nóngcūn fùnǚ dōu bào zhe jiàjī suíjī de xiǎngfǎ。
In the countryside, many women take it for granted that they should follow their husband no matter what happens to him.
青年人当有家国之襟抱。
Qīngniánrén dāng yǒu jiāguó zhī jīnbào。
Young people should have great ambitions and open minds.
小明不住地抱怨：这么苛重的作业，怎么可能完成呢？
Xiǎo Míng búzhù de bàoyuàn：zhème kēzhòng de zuòyè，zěnme kěnéng wánchéng ne？
Xiaoming is continuously complaining: &quot;how can it be possible to finish so much homework?&quot;
他仰望天空狂呼，抱怨命运的不公平！
Tā yǎngwàng tiānkōng kuánghū，bàoyuàn mìngyùn de bùgōngpíng！
Looking up at the sky, he shouts and complains about the  unfairness of fate.
他太渴了，见到水壶就抱着一通狂饮。
Tā tài kě le，jiàndào shuǐhú jiù bào zhe yítòng kuángyǐn。
He is so thirsty that he drinks heavily while holding a jug.
他一直都过得很困厄，但他从来不曾抱怨命运。
Tā yìzhí dōu guò de hěnkùnè，dàn tā cónglái bùcéng bàoyuàn mìngyùn。
He has been in financial straits, but he has never complained of his fate.
只听珑璁一声，我的心也揪了一下，生怕那件抱起碎了。
Zhǐtīng lóngcōng yìshēng，wǒ de xīn yě jiū le yíxià，shēngpà nà jiàn bàoqǐ suì le。
With the tinkling sound, my heart tightened, fearing it was broken.
洪水中，为了不被溺死，人们都牢牢地抱着水中飘浮的木头。
Hóngshuǐ zhōng，wèi le búbèi nìsǐ，rénmen dōu láoláo de bào zhe shuǐ zhōng piāofú de mùtou。
In order to avoid drowning and survive the flood, all the people held on firmly to the floating wood on the water.
她很怕冷，每到冬天就爱抱着她的暖水袋。
Tā hěnpà lěng，měi dào dōngtiān jiù ài bào zhe tā de nuǎnshuǐdài。
She is susceptible to cold. She likes to have a hot-water bottle in her arms during the winter.
她一世青灯，临终前都没抱怨半句。
Tā yíshì qīngdēng，lín zhōng qián dōu méi bàoyuàn bànjù。
Although being lonely and bitter life all through her life, she didn\'t make a single complaint before she died.
面对日益变换的社会环境，我们不应该抱怨自己的时运不济，而是应该识时务，而后应时而动。
Miànduì rìyì biànhuàn de shèhuì huánjìng，wǒmen bùyīnggāi bàoyuàn zìjǐ de shíyùn bújì，ér shì yīnggāi shí shíwù，ér hòu yìngshí ér dòng。
Faced with the ever-changing society, we should rather make good judgment about current affairs and take corresponding actions than complain about bad luck.
小松鼠抱起一个松塔儿，蹿到树上去了。
Xiǎosōngshǔ bàoqǐ yígè sōngtǎr，cuāndào shù shàng qù le。
The little squirrel held a pinecone to its chest and jumped into the tree.
我们推襟送抱，成了知心朋友。
Wǒmen tuījīn sòngbào，chéng le zhīxīn péngyou。
We are sincere in dealing with each other, and have become intimate friends.
很抱歉，对于你的事，我实在无能为力。
Hěn bàoqiàn，duìyú nǐ de shì，wǒ shízai wúnéngwéilì。
I\'m sorry, but there is really nothing I can do to help you.
丽丽总是在受到伤害时想起妈妈温热的怀抱。
Lìlì zǒngshì zài shòudào shānghài shí xiǎngqǐ māma wēnrè de huáibào。
Lily misses the warm embrace of her mother whenever she feels hurt.
我又来相扰，实在抱歉。
Wǒ yòulái xiāngrǎo，shízai bàoqiàn。
I am sorry to disturb you again.
进贡者玼玼地抱着玉花瓶，生怕不小心摔坏了贡品。
Jìngòngzhě cīcī de bào zhe yùhuāpíng，shēngpà bùxiǎoxīn shuāihuài le gòngpǐn。
The person paying tribute to the emperor holds the jade flower vase carefully, fearing to accidentally break it.
现在有些年轻人抱着游戏人生的态度过日子。
Xiànzài yǒuxiē niánqīngrén bào zhe yóuxì rénshēng de tàidu guò rìzi。
Nowadays, some young people treat their lives merely as games.
我们校长等着抱孙子呢！
Wǒmen xiàozhǎng děngzhe bàosūnzi ne！
Our head teacher is going to be a grandmother!
抱成一团
bàochéng yìtuán
stand together
要强化创新意识，不能抱残守缺。
Yào qiánghuà chuàngxīnyìshí，bùnéng bàocánshǒuquē。
We must emphasize creativity, and break the pattern of clinging to the past.
有些学生平时不努力，考前临时抱佛脚。

赫鲁晓夫先生在联合国大会上夸张地讨好和拥抱卡斯特罗。
He cradled it, baby-wise, in his arms.
Tā xiàng duìdài yīnghái shìde shuāngshǒu bàozhe bìng yáozhe tā。
他像对待婴孩似地双手抱着并摇着它。
She complained bitterly.
Tā shēnshēn de bàoyuàn。
她深深地抱怨。
He complained sourly that the new rules only benefitted the managers.
Tā jiānkè de bàoyuàn shuō xīn guīdìng zhǐ duì guǎnlǐ rényuán yǒu hǎochù。
他尖刻地抱怨说新规定只对管理人员有好处。
He complained vociferously.
Tā chǎochǎonàonào，bùtíng de bàoyuànzhe。
他吵吵闹闹，不停地抱怨着。

Tā zài bàoyuàn shénme？

A noble tenderhearted creature who sympathizes with all the human race.
Yí gè gāoguì、xīndìshànliáng de rén，tā duì suǒyǒu de rénzhǒng bào yǒu tóngqíngxīn。
一个高贵、心地善良的人，他对所有的人种抱有同情心。
She is unassumingly skeptical of her own work.
Tā duì zìjǐ de gōngzuò bàozhe qiānxùn de huáiyí tàidù。
她对自己的工作抱着谦逊的怀疑态度。
I must regretfully decline your kind invitation.
Fēicháng bàoqiàn，wǒ bìxū jùjué nǐ de shèngqíng yāoqǐng。
非常抱歉，我必须拒绝你的盛情邀请。
I cuddled the baby.
Wǒ bàozhe háizi hǒngtā rùshuì。
我抱着孩子哄他入睡。
A noteworthy fact is that her students rarely complain.
Yí gè zhídé zhùyì de shìshí shì tā de xuésheng hěn shǎo bàoyuàn。
一个值得注意的事实是他的学生很少抱怨。
A career or vengeance so direful that London was shocked.
Zhèzhǒng bàofùxīn huò bàofùxīn rúcǐ kěpà，zhěnggè lúndūn dōu jīngdāi le。
这种抱负心或报复心如此可怕，整个伦敦都惊呆了。
Complaints about corruption and social inequality are also rising.
duì fǔbài hé shèhuì bùpíngděng de bàoyuàn yě zài zēngduō。
对腐败和社会不平等的抱怨也在增多。
In monogamy, a single male pairs with a single female.
Zài yīfūyīqī zhì xià，yí gè nánxìng zhǐnéng hé yí gè nǚxìng pèiduì。
在一夫一妻制下，一个男性只能和一个女性配对。
这里多数家庭是一夫一妻，而不是一夫多妻。
Zhèlǐ duōshù jiātíng shì yīfū-yīqī，érbúshì yīfū-duōqī。
Most households here consist of one husband and one wife, and not one husband and several wives.
老夫妻俩回忆起甜蜜的往事，一边赏月一边叙旧。
Lǎofūqī liǎ huíyìqǐ tiánmì de wǎngshì，yìbiān shǎngyuè yìbiān xùjiù。
While appreciating the moon, the couple recounted their happy stories.

Tàiduō de fūqī wàngjìle tāmen shì yí gè zǔhé，tāmen yīnggāi xiàng yí gè xiǎozǔ yíyàng gōngzuò。
太多的夫妻忘记了他们是一个组合，他们应该像一个小组一样工作。

The boss goes out of his way to avoid his ex-wife for fear that she might disclose his unsavoury past.
你两个结为夫妻，是前世有缘。

咱俩结为夫妻，也是前缘。
Zánliǎ jiéwéi fūqī，yě shì qiányuán。

妻子在两年前去世了，他每每思之断魂。
Qīzi zài liǎng nián qián qùshì le，tā měiměi sī zhī duànhún。
His wife passed away two years ago, which left him in deep sorrow.
多年前的那场大故，使他妻离子散。

这张白血病诊断书惊呆了陪他前来看病的妻子。

包括前妻(或前夫)的孩子，全家共十口人。

Tā de qiánqī zài sùqǐng tā de yí bàn fángchǎn。

He treats his former wife civilly.
Tā duì tā de qiánqī hěn rényì。
他对他的前妻很仁义。

I forewarned him of the trouble that would arise if he showed up at his ex-wife\'s house.

对他出现在他前妻的房间中可能会遇到哪些麻烦，我事先提醒过他。
He was always good to his wife and kids.
他以前对妻儿一向都很好。

The couple adopted a girl two years ago.
这对夫妻两年前收养了一个女孩。

He fixed over the window before his wife came back.

妻子回来之前，他修理了窗户。
Lisa sent a wedding present with her sincerest wishes to her ex-boyfriend and his new wife.
莉萨送给前男友和他的新婚妻子一份结婚礼物和真诚的祝福。
My wife nursed the car along the side of the road.
Wǒ qīzǐ xiǎoxīn de kāizhe chē yán lùbiān qiánjìn。

He treated his wife as an equal in the 1700\'s, he was truly born before his time.

他在18世纪就把他的妻子视作平等的人，他真是跑在时代的前头。
我妻子很会当家。
Wǒ qīzi hěn huì dāngjiā。
My wife is a very good housekeeper.
他怕妻子着急，把病情瞒着不说。
Tā pà qīzi zháojí，bǎ bìngqíngmán zhe bùshuō。
He didn\'t let his wife know about his illness for fear she\'d worry.
他千方百计地请好大夫给妻子看病。

He is doing all he can to find good doctors to treat his wife.
他对妻子很体贴。
Tā duì qīzi hěn tǐtiē。
He\'s very considerate of his wife.
妻子在家把家务整理得服服帖帖的。

他爱宠自己的妻子。
Tā àichǒng zìjǐ de qīzǐ。
He adores his wife.

他的背搭子被妻子装得满满的。

A wife can best understand the tedious nature of housework.
他喜欢收藏铜镜，妻子嘲笑他买了一堆废铜烂铁。

His hobby is collecting bronze mirrors, which are ridiculed as &quot;rubbish&quot; by his wife.
听说东北正在下雪，妻子为将要去那里出差的丈夫准备了一顶风雪帽。

Hearing that it was snowing in the northeast, the wife made a cap for her husband, who will go there on business.
妻子随同他的官人一起到王府赴宴。

The wife goes to the feast at the prince\'s palace together with her husband.
今年寒假，我陪妻子归省。

This winter holiday, I will accompany my wife to see her parents.
他的后婚妻子很贤惠，把他照顾得很好。

His digamous wife is very virtuous, and takes good care of him.
小王在结婚纪念日送给妻子一束玫瑰花。
Xiǎo Wáng zài jiéhūn jìniànrì sònggěi qīzǐ yí shù méiguīhuā。
Xiao Wang gave his wife a bouquet of roses for their wedding anniversary.
他因家贫无力养活家口，妻子带着三个孩子随岳父远去他乡。
Tā yīn jiāpín wúlì yǎnghuó jiākǒu，qīzǐ dài zhe sāngè háizi suí yuèfù yuǎnqù tāxiāng。
Because of his incapability of supporting his family, his wife took their three children together with her father and went far away.
结婚十几年来，妻子都是一个很典型的家庭妇女，很本分。

Since we got married ten years ago, my better half has always been a typical housewife who does her duty well.
妻子在究问晚归的丈夫去了哪里。
Qīzǐ zài jiūwèn wǎnguī de zhàngfū qù le nǎlǐ。
The wife is interrogating him as to where her husband went last night.
自从他走后，妻子总是离情绵绵地记挂着他。

Since he left, his wife missed him with endless parting feelings.
我的妻子已经临月，我要在家照顾她。

My wife is due to give birth this month, I must stay home and take care of her.
他买了上好的罗缎送给她的新婚妻子。

He bought high-grade silk for his newly wife.
那件黑色皮夹克是妻子送他的生日礼物，很适合他。

My wife has always been a sensible woman.
叔叔一直为娶到一位贤德的妻子而骄傲。

他续娶的妻子很凶悍，他有点后悔。

He kind of regrets getting married after the death of his first wife, as his second wife is quite fierce.
张衙内的妻子刚刚生产，他现在不当差了。

Imperial Bodyguard Zhang is off duty now because his wife just had a baby.
自从元配妻子去世后，他一直生活得郁郁寡欢。

He has been depressed since the death of his first wife.
原配妻子去世后，他又娶了一个。
Yuánpèi qīzǐ qùshì hòu，tā yòu qǔ le yí gè。
After the death of his first wife, he married another woman.
他和新婚妻子来到照相馆照相。
Tā hé xīnhūn qīzǐ láidào zhào xiàng guǎn zhào xiàng。
He came to the photo studio with his newly married wife.
他经不住妻子的枕边风，终于答应把他小舅子提拔成院长。
Tā jīngbùzhù qīzǐ de zhěnbiānfēng，zhōng yú dāying bǎ tā xiǎojiùzi tíbá chéng yuàncháng。
He couldn\'t stand his wife\'s pillow talk, and finally agreed to make his brother-in-law the president.
妻子对他照顾得无微不至，知冷知热的。
Qīzǐ duì tā zhàogù de wúwēi búzhì，zhīlěng zhīrè de。
His wife is taking good, and thorough care of him.
她一直都是个知情达理的好妻子。
Tā yìzhí dōushì gè zhīqíng dálǐ de hǎo qīzǐ。
She is always a reasonable, and good wife.
我工作很忙，中馈之事全交由妻子打理。
Wǒ gōngzuò hěn máng，zhōng kuì zhī shì quánjiāo yóu qīzǐ dǎlǐ。
I am busy with my work.  My wife is taking care of all family duties.
看着丫鬟头上的抓髻，他想起了他刚过世的妻子。
Kàn zhe yāhuán tóushàng de zhuājì，tā xiǎngqǐ le tā gāng guòshì de qīzǐ。
Looking at the servant girl\'s hair, worn in two buns, he can\'t help thinking of his wife, who passed away recently.
他对妻子百依百顺。
Tā duì qīzǐ bǎiyībǎishùn。
He obeys his wife in everything.
他别离了妻子，外出打工。
Tā biélíle qīzǐ，wàichūdǎgōng。
He left his wife and went to look for work elsewhere.

Wǒ gěi qīzǐ zuòzǎocān。
I made breakfast for my wife.
小张很挂念出国的妻子。
Xiǎozhāng hěnguàniàn chūguóde qīzǐ。
Xiao Zhang was very concerned about his wife, who had gone abroad.
他妻子很会处理家庭关系。
Tā qīzǐ hěn huì chǔlǐ jiātíngguānxì.
His wife is very good at sorting out relationships within the family.

Wǒ bǎ qīzǐ jièshàogěile tóngshì.

抛弃妻子
pāoqì qīzǐ
desert one\'s wife
他破天荒地给妻子买了一束玫瑰。
Tā pòtiānhuāng de gěi qīzǐ mǎile yíshù méiguī.
In an unprecedented move, he bought his wife a bouquet of roses.
他送给妻子一大束鲜花。
Tā sònggěi qīzǐ yídàshù xiānhuā。
He gave his wife a big bunch of flowers.
妻子不许他抽烟喝酒。
Qīzǐ bùxǔ tā chōuyān-hējiǔ。
His wife doesn\'t allow him to smoke or drink.
他的第二任妻子
tā de dì\'èrrèn qīzǐ
his second wife
妻离子散，天各一方
qīlízǐsàn，tiāngèyìfāng
a family torn asunder, each member in a different corner of the world
多年前的那场大故，使他妻离子散。
Duōnián qián de nà chǎng dàgù，shǐ tā qīlí zǐsǎn。
His family was broken up by a grave incident many years ago.
他真是个狠心狼，抛妻弃子自己出走。
Tā zhēn shì gè hěnxīnláng，pāoqī qìzǐ zìjǐ chūzǒu。
He is so heartless that he left home, and deserted his wife and son.
你若是真做出抛妻弃子的事，那还不如猪狗呢！
Nǐ ruòshì zhēn zuòchū pāoqī qìzǐ de shì，nà hái bùrú zhūgǒu ne！
If you really do things like abandoning your wife and your son, you are no better than pigs and dogs.
小夫妻散伙后，孩子怎么办？
Xiǎo fūqī sànhuǒ hòu，háizi zěnmebàn？
When the young couple split up, what will happen to the children?
这夫妻二人十分般配，真是一门子好亲事呀。
Zhè fūqī èr rén shífēn bānpèi，zhēnshì yìménzi hǎo qīnshì ya。
The couple matches completely. This is a truly good marriage.
夫妻俩努力工作以扶养父母和孩子。

妻子怀孕后，他换了工作。
His marriage came to grief after he cheated on his wife.
Tā de hūnyīn yīnwèi tā duì qīzǐ de bùzhōng ér yǐ shībài gàozhōng。
他的婚姻因为他对妻子的不忠而以失败告终。

他去世以后，他的妻子离开了这个城镇。

pāoqì qī\'ér

Being away from home, he misses his wife and children very much.
这个老人妻儿俱亡晚年过着落寞的生活。
Zhège lǎorén qīér jùwáng wǎnnián guò zhe luòmò de shēnghuó。
The old man lost his wife and son, and led a desolate life for his remaining years.
小李在家里可是个听话的顺民，妻子女儿都能“领导”他。
Xiǎo Lǐ zài jiā lǐ kě shì gè tīnghuà de shùnmín，qīzǐ nǚ\'ér dōu néng“lǐngdǎo”tā。
Xiao Li is abjectly obedient at home, as both his wife and daughter can &quot;direct&quot; him.
老板尽可能地避开他的前妻，生怕她揭老底儿。
Lǎobǎn jìn kěnéng de bìkāi tā de qiánqī，shēngpà tā jiē lǎodǐr。
The boss goes out of his way to avoid his ex-wife for fear that she might disclose his unsavoury past.
夫妻俩睹物思人，想起了远在他乡的儿子。
Fūqīliǎ dǔwùsīrén，xiǎngqǐle yuǎnzàitāxiāngde érzi。
The couple saw something that reminded them of their son who was far away from home.
顾怜妻儿老小。
抛离妻儿，远走他乡。
谁家没有妻儿老小？
He was always good to his wife and kids.
他以前对妻儿一向都很好。
His abandonment of his wife and children left them penniless.
Tā pāoqìle qīzǐ\'érnǚ，dǎozhì tāmen shēnwúfēnwén。
他抛弃了妻子儿女，导致他们身无分文。
His children were upset when he transferred the deed of his home to his second wife.
Dāng tā bǎ jiāchǎn zhuǎnrànggěi dì\'èrrèn qīzǐ shí，tā de érnǚ gǎndào shífēn chàyì。
当他把家产转让给第二任妻子时，他的儿女感到十分诧异。
The couple were in denial over their son\'s death.
Fūqī fǒurèn yǒuguān duì tāmen érzi sǐ yào fùzé de zhǐkòng。
夫妻否认有关对他们儿子死要负责的指控。
I sent a letter to my son in care of my wife.
Wǒ gěi érzi xiěle fēng xìn， yóu qīzǐ zhuǎnjiāo。
我给儿子写了封信，由妻子转交。
Should I go easy on my wife when we play poker?
我和妻子玩扑克时，态度应该随意点儿吗？
这里多数家庭是一夫一妻，而不是一夫多妻。
Zhèlǐ duōshù jiātíng shì yīfū-yīqī，érbúshì yīfū-duōqī。
Most households here consist of one husband and one wife, and not one husband and several wives.
我妻子很会当家。
Wǒ qīzi hěn huì dāngjiā。
My wife is a very good housekeeper.
恩爱夫妻
ēn\'ài fūqī
an affectionate couple
他们夫妻结婚十年就分居了。
Tāmen fūqī jiéhūn shí nián jiù fēnjū le。
They separated after ten years of marriage.
夫妻间有互相扶养的义务。
Fūqī jiān yǒu hùxiāng fúyǎng de yìwù。
Husband and wife have the duty to support and assist each other.
夫妻关系
fūqī guānxì
relations between husband and wife
夫妻有相互继承遗产的权利。
Fūqī yǒu xiānghù jìchéngyíchǎn de quánlì。
Husband and wife have the right to inherit each other\'s property.
老板尽可能地避开他的前妻，生怕她揭老底儿。
Lǎobǎn jìn kěnéng de bìkāi tā de qiánqī，shēngpà tā jiē lǎodǐr。
The boss goes out of his way to avoid his ex-wife for fear that she might disclose his unsavoury past.
结为夫妻
jiéwéi fūqī 
become husband and wife
夫妻之间不要说这种绝情的话。
Fūqī zhījiān bú yào shuō zhèzhǒng juéqíng de huà。
It\'s not for a husband or wife to make such heartless (or cruel) remarks.
这对小夫妻常常发生口角。
Zhè duì xiǎo fūqī chángchángfāshēngkǒujiǎo。
The young couple often bicker with one another.
他怕妻子着急，把病情瞒着不说。
Tā pà qīzi zháojí，bǎ bìngqíngmán zhe bùshuō。
He didn\'t let his wife know about his illness for fear she\'d worry.
抛弃妻儿
pāoqì qī\'ér
abandon one\'s wife and kids
他千方百计地请好大夫给妻子看病。
Tā qiānfāngbǎijì de qǐnghǎo dàifu gěi qīzi kànbìng。
He is doing all he can to find good doctors to treat his wife.
咱俩结为夫妻，也是前缘。
Zánliǎ jiéwéi fūqī，yě shì qiányuán。
It is our foreordained affinity that we should become husband and wife.
他对妻子很体贴。
Tā duì qīzi hěn tǐtiē。
He\'s very considerate of his wife.
妻离子散，天各一方
qīlízǐsàn，tiāngèyìfāng
a family torn asunder, each member in a different corner of the world
我看他二人恰是一对天造地设的夫妻。
Wǒ kàn tā èr rén qià shì yí duì tiānzàodìshè de fūqī。
I think they will make a perfect match.
亡妻
wángqī 
deceased wife
休妻
xiū qī
put one\'s wife away
遗弃妻儿
yíqì qī\'ér 
forsake one\'s wife and children
你两个结为夫妻，是前世有缘。
Nǐ liǎnggè jiéwèi fūqī，shì qiánshì yǒuyuán。
Your union was predestined from a previous incarnation.
御夫(妻)
yù fū（qī）
control one\'s husband (wife)
夫妻
fūqī
husband (or man) and wife
妻子在家把家务整理得服服帖帖的。
Qīzǐ zàijiā bǎ jiāwù zhěnglǐ de fúfútiētiē de。
他爱宠自己的妻子。
Tā àichǒng zìjǐ de qīzǐ。
He adores his wife.
他给妻子买了一件半大的皮衣。
Tā gěi qīzǐ mǎi le yíjiàn bàndà de píyī。
He bought a medium-sized piece of leather clothing for his wife.
他的背搭子被妻子装得满满的。
Tā de bèidāzi bèi qīzǐ zhuāng de mǎnmǎn de。
Before going on the trip, his wife helped him fill up his backpack.
小夫妻婚后不育，双方老人都很着急。
Xiǎofūqī hūnhòu búyù，shuāngfāng lǎorén dōu hěnzháojí。
The parents are worried about the couple who could not have a baby.
他们虽然是一对柴米夫妻，生活中却也不乏浪漫。
Tāmen suīrán shì yí duì cháimǐ fūqī，shēnghuó zhōng què yě bùfá làngmàn。
The couple is leading a poor, but romantic life.
他抛弃妻子，真是一个陈世美。
Tā pāoqì qīzǐ，zhēnshì yígè Chén Shìměi。
He abondoned his wife and children, which really makes him a Chen Shimei.
在朋友的帮助下，这对夫妻破镜重圆。
Zài péngyou de bāngzhù xià，zhè duì fūqī pòjìngchóngyuán。
With the help of their friends, the couple reunited after years of separation.
这夫妻俩，一年到头地打闹。
Zhè fūqī liǎ，yì nián dàotóu de dǎnào。
The couple argues year round.
多年前的那场大故，使他妻离子散。
Duōnián qián de nà chǎng dàgù，shǐ tā qīlí zǐsǎn。
His family was broken up by a grave incident many years ago.
他们夫妻二人感情笃深，从来不吵架。
Tāmen fūqī èr rén gǎnqíng dǔshēn，cónglái bùchǎojià。
The man and his wife have always been deeply in love and have never had a single fight in their life together.
妻子在两年前去世了，他每每思之断魂。
Qīzi zài liǎng nián qián qùshì le，tā měiměi sī zhī duànhún。
His wife passed away two years ago, which left him in deep sorrow.
夫妻吵架，请不要恶语相加，多伤感情啊。
Fūqī chǎojià，qǐng búyào èyǔ xiāngjiā，duō shāng gǎnqíng a。
It is really hurtful when a couple hurl abuse at each other in a quarrel.
这位才是他多年的发妻。
Zhèwèi cái shì tā duōnián de fàqī。
This is his wife who has been with him for many years.
当妻子的最能体会家务事的繁琐了。
Dāng qīzi de zuì néng tǐhuì jiāwùshì de fánsuǒ le。
A wife can best understand the tedious nature of housework.
他喜欢收藏铜镜，妻子嘲笑他买了一堆废铜烂铁。
Tā xǐhuan shōucáng tóngjìng，qīzi cháoxiào tā mǎi le yì duī fèitóng làntiě。
His hobby is collecting bronze mirrors, which are ridiculed as &quot;rubbish&quot; by his wife.
听说东北正在下雪，妻子为将要去那里出差的丈夫准备了一顶风雪帽。
Tīngshuō dōngběi zhèngzài xiàxuě，qīzǐ wèi jiāngyào qù nàlǐ chūchāi de zhàngfū zhǔnbèi le yì dǐng fēngxuěmào。
Hearing that it was snowing in the northeast, the wife made a cap for her husband, who will go there on business.
棋后棋王结为夫妻，新婚蜜月暂时封棋。
Qíhòu qíwáng jiéwéi fūqī，xīnhūn mìyuè zànshí fēngqí。
As the queen and king of chess have got married, the game will be delayed for their honeymoon.
出门在外，他顾恋着家中的妻儿。
Chūmén zài wài，tā gùliàn zhe jiā zhōng de qīér。
Being away from home, he misses his wife and children very much.
别妻千里音书断，关山阻隔两心悬。
Biéqī qiānlǐ yīnshū duàn，guānshān zǔgé liǎngxīn xuán。
The husband is thousands of miles away from his wife and can\'t send letters to his wife because they are cut off by the mountains. This couple worry about each other all the time.
妻子随同他的官人一起到王府赴宴。
Qīzǐ suítóng tā de guānrén yìqǐ dào wángfǔ fùyàn。
The wife goes to the feast at the prince\'s palace together with her husband.
今年寒假，我陪妻子归省。
Jīnnián hánjià，wǒ péi qīzǐ guīxǐng。
This winter holiday, I will accompany my wife to see her parents.
他真是个狠心狼，抛妻弃子自己出走。
Tā zhēn shì gè hěnxīnláng，pāoqī qìzǐ zìjǐ chūzǒu。
He is so heartless that he left home, and deserted his wife and son.
他的后婚妻子很贤惠，把他照顾得很好。
Tā de hòuhūn qīzǐ hěnxiánhuì，bǎ tā zhàogù de hěnhǎo。
His digamous wife is very virtuous, and takes good care of him.
他的后妻很贤惠，这让他很受人羡慕。
Tā de hòuqī hěnxiánhuì，zhè ràng tā hěnshòu rén xiànmù。
His digamous wife is very virtuous, which makes him envied by others.
小王在结婚纪念日送给妻子一束玫瑰花。
Xiǎo Wáng zài jiéhūn jìniànrì sònggěi qīzǐ yí shù méiguīhuā。
Xiao Wang gave his wife a bouquet of roses for their wedding anniversary.
他因家贫无力养活家口，妻子带着三个孩子随岳父远去他乡。
Tā yīn jiāpín wúlì yǎnghuó jiākǒu，qīzǐ dài zhe sāngè háizi suí yuèfù yuǎnqù tāxiāng。
Because of his incapability of supporting his family, his wife took their three children together with her father and went far away.
结婚十几年来，妻子都是一个很典型的家庭妇女，很本分。
Jiéhūn shí jǐnián lái，qīzǐ dōushì yígè hěndiǎnxíng de jiātíng fùnǚ，hěnběnfèn。
Since we got married ten years ago, my better half has always been a typical housewife who does her duty well.
老夫妻俩回忆起甜蜜的往事，一边赏月一边叙旧。
Lǎofūqī liǎ huíyìqǐ tiánmì de wǎngshì，yìbiān shǎngyuè yìbiān xùjiù。
While appreciating the moon, the couple recounted their happy stories.
妻子在究问晚归的丈夫去了哪里。
Qīzǐ zài jiūwèn wǎnguī de zhàngfū qù le nǎlǐ。
The wife is interrogating him as to where her husband went last night.
自从他走后，妻子总是离情绵绵地记挂着他。
Zìcóng tā zǒu hòu，qīzǐ zǒngshì líqíng miánmián de jìguà zhe tā。
Since he left, his wife missed him with endless parting feelings.
他们夫妻二人十分恩爱，真是连理枝啊。
Tāmen fūqī èr rén shífēn ēnài，zhēnshì liánlǐzhī a。
The couple is deep in love with each other. They are really like the interlocked branches of two trees.
我的妻子已经临月，我要在家照顾她。
Wǒ de qīzǐ yǐjing línyuè，wǒ yào zài jiā zhàogù tā。
My wife is due to give birth this month, I must stay home and take care of her.
当他的爱妻去世后，他的灵感也沦殁了。
Dāng tā de àiqī qùshì hòu，tā de línggǎn yě lúnmò le。
After the death of his beloved wife, he also lost his inspiration.
他买了上好的罗缎送给她的新婚妻子。
Tā mǎi le shànghǎo de luóduàn sònggěi tā de xīnhūn qīzǐ。
He bought high-grade silk for his newly wife.
这个老人妻儿俱亡晚年过着落寞的生活。
Zhège lǎorén qīér jùwáng wǎnnián guò zhe luòmò de shēnghuó。
The old man lost his wife and son, and led a desolate life for his remaining years.
这夫妻二人十分般配，真是一门子好亲事呀。
Zhè fūqī èr rén shífēn bānpèi，zhēnshì yìménzi hǎo qīnshì ya。
The couple matches completely. This is a truly good marriage.
他很幸运，娶了如此一位妙丽为妻。
Tā hěnxìngyùn，qǔ le rúcǐ yíwèi miàolì wéi qī。
He is so fortunate that he got married to such a beauty.
那件黑色皮夹克是妻子送他的生日礼物，很适合他。
Nà jiàn hēisè píjiákè shì qīzǐ sòng tā de shēngrì lǐwù，hěnshìhé tā。
The black leather jacket is a birthday gift given by his wife. It suits him well.
古代的贵族们都地位显赫，妻妾成群。
Gǔdài de guìzúmen dōu dìwèi xiǎnhè，qīqiè chéngqún。
The gentry in ancient times were eminent, with a wife and many concubines.
他们夫妻二人结婚以后一直琴瑟和谐。
Tāmen fūqī èrrén jiéhūn yǐhòu yìzhí qínsè héxié。
They have been living in marital harmony since they got married.
他妻子是一个倾国倾城的美人。
Tā qīzǐ shì yígè qīngguó qīngchéng de měirén。
His wife is an unmatched beauty.
独守空房很久的她终于盼来了夫妻团聚的这一天。
Dúshǒu kōngfáng hěnjiǔ de tā zhōng yú pànlái le fūqī tuánjù de zhè yì tiān。
Having stayed at home for a long time, she finally saw the day she could reunite with her husband.
小李在家里可是个听话的顺民，妻子女儿都能“领导”他。
Xiǎo Lǐ zài jiā lǐ kě shì gè tīnghuà de shùnmín，qīzǐ nǚ\'ér dōu néng“lǐngdǎo”tā。
Xiao Li is abjectly obedient at home, as both his wife and daughter can &quot;direct&quot; him.
我妻子一向都是很通情达理的。
Wǒ qīzǐ yí xiàng dōushì hěntōngqíngdálǐ de。
My wife has always been a sensible woman.
叔叔一直为娶到一位贤德的妻子而骄傲。
Shūshu yìzhí wèi qǔdào yíwèi xiándé de qīzǐ ér jiāo\'ào。
My uncle is always proud of having a virtuous wife.
夫妻俩之间就算有什么矛盾也不能拳脚相加。
Fūqī liǎ zhījiān jiùsuàn yǒu shénme máodùn yě bùnéng quánjiǎo xiāngjiā。
No matter what happens, couples should not fight.
这对小夫妻每天傍晚都一起出来散步。
Zhè duì xiǎofūqī měitiān bàngwǎn dōu yìqǐ chūlái sànbù。
This couple go out to walk every evening.
夫妻间性生活的和谐度也会对婚姻造成影响。
Fūqī jiān xìng shēnghuó de héxié dù yě huì duì hūnyīn zàochéng yǐngxiǎng。
The degree of harmony in a couple\'s sexual life also has an impact on their marriage.
他续娶的妻子很凶悍，他有点后悔。
Tā xùqǔ de qīzǐ hěn xiōnghàn，tā yǒudiǎn hòuhuǐ。
He kind of regrets getting married after the death of his first wife, as his second wife is quite fierce.
张衙内的妻子刚刚生产，他现在不当差了。
Zhāng yánèi de qīzǐ gānggāng shēngchǎn，tā xiànzài bùdāngchāi le。
Imperial Bodyguard Zhang is off duty now because his wife just had a baby.
自从元配妻子去世后，他一直生活得郁郁寡欢。
Zìcóng yuánpèi qīzǐ qùshì hòu，tā yìzhí shēnghuó de yùyù guǎhuān。
He has been depressed since the death of his first wife.
原配妻子去世后，他又娶了一个。
Yuánpèi qīzǐ qùshì hòu，tā yòu qǔ le yí gè。
After the death of his first wife, he married another woman.
他和新婚妻子来到照相馆照相。
Tā hé xīnhūn qīzǐ láidào zhào xiàng guǎn zhào xiàng。
He came to the photo studio with his newly married wife.
他经不住妻子的枕边风，终于答应把他小舅子提拔成院长。
Tā jīngbùzhù qīzǐ de zhěnbiānfēng，zhōng yú dāying bǎ tā xiǎojiùzi tíbá chéng yuàncháng。
He couldn\'t stand his wife\'s pillow talk, and finally agreed to make his brother-in-law the president.
妻子对他照顾得无微不至，知冷知热的。
Qīzǐ duì tā zhàogù de wúwēi búzhì，zhīlěng zhīrè de。
His wife is taking good, and thorough care of him.
她一直都是个知情达理的好妻子。
Tā yìzhí dōushì gè zhīqíng dálǐ de hǎo qīzǐ。
She is always a reasonable, and good wife.
我工作很忙，中馈之事全交由妻子打理。
Wǒ gōngzuò hěn máng，zhōng kuì zhī shì quánjiāo yóu qīzǐ dǎlǐ。
I am busy with my work.  My wife is taking care of all family duties.
你若是真做出抛妻弃子的事，那还不如猪狗呢！
Nǐ ruòshì zhēn zuòchū pāoqī qìzǐ de shì，nà hái bùrú zhūgǒu ne！
If you really do things like abandoning your wife and your son, you are no better than pigs and dogs.
看着丫鬟头上的抓髻，他想起了他刚过世的妻子。
Kàn zhe yāhuán tóushàng de zhuājì，tā xiǎngqǐ le tā gāng guòshì de qīzǐ。
Looking at the servant girl\'s hair, worn in two buns, he can\'t help thinking of his wife, who passed away recently.
迈克尔的未婚妻温柔大方，美丽动人。
Màikè\'ěr de wèihūnqī wēnróudàfang，měilìdòngrén。
Michael\'s fiance is very gentle, and pretty.
他们夫妻是白手起家。
Tāmen fūqī shì báishǒuqǐjiā。
The couple started out their business from scratch.
他对妻子百依百顺。
Tā duì qīzǐ bǎiyībǎishùn。
He obeys his wife in everything.
他别离了妻子，外出打工。
Tā biélíle qīzǐ，wàichūdǎgōng。
He left his wife and went to look for work elsewhere.
夫妻俩睹物思人，想起了远在他乡的儿子。
Fūqīliǎ dǔwùsīrén，xiǎngqǐle yuǎnzàitāxiāngde érzi。
The couple saw something that reminded them of their son who was far away from home.
一对夫妻
yíduì fūqī
a married couple
他们是一对恩爱夫妻。
Tāmen shì yíduì ēn\'àifūqī。
They are a devoted couple.
夫妻俩努力工作以扶养父母和孩子。
Fūqīliǎ nǔlìgōngzuò yǐ fúyǎng fùmǔ hé háizǐ。
The couple work hard to provide for their parents and children.
我给妻子做早餐。
Wǒ gěi qīzǐ zuòzǎocān。
I made breakfast for my wife.
小张很挂念出国的妻子。
Xiǎozhāng hěnguàniàn chūguóde qīzǐ。
Xiao Zhang was very concerned about his wife, who had gone abroad.
夫妻不和。
Fūqī bùhé。
The couple are not on good terms.
他妻子很会处理家庭关系。
Tā qīzǐ hěn huì chǔlǐ jiātíngguānxì.
His wife is very good at sorting out relationships within the family.
