Wǒ yǐ chéngwéi nǐ zhōngshí ér wēijiàn de qīzǐ，wǒ huì shíshí-kèkè shùncóng nǐ de yìyuàn。
我已成为你忠实而微贱的妻子，我会时时刻刻顺从你的意愿。
He silenced the whisperings which connected her, untruly and unfairly, with his separation from his wife.
Tā píngxīle nàxiē shuō tā yīn yǔ tā yǒu rǎn ér líkāi qīzǐ de xūjiǎ ér yòu bù gōngpíng de xiányánsuìyǔ。
他平息了那些说他因与她有染而离开妻子的虚假而又不公平的闲言碎语。
In those days a wife had to depend on the mercifulness of her husband.
Zài nàgèshíhòu，qīzǐ bùdébù zhǐwàng qí zhàngfu de kuānhòu。
在那个时候，妻子不得不指望其丈夫的宽厚。
An equally gallant little wife and mother uncomplainingly keeping up the production of tasty and nourishing meals.
Yí gè wěidà de jì zuò qīzǐ yòu zuò mǔqīn de nǚrén huì háowúyuànyán de jiānchí zuò měiwèi ér yòu yíngyǎng fēngfù de fàncài。
一个伟大的既做妻子又做母亲的女人会毫无怨言地坚持做美味而又营养丰富的饭菜。
Susan Hayward plays the wife sharply and sweetly.
Sūshān · Hǎi wǔ dé jíqiè、tiánmì de bànyǎnzhe qīzǐ de juésè。
苏珊·海伍德急切、甜蜜地扮演着妻子的角色。
The unhappy couple got into a terrible scrap.
Nà duì bú xìngfú de fūqī xiànrùle yì chǎng kěpà de sīdǎ zhī zhōng。
那对不幸福的夫妻陷入了一场可怕的撕打之中。
He was quick to point out his wife\'s failings.
Tā hěnkuài zhǐchū qīzǐ de quēdiǎn。
他很快指出妻子的缺点。
His wife was always a good source of ready cash.
Tā qīzǐ shǐzhōng shì xiànchéng de xiànjīn láiyuán。
他妻子始终是现成的现金来源。
Patient griselda was a chaste and duteous wife.
Bèishítè·Gélǐsāi\'ěrdá shì yí gè zhēnjié ér shùncóng de qīzǐ。
蓓什特·格里塞尔达是一个贞洁而顺从的妻子。
He was sleeping, one arm flung possessively across his wife.
Tā zài shuìjiào，yì zhī gēbo zhèng lǒuzhe tā de qīzǐ。
他在睡觉，一只胳膊正搂着他的妻子。
A wife is usually considered unqualified to testify against her husband.
Yìbān rènwéi，qīzǐ méiyǒu zīgé duì tā zhàngfu zuò búlì de zhèngcí。
一般认为，妻子没有资格对她丈夫做不利的证词。
I could not think of him in disassociation from his wife.
Wǒ méi xiǎngdào tā huì hé qīzǐ líhūn。
我没想到他会和妻子离婚。
He treats his former wife uncivilly.
Tā duì tā de qiánqī hěn bù rényì。
他对他的前妻很不仁义。
He treats his former wife civilly.
Tā duì tā de qiánqī hěn rényì。
他对他的前妻很仁义。
Lord T. was considered singularly licentious even for the courts of Russia and Portugal; he acquired three wives and fourteen children during his Portuguese embassy alone.
Shènzhì zài Éguó hé Pútáoyá de fǎtíng shàng，T lǎoye yě bèirènwéi shì fēicháng fàngdàng de，jǐnjǐn zài tā dāng Pútáoyá dàshǐ qījiān tā jiù yǒu sān gè qīzǐ hé shísì gè háizi。
甚至在俄国和葡萄牙的法庭上，T老爷也被认为是非常放荡的，仅仅在他当葡萄牙大使期间他就有三个妻子和十四个孩子。
He ignored his wife\'s reminders.
Tā méiyǒu lǐcǎi qīzǐ de tíxǐng。
他没有理睬妻子的提醒。
He looked at his wife adoringly.
Tā chóngbài de kànzhe tā qīzǐ。
他崇拜地看着他妻子。
He looked at his wife admiringly.
Tā zànshǎng de kànzhe tā qīzǐ。
他赞赏地看着他妻子。
He was on trial for allegedly murdering his wife.
Gōngsùrén kòngsù tā shāhàile zìjǐ de qīzi，tā zhèngzài jiēshòu shěnpàn。
公诉人控诉他杀害了自己的妻子，他正在接受审判。
The jealous man was eavesdropping on his wife\'s conversations.
Zhè míng jídù de nánrén tōutīng tā qīzǐ de tánhuà。
这名嫉妒的男人偷听他妻子的谈话。
His wife played him false.
Tā de qīzǐ duì tā bù zhōng。
他的妻子对他不忠。
He is still on the rebound from his wife\'s death.
Tā réng chǔ zài shīqù qīzǐ de qíngxù bōdòng zhī zhōng。
他仍处在失去妻子的情绪波动之中。
The man confessed tearfully to having beaten his wife.
Nàgè rén lèiliúmǎnmiàn de chéngrènle ōudǎ qīzǐ de shìshí。
那个人泪流满面地承认了殴打妻子的事实。
Husband and wife co-signed the lease.
Zhàngfu hé qīzǐ gòngtóng qiānshǔle zhè fèn zūyuē。
丈夫和妻子共同签署了这份租约。
His wife behaved domineeringly.
Tā de qīzǐ hěn báhù。
他的妻子很跋扈。
He lost his wife in the bargain.
Cǐwài tā hái shīqùle tā de qīzǐ。
此外他还失去了他的妻子。
His wife gave a recital of his infidelities.
Tā de qīzǐ shǔluò tā de duōcì chūguǐ xíngwéi。
他的妻子数落他的多次出轨行为。
Adultery is as reprehensible for a husband as for a wife.
Zhàngfu tōngjiān yīng shòudào yǔ qīzǐ tōngjiān xiāngtóng de qiǎnzé。
丈夫通奸应受到与妻子通奸相同的谴责。
He talked inarticulately about the accident that had just taken his wife\'s life.
Tā yǔwúlúncì de shuō qǐ le duóqù tā qīzǐ shēngmìng de nà cì shìgù。
他语无伦次地说起了夺去他妻子生命的那次事故。
He smiled boyishly at his fiancee.
Tā duìzhe zìjǐ de wèihūnqī háitóng bān de xiào le。
他对着自己的未婚妻孩童般地笑了。
His wife officiated as his private secretary.
Tā de qīzi dānrèn tā de sīrén mìshū。
他的妻子担任他的私人秘书。
All his exes live in Texas.
Tā de suǒyǒu qiánqī dōu jūzhù zài Dékèsàsī Zhōu。
他的所有前妻都居住在德克萨斯州。
He was inexcusably cruel to his wife.
Tā duì zìjǐ de qīzǐ fēicháng cánrěn，lìng rén wúfǎ yuánliàng。
他对自己的妻子非常残忍，令人无法原谅。
She is effectively his wife.
Tā shì tā de héfǎ qīzǐ。
她是他的合法妻子。
His trophy wife was an asset to his business.
Tā piàoliang de qīzǐ shì tā shìyè de zīchǎn。
他漂亮的妻子是他事业的资产。
His abandonment of his wife and children left them penniless.
Tā pāoqìle qīzǐ\'érnǚ，dǎozhì tāmen shēnwúfēnwén。
他抛弃了妻子儿女，导致他们身无分文。
He suborned his butler to cover up the murder of his wife.
Tā suōshǐ nánguǎnjiā yǎngài tā móushā qīzi de zuìxíng。
他唆使男管家掩盖他谋杀妻子的罪行。
He fagotted the blouse for his wife.
Tā gěi tā qīzǐ féngle yí jiàn chènshān。
他给他妻子缝了一件衬衫。
He impregnated his wife again.
Tā de qīzǐ yòu huáiyùn le。
他的妻子又怀孕了。
I insinuated that I did not like his wife.
Wǒ ànshì，wǒ bù xǐhuan tā qīzi。
我暗示，我不喜欢他妻子。
I forewarned him of the trouble that would arise if he showed up at his ex-wife\'s house.
Duì tā chūxiànzài tā qiánqī de fángjiān zhōng kěnéng huì yùdào nǎxiē máfan，wǒ shìxiān tíxǐng guò tā。
对他出现在他前妻的房间中可能会遇到哪些麻烦，我事先提醒过他。
He had the gem set in a ring for his wife.
Tā zài gěi qīzǐ de jièzhi zhōng xiāngqiànle yì kē bǎoshí。
他在给妻子的戒指中镶嵌了一颗宝石。
Unchivalrously, the husbands who had to provide such innocent indulgences eventually began to count the costs.
Hěn méi nánshì fēngdù de shì，běngāi tǐtiē qiānjiù qīzǐ de zhàngfu zuìhòu kāishǐ jìsuàn sǔnshī。
很没男士风度的是，本该体贴迁就妻子的丈夫最后开始计算损失。
Properly speaking, they are not husband and wife.
Quèqiè de shuō，tāmen zhījiān búshì fūqī guānxì。
确切地说，他们之间不是夫妻关系。
Imprudently, he downed tools and ran home to make his wife happy.
Tā bùjiǎsīsuǒ de fàngxià gōngjù kuángbēn huíjiā，ràng qīzǐ yě hǎohao gāoxìng yìfān。
他不假思索地放下工具狂奔回家，让妻子也好好高兴一番。
夫妻反目
这家软件公司是个名副其实的夫妻店
这里多数家庭是一夫一妻，而不是一夫多妻。
Zhèlǐ duōshù jiātíng shì yīfū-yīqī，érbúshì yīfū-duōqī。
Most households here consist of one husband and one wife, and not one husband and several wives.
恩爱夫妻
ēn\'ài fūqī
an affectionate couple
他们夫妻结婚十年就分居了。
Tāmen fūqī jiéhūn shí nián jiù fēnjū le。
They separated after ten years of marriage.
夫妻间有互相扶养的义务。
Fūqī jiān yǒu hùxiāng fúyǎng de yìwù。
Husband and wife have the duty to support and assist each other.
夫妻关系
fūqī guānxì
relations between husband and wife
夫妻有相互继承遗产的权利。
Fūqī yǒu xiānghù jìchéngyíchǎn de quánlì。
Husband and wife have the right to inherit each other\'s property.
结为夫妻
jiéwéi fūqī 
become husband and wife
夫妻之间不要说这种绝情的话。
Fūqī zhījiān bú yào shuō zhèzhǒng juéqíng de huà。
It\'s not for a husband or wife to make such heartless (or cruel) remarks.
这对小夫妻常常发生口角。
Zhè duì xiǎo fūqī chángchángfāshēngkǒujiǎo。
The young couple often bicker with one another.
咱俩结为夫妻，也是前缘。
Zánliǎ jiéwéi fūqī，yě shì qiányuán。
It is our foreordained affinity that we should become husband and wife.
我看他二人恰是一对天造地设的夫妻。
Wǒ kàn tā èr rén qià shì yí duì tiānzàodìshè de fūqī。
I think they will make a perfect match.
你两个结为夫妻，是前世有缘。
Nǐ liǎnggè jiéwèi fūqī，shì qiánshì yǒuyuán。
Your union was predestined from a previous incarnation.
御夫(妻)
yù fū（qī）
control one\'s husband (wife)
夫妻
fūqī
husband (or man) and wife
小夫妻婚后不育，双方老人都很着急。
Xiǎofūqī hūnhòu búyù，shuāngfāng lǎorén dōu hěnzháojí。
The parents are worried about the couple who could not have a baby.
他们虽然是一对柴米夫妻，生活中却也不乏浪漫。
Tāmen suīrán shì yí duì cháimǐ fūqī，shēnghuó zhōng què yě bùfá làngmàn。
The couple is leading a poor, but romantic life.
在朋友的帮助下，这对夫妻破镜重圆。
Zài péngyou de bāngzhù xià，zhè duì fūqī pòjìngchóngyuán。
With the help of their friends, the couple reunited after years of separation.
这夫妻俩，一年到头地打闹。
Zhè fūqī liǎ，yì nián dàotóu de dǎnào。
The couple argues year round.
他们夫妻二人感情笃深，从来不吵架。
Tāmen fūqī èr rén gǎnqíng dǔshēn，cónglái bùchǎojià。
The man and his wife have always been deeply in love and have never had a single fight in their life together.
夫妻吵架，请不要恶语相加，多伤感情啊。
Fūqī chǎojià，qǐng búyào èyǔ xiāngjiā，duō shāng gǎnqíng a。
It is really hurtful when a couple hurl abuse at each other in a quarrel.
棋后棋王结为夫妻，新婚蜜月暂时封棋。
Qíhòu qíwáng jiéwéi fūqī，xīnhūn mìyuè zànshí fēngqí。
As the queen and king of chess have got married, the game will be delayed for their honeymoon.
老夫妻俩回忆起甜蜜的往事，一边赏月一边叙旧。
Lǎofūqī liǎ huíyìqǐ tiánmì de wǎngshì，yìbiān shǎngyuè yìbiān xùjiù。
While appreciating the moon, the couple recounted their happy stories.
他们夫妻二人十分恩爱，真是连理枝啊。
Tāmen fūqī èr rén shífēn ēnài，zhēnshì liánlǐzhī a。
The couple is deep in love with each other. They are really like the interlocked branches of two trees.
这夫妻二人十分般配，真是一门子好亲事呀。
Zhè fūqī èr rén shífēn bānpèi，zhēnshì yìménzi hǎo qīnshì ya。
The couple matches completely. This is a truly good marriage.
他们夫妻二人结婚以后一直琴瑟和谐。
Tāmen fūqī èrrén jiéhūn yǐhòu yìzhí qínsè héxié。
They have been living in marital harmony since they got married.
独守空房很久的她终于盼来了夫妻团聚的这一天。
Dúshǒu kōngfáng hěnjiǔ de tā zhōng yú pànlái le fūqī tuánjù de zhè yì tiān。
Having stayed at home for a long time, she finally saw the day she could reunite with her husband.
夫妻俩之间就算有什么矛盾也不能拳脚相加。
Fūqī liǎ zhījiān jiùsuàn yǒu shénme máodùn yě bùnéng quánjiǎo xiāngjiā。
No matter what happens, couples should not fight.
这对小夫妻每天傍晚都一起出来散步。
Zhè duì xiǎofūqī měitiān bàngwǎn dōu yìqǐ chūlái sànbù。
This couple go out to walk every evening.
夫妻间性生活的和谐度也会对婚姻造成影响。
Fūqī jiān xìng shēnghuó de héxié dù yě huì duì hūnyīn zàochéng yǐngxiǎng。
The degree of harmony in a couple\'s sexual life also has an impact on their marriage.
他们夫妻是白手起家。
Tāmen fūqī shì báishǒuqǐjiā。
The couple started out their business from scratch.
夫妻俩睹物思人，想起了远在他乡的儿子。
Fūqīliǎ dǔwùsīrén，xiǎngqǐle yuǎnzàitāxiāngde érzi。
The couple saw something that reminded them of their son who was far away from home.
一对夫妻
yíduì fūqī
a married couple
他们是一对恩爱夫妻。
Tāmen shì yíduì ēn\'àifūqī。
They are a devoted couple.
夫妻俩努力工作以扶养父母和孩子。
Fūqīliǎ nǔlìgōngzuò yǐ fúyǎng fùmǔ hé háizǐ。
The couple work hard to provide for their parents and children.
夫妻不和。
Fūqī bùhé。
The couple are not on good terms.
我们不该介入他们夫妻间的争吵。
Wǒmen bù gāi jièrù tāmen fūqījiān de zhēngchǎo.
We really shouldn\'t intervene in their marital strife.
夫妻俩争吵之后彻底决裂了。
Fūqīliǎng zhēngchǎo zhīhòu chèdǐ juélièle.
After their quarrel the couple completely broke it off.
夫妻俩闹别扭了。
Fūqīliǎ nàobièniǔle.
The couple have fallen out.
夫妻情分
fūqī qíngfèn
affection between husband and wife
小夫妻散伙后，孩子怎么办？
Xiǎo fūqī sànhuǒ hòu，háizi zěnmebàn？
When the young couple split up, what will happen to the children?
夫妻俩现在是天各一方。
Fūqīliǎng xiànzài shì tiāngèyìfāng。
The couple are currently far away from each other.
夫妻俩多年来相敬如宾，从没红过脸。
Fūqīliǎng duōnián lái xiāngjìngrúbīn，cóng méi hóngguòliǎn。
The couple have treated each other with respect for many years and have never had a heated exchange.
他们夫妻俩在很多方面意见不一致。
Tāmen fūqīliǎ zài hěnduō fāngmiàn yìjiàn bù yízhì。
The couple disagreed about quite a number of things.
这对夫妻经常为小事争吵。
Zhè duì fūqī jīngcháng wèi xiǎoshì zhēngchǎo。
The couple often quarrel about trivial things.
他们夫妻俩在事业上互相支持。
Tāmen fūqīliǎ zài shìyè shàng hùxiāng zhīchí。
Husband and wife support each other in their work.
有夫妻相的人是有福气的
yǒu fū qī xiàng de rén shì yǒu fú qì de
Couples who have similar looks with each other are blissful.
他千方百计地请好大夫给妻子看病。
Tā qiānfāngbǎijì de qǐnghǎo dàifu gěi qīzi kànbìng。
He is doing all he can to find good doctors to treat his wife.
妻子在究问晚归的丈夫去了哪里。
Qīzǐ zài jiūwèn wǎnguī de zhàngfū qù le nǎlǐ。
The wife is interrogating him as to where her husband went last night.
听说东北正在下雪，妻子为将要去那里出差的丈夫准备了一顶风雪帽。
Tīngshuō dōngběi zhèngzài xiàxuě，qīzǐ wèi jiāngyào qù nàlǐ chūchāi de zhàngfū zhǔnbèi le yì dǐng fēngxuěmào。
Hearing that it was snowing in the northeast, the wife made a cap for her husband, who will go there on business.

夫妻
The couple adopted a girl two years ago.
这对夫妻两年前收养了一个女孩。
After the couple had a baby, more problems arose in their marriage.
这对夫妻有了孩子后，他们的婚姻出现了更多问题。
After two hours\' explanation, the couple finally cleared up their misunderstanding.
经过两个小时的谈论，这对夫妻终于消除了误会。
I leased my downtown house to a young couple at a good price.
我把我市区的房子以很好的价格租给了一对年轻夫妻。
The couple quarreled in the middle of the supermarket.

违抗命令
wéikàngmìnglìng
disobey orders; act in defiance of orders
家父的严命谁敢违抗，你总是为难我。

抗命

这位老干部抗战时期就读于陕北公学。
Zhèwèi lǎogànbùkàngzhàn shíqī jiùdúyú Shǎnběi gōngxué。
This old cadre used to study at a public school for training cadres in Shanbei during the Anti-Japanese war.
抗日影片中，经常能看到中国军人拿着盒子炮。
Kàngrì yǐngpiàn zhōng，jīngcháng néng kàndào Zhōngguó jūnrén ná zhe hézipào。
In films about resisting Japanese aggression, Chinese soldiers are often seen with Mauser pistols.
在抗日战争时，红小鬼起了不小的作用。
Zài kàngrì zhànzhēng shí，hóngxiǎoguǐ qǐ le bùxiǎo de zuòyòng。
Little revolutionary soliders played an important role in the war against Japan.
徐彭是中国人民抗击日本侵略的风雨晦冥时的杰出人物。
Xú Péng shì Zhōngguó rénmín kàngjī Rìběn qīnlüè de fēngyǔ huìmíng shí de jiéchū rénwù。
Xu Peng was an outstanding hero during the difficult time when the Chinese people were fighting against the Japanese invasion.
面对当权者的暴行，他大声疾呼大家起来反抗。
Miànduì dāngquánzhě de bàoxíng，tā dàshēng jíhū dàjiā qǐlái fǎnkàng。
Faced with the rulers\' atrocities, he called on the public to revolt.
游行的群众都集拢在了市政府门口，向政府抗议。
Yóuxíng de qúnzhòng dōu jílǒng zài le shìzhèngfǔ ménkǒu，xiàng zhèngfǔ kàngyì。
The demonstrators gathered at the municipal government gate to protest.
宗教改革之后新教教派与旧教分庭抗礼。
Zōngjiào gǎigé zhīhòu xīnjiào jiàopài yǔ jiùjiào fēntíng kànglǐ。
After the Reformation, Protestants broke away from Catholicism.
洪灾爆发后战士们奔赴抗洪第一线救险。
Hóngzāi bàofā hòu zhànshìmen bēnfù kànghóng dìyī xiàn jiùxiǎn。
The soldiers went to the flood-stricken areas to control the flood.
奶奶1937年毕业于延安抗大。
Nǎinai yījiǔsānqī nián bìyè yú Yán\'ān kàngdà。
Grandma graduated from the Chinese People\'s Anti-Japanese Military and Political College in Yanan in 1937.
战场上他是个勇猛抗敌的英雄，日常生活中他又像个斯文的书生。
Zhànchǎng shàng tā shì gè yǒngměng kàngdí de yīngxióng，rìcháng shēnghuó zhōng tā yòu xiàng gè sīwén de shūshēng。
On the battlefield he is a brave hero fighting against enemies; during daily life he is like a refined scholar.
这收音机的抗干扰能力太差了，在汽车上都无法收听节目。
Zhè shōuyīnjī de kàng gānrǎo nénglì tài chà le，zài qìchē shàng dōu wúfǎ shōutīng jiémù。
The anti-interference function of this radio is too bad, no program can be received in the car.
荞麦是一种抗寒农作物，富含粗纤维和多种营养。
Qiáomài shì yìzhǒng kànghán nóngzuòwù，fùhán cūxiānwéi hé duōzhǒng yíngyǎng。
Buckwheat is a kind of cold-resistant crop containing coarse fiber and is very nourishing.
古代，穷苦百姓抗捐多是因为被逼无奈。
Gǔdài，qióngkǔ bǎixìng kàngjuān duōshì yīnwèi bèibī wúnài。
In ancient times, poor common people fought against unreasonable levies because they had no other choice.
在洪汛期到来之前，大家早已做好了抗涝减灾准备。
Zài hóngxùnqī dàolái zhīqián，dàjiā zǎoyǐ zuòhǎo le kànglào jiǎnzāi zhǔnbèi。
Before the arrival of the flood season, everybody was ready to fight floods and reduce damage.
清政府黑暗软弱，再加上税赋沉重，曾经逼得各地农民不断地抗粮起义。
Qīngzhèngfǔ hēi\'àn ruǎnruò，zài jiāshàng shuìfù chénzhòng，céngjīng bīdé gè dì nóngmín búduàn de kàngliáng qǐyì。
The government of the Qing Dynasty was corrupt and weak and also had heavy levies. Farmers from all over China rose up in revolt and resisted the grain levy one after another.
生物课上，老师讲到“植物是具有抗逆性的”。
Shēngwùkè shàng，lǎoshī jiǎngdào“zhíwù shì jùyǒu kàngnìxìng de”。
In biology class, the teacher said &quot;plants have resistance.&quot;
在治疗脑血栓等病时，医生通常都要使用抗凝剂。
Zài zhìliáo nǎoxuèshuān děng bìng shí，yīshēng tōngcháng dōuyào shǐyòng kàngníngjì。
When treating cerebral thrombus and diseases similar kind, doctors generally use anticoagulants.
制造汽车发动机的材料必须得是抗热的。
Zhìzào qìchē fādòngjī de cáiliào bìxū děi shì kàngrè de。
Material for making motor engines must be heat- resistant.
这孩子，在家不听家长的话倒没关系，在单位可不要随便抗上啊。
Zhè háizi，zài jiā bùtīng jiāzhǎng de huà dào méi guānxì，zài dānwèi kě búyào suíbiàn kàngshàng a。
That child\'s disobeying his parents is ok, but he should never protest against his superiors at work.
柳树的抗性极好，特别适合用于园林绿化。
Liǔshù de kàngxìng jíhǎo，tèbié shìhé yòngyú yuánlín lǜhuà。
Willow has good resistance and is especially suitable for landscaping.
抗日战争就是一场旷久的民族战争。
Kàngrì zhànzhēng jiùshì yìcháng kuàngjiǔ de mínzú zhànzhēng。
The War of Resistance against Japan was a lasting national battle.
国共两党联电全国一致抗日。
Guógòng liǎng dǎng liándiàn quánguó yízhì kàngrì.
The Kuomintang, and Communist Party declared jointly by telex nationwide unity in the fight against Japan.
联合政府的主张反映了抗战胜利前后全国各阶层人民的愿望与要求。
Liánhé zhèngfǔ de zhǔzhāng fǎnyìng le kàngzhàn shènglì qiánhòu quánguó gè jiēcéng rénmín de yuànwàng yǔ yāoqiú。
The opinions of the United Government reflected the wishes, and requests of people of different classes all over the country before and after the victory of the war.
好不容易等到河水落槽，抗洪战士们才能睡上个安稳觉了。
Hǎo bùróngyì děngdào héshuǐ luòcáo，kànghóng zhànshìmen cáinéng shuì shàng gè ānwěnjiào le。
Flood-fighters did not have a sound sleep until the river receded.
麻栎是喜光树种，深根性，抗风能力强。
Málì shì xǐguāng shùzhǒng，shēngēnxìng，kàngfēng nénglì qiáng。
Oak is a sun-loving plant and has deep roots, which can bear strong wind.
十字路口又堵车了，很多人烦躁地鸣笛抗议。
Shízì lùkǒu yòu dǔchē le，hěnduōrén fánzào de míngdí kàngyì。
There is again a traffic jam at the crossroads. Many people hoot to protest restlessly.
抗日战争时期我们全家为了跑反过着动荡的生活。
Kàngrì zhànzhēng shíqī wǒmen quánjiā wèi le pǎofǎn guò zhe dòngdàng de shēnghuó。
During the War of Resistance Against Japanese Aggression, our family lived an unstable life fleeing from war.
坦白从宽、抗拒从严是我们的一贯政策。
Tǎnbái cóngkuān、kàngjù cóngyán shì wǒmen de yíguàn zhèngcè。
It is our consistent policy to give leniency to those who confess their crimes and severity to those who refuse to do so.
他没有抵抗住糖衣炮弹的袭击，被犯罪分子拉下了水。
Tā méiyǒu dǐkàng zhù tángyī pàodàn de xíjī，bèi fànzuìfènzǐ lāxià le shuǐ。
He failed to resist the sugarcoated bullet, and was dragged into crime by hardcore criminals.
皇帝亲自统带军队抵抗外敌。
Huángdì qīnzì tǒngdài jūnduì dǐkàng wàidí。
The emperor himself led his army to defend against the offensive from outside.
侵略者遭到了各地团练的顽强抵抗。
Qīnlüèzhě zāodào le gè dì tuánliàn de wánqiáng dǐkàng。
Invaders encountered dogged defense by local armies organized by landlords all over the country.
由于反抗暴政，他过得很穷苦，晚境凄凉。
Yóuyú fǎnkàng bàozhèng，tā guò de hěnqióngkǔ，wǎnjìng qīliáng。
Opposing tyranny, he led a poor life, and was very miserable in his late years.
人民群众将反抗伪政权的斗争推向了高潮。
Rénmín qúnzhòng jiāng fǎnkàng wěizhèngquán de dòuzhēng tuī xiàng le gāocháo。
The masses have pushed the struggle against the puppet government to a climax.
在抗击匈奴的战争中立功，他被授予王爷的位号。
Zài kàngjī xiōngnú de zhànzhēng zhōng lìgōng，tā bèi shòuyǔ wángye de wèihào。
He was made a duke for his contribution in fighting against the Huns.
赵国正在招幕侠士，准备与强秦对抗。
Zhàoguó zhèngzài zhāomù xiáshì，zhǔnbèi yǔ qiángqín duìkàng。
The Zhao kingdom is recruiting knights to fight against the stronger Qing kingdom.
家父的严命谁敢违抗，你总是为难我。
Jiāfù de yánmìng shuí gǎn wéikàng，nǐ zǒngshì wéinán wǒ。
Don\'t make it tough for me, as no one dares to disobey my father.
国民党军队依凭长江险要，积极反抗，还是失败了。
Guómíndǎng jūnduì yīpíng Cháng Jiāng xiǎnyào，jījí fǎnkàng，háishi shībài le。
Depending on the Changjiang River, the Kuomintang armies fought actively against their enemies, but they were still defeated.
渔民们自发地组织起来共同对抗渔霸。
Yúmínmen zìfā de zǔzhī qǐlái gòngtóng duìkàng yúbà。
Fishermen organized spontaneously to struggle against the local despot that had monopolized the fishing market.
如果侵略者再犯，我们会誓死抵抗！
Rúguǒ qīnlüèzhě zàifàn，wǒmen huì shìsǐ dǐkàng！
If the invaders dare to come once again, we swear to fight against them until the last minute.
为了尽快搞清楚前面的灾情，抗洪部队发射了很多照明弹。
Wèile jǐnkuài gǎo qīngchu qiánmiàn de zāiqíng，kànghóng bùduì fāshè le hěnduō zhàomíngdàn。
In order to figure out the situation of the disaster in front, the troops fighting the flood have launched several flares.
为了抗击外国的侵略，他们自发组成志愿军。

For the purpose of fighting against  the foreign invasion, they organized spontaneously an army composed of volunteers.
广大的一线医务人员成为了抗击非典的主力军。
Guǎngdà de yīxiàn yīwù rényuán chéngwéi le kàngjī fēidiǎn de zhǔlìjūn。
A large number of medical workers working at the front line have become the main force for fighting SARS.
八路军在抗日战争中充分发挥了运动战的作用。

在军事博物馆里，我们参观了抗日时期的轰炸机。

我们应该坚持锻炼以增强对疾病的抵抗力。

stand up to sb. as an equal; act independently and defiantly

由于建筑规划和空气污染等因素，城市的热岛效应越来越严重了。
Yóuyú jiànzhù guīhuà hé kōngqì wūrǎn děng yīnsù，chéngshì de rèdǎo xiàoyìng yuèláiyuè yánzhòng le。
Because of factors such as construction layout and air pollution, the city\'s heat island effect is getting more and more severe.

我想在热带岛屿上度假。

岛国
dǎoguó
island nation
西沙群岛属于中国。
Xīshā Qúndǎo shǔyú Zhōngguó。
The Xisha Islands belong to China.
西沙群岛自古即为我国领土，这些文物就是明证。
Xīshāqúndǎo zìgǔ jí wéi wǒguó lǐngtǔ，zhèxiē wénwù jiùshì míngzhèng。
These cultural relics are clear proof that the Xisha Islands have been China\'s territory since ancient times.
我国有大陆岛，海南岛就是其中一个。
Wǒ guó yǒu dàlùdǎo，Hǎinándǎo jiùshì qí zhōng yí gè。
Hainan is one of several continental islands that are part of our country.
青岛、上海都是我国重要的港埠。
Qīngdǎo、Shànghǎi dōushì wǒguó zhòngyào de gǎngbù。
Qingdao and Shanghai are important ports in China.
美国太平洋岛屿托管地包括马里亚纳、马绍尔、加罗林三大群岛。
Měiguó Tàipíngyáng dǎoyǔ tuōguǎndì bāokuò Mǎlǐyànà、Mǎshàoěr、Jiāluólín sān dà qúndǎo。
The islands in the Pacific Ocean trusted by the UN to the US include the Mariana, Marshall, and Caroline islands.
青岛生产的鲜啤在全中国都很有名气。
Qīngdǎo shēngchǎn de xiānpí zài quán Zhōngguó dōu hěn yǒu míngqì。
The fresh beer made by Qingdao is  widely known in China.
日本是一个岛国
祖国的宝岛台湾。
法西斯多次空袭英国本土，使英伦三岛蒙受巨大损失。
Nudity and topless bathing are still taboo in poor Balkan countries.
全身或半裸游泳在贫穷的巴尔干半岛国家仍然是被禁止的。
The missionaries evangelized the pacific islanders.
Chuánjiàoshì xiàng zhèxiē Tàipíngyáng dǎoguó jūmín chuánjiào。
传教士向这些太平洋岛国居民传教。
The Arab peninsula was partitioned by the British.
Ālābóbàndǎo bèi Yīngguórén huàfēn wéi bù tóng bùfen。
阿拉伯半岛被英国人划分为不同部分。
East Frisian Islands
东弗里西亚群岛，属联邦德国
North Frisian Islands
北弗里西亚群岛，被联邦德国和丹麦划分
Of the three American virgin islands st. Thomas is the most touristed.
Zài sān gè Měiguó yuánshǐ dǎoyǔ zhōng，Shèng·Tuōmǎsīdǎo zuì shòu yóukè huānyíng。
在三个美国原始岛屿中，圣·托马斯岛最受游客欢迎。
The island of Taiwan and surrounding islands are administered by the Republic of China.
Táiwāndǎo hé qí zhōuwéi de dǎoyǔ yóu Zhōnghuámínguó guǎnxiá。
台湾岛和其周围的岛屿由中华民国管辖。
The US finally conquered the island after increasing the invasion force
Měiguó zài zēngjiāle rùqīn de bīnglì zhīhòu，zhōngyú zhēngfúle zhè zuò dǎo。
美国在增加了入侵的兵力之后，终于征服了这座岛。
我国有大陆岛，海南岛就是其中一个。
Wǒ guó yǒu dàlùdǎo，Hǎinándǎo jiùshì qí zhōng yí gè。
Hainan is one of several continental islands that are part of our country.
他已经游历了离岛中的绝大多数岛屿。
Tā yǐjing yóulì le lídǎo zhōng de jué dàduōshù dǎoyǔ。
He has already visited most of the islands, and islets of Lidao Island.
美国太平洋岛屿托管地包括马里亚纳、马绍尔、加罗林三大群岛。
Měiguó Tàipíngyáng dǎoyǔ tuōguǎndì bāokuò Mǎlǐyànà、Mǎshàoěr、Jiāluólín sān dà qúndǎo。
The islands in the Pacific Ocean trusted by the UN to the US include the Mariana, Marshall, and Caroline islands.
传说中的仙岛是神仙们居住的美丽的小岛。
Chuánshuō zhōng de xiāndǎo shì shénxiānmen jūzhù de měilì de xiǎodǎo。
The fairy island in the stories is the pretty islands  where the immortals live.
他们已经在海南岛安家落户。
Tāmen yǐjing zài Hǎinán Dǎo ānjiāluòhù。
They have settled in Hainan.
饱览海岛的美丽风光
bǎolǎn hǎidǎo de měilì fēngguāng 
drink in the beauty of the island scenery
预订去青岛的船票
yùdìngqù Qīngdǎo de chuánpiào 
book one\'s passage to Qingdao
《海岛春秋》
《Hǎidǎo Chūnqiū》 
The Chronicle of an Island (a short story)
岛的南端
dǎo de nánduān
the southern tip (or end) of the island
西沙群岛是由珊瑚礁构成的。
Xīshā qúndǎo shì yóu shānhújiāo gòuchéng de。
The Xisha Archipelago is formed of coral reefs.
该岛的归属早已确定无疑。
Gāi dǎo de guīshǔ zǎo yǐ quèdìngwúyí。
The ownership of the island has long been established beyond dispute.
西沙群岛自古即为我国领土，这些文物就是明证。
Xīshāqúndǎo zìgǔ jí wéi wǒguó lǐngtǔ，zhèxiē wénwù jiùshì míngzhèng。
These cultural relics are clear proof that the Xisha Islands have been China\'s territory since ancient times.
拟于下月前往青岛
nǐ yú xià yuè qiánwǎnɡ Qīnɡdǎo
plan to go to Qingdao next month
我军一举歼灭了盘踞海岛的敌人。
Wǒ jūn yìjǔ jiānmiè le pánjù hǎidǎo de dírén。
At one stroke our troops wiped out the enemy who were entrenched on the island.
许多水鸟在岛上栖息。
Xǔduō shuǐniǎo zài dǎo shàngqīxī。
A great number of water fowls dwell on the island.
西沙群岛属于中国。
Xīshā Qúndǎo shǔyú Zhōngguó。
The Xisha Islands belong to China.
岛上杂草丛生，异常索寞。
Dǎo shàng zácǎo cóngshēng，yìcháng suǒmò。
The island was overgrown with weeds and looked extremely desolate.
沿海岛屿
yánhǎi dǎoyǔ
offshore islands
水天相接，岛屿隐现。
Shuǐ tiān xiāngjiē，dǎoyǔ yǐnxiàn。
The water merges with the sky; the islands are dimly visible.
印度支那半岛
Yìndù zhīnà bàndǎo 
the Indo-Chinese Peninsula; Indo-China
岛屿
dǎoyǔ
islands and islets; islands
昨天在安全岛附近我看见他帮助一位老人过马路。
Zuótiān zài Ānquándǎo fùjìn wǒ kànjiàn tā bāngzhù yíwèi lǎorén guò mǎlù。
I saw him helping an old man across the street by the pedestrian area.
这艘游轮正驶往澳门本岛。
Zhè sōu yóulún zhèng shǐ wǎng Àomén běndǎo。
This yacht is heading to the main island of Macao.
成百上千种鸟类在这个海岛栖息。
Chéngbǎi shàngqiān zhǒng niǎolèi zài zhège hǎidǎo qīxī。
Hundreds of birds inhabit on the island.
随着城市的发展，城市热岛效应越来越严重了。
Suí zhe chéngshì de fāzhǎn，chéngshì rèdǎo xiàoyìng yuèláiyuè yánzhòng le。
With the city development, &quot;urban heat island&quot; effect becomes more and more severe.
青岛、上海都是我国重要的港埠。
Qīngdǎo、Shànghǎi dōushì wǒguó zhòngyào de gǎngbù。
Qingdao and Shanghai are important ports in China.
我这件衣服是海岛棉作的。
Wǒ zhèjiàn yīfu shì hǎidǎomián zuò de。
My coat is made of sea-island cotton.
碧海蓝天烘衬着这座小岛，使它显得十分美丽。
Bìhǎi lántiān hōngchènzhe zhèzuò xiǎodǎo，shǐ tā xiǎnde shífēn měilì。
Set against the blue see and sky, the island seems all the more beautiful.
交通岛上的警察正在指挥交通。
Jiāotōngdǎo shàng de jǐngchá zhèngzài zhǐhuī jiāotōng。
The policeman is commanding traffic on the traffic island.
对于这个岛的命名，我们认真考虑了名从主人的原则。
Duìyú zhège dǎo de mìngmíng，wǒmen rènzhēn kǎolǜ le míngcóng zhǔrén de yuánzé。
We have seriously taken into consideration the principle of giving a name after its master in naming this island.
琼剧在海南岛一带很流行。
Qióngjù zài Hǎinándǎo yídài hěnliúxíng。
Hainan opera is popular in the area around Hainan island.
由于建筑规划和空气污染等因素，城市的热岛效应越来越严重了。
Yóuyú jiànzhù guīhuà hé kōngqì wūrǎn děng yīnsù，chéngshì de rèdǎo xiàoyìng yuèláiyuè yánzhòng le。
Because of factors such as construction layout and air pollution, the city\'s heat island effect is getting more and more severe.
这个珊瑚岛上栖息着很多种海鸟。
Zhège shānhúdǎo shàng qīxī zhe hěnduō zhǒng hǎiniǎo。
Many types of seabirds inhabit the coral island.
青岛生产的鲜啤在全中国都很有名气。
Qīngdǎo shēngchǎn de xiānpí zài quán Zhōngguó dōu hěn yǒu míngqì。
The fresh beer made by Qingdao is  widely known in China.
除了孤独，一个人在岛上的生活倒也萧然。
Chúle gūdú，yígèrén zài dǎo shàng de shēnghuó dàoyě xiāorán。
Apart from loneliness, there is nothing unpleasant about living on an island alone.
这次震区波及了整个岛国。
Zhècì zhènqū bōjí le zhěnggè dǎoguó。
The earthquake affected the entire island country.
由于处在太平洋地震带，这个岛国经常发生强烈地震。
Yóuyú chǔzài Tàipíngyángdìzhèndài，zhège dǎoguó jīngcháng fāshēng qiángliè dìzhèn。
Located in the Pacific Ring of Fire, this island country is often struck by strong earthquakes.

bàndǎo

The island of Taiwan and surrounding islands are administered by the Republic of China.

台湾岛和其周围的岛屿由中华民国管辖。
The centre of the isaland sank into the sea leaving a crescent shaped island.
Dǎo de zhōngxīn yǐ chénrù hǎidǐ，liúxià yí gè xīnyuèxíng dǎoyǔ。
岛的中心已沉入海底，留下一个新月形岛屿。
The pirates hid their treasure on a small island in the west Indies.
Hǎidào bǎ bǎowù cángzài xī Yìndù Qúndǎo zhōng de yí gè xiǎodǎo shàng。
海盗把宝物藏在西印度群岛中的一个小岛上。
Bahrain has been an entrepot of trade between Arabia and India since the second millennium BC.
Bālín Dǎo zìcóng gōngyuánqián 200 nián qǐ jiùshì Ālābó Bàndǎo hé Yìndù zhījiān de màoyì zhōngxīn。
巴林岛自从公元前200年起就是阿拉伯半岛和印度之间的贸易中心。
Of the three American virgin islands st. Thomas is the most touristed.
Zài sān gè Měiguó yuánshǐ dǎoyǔ zhōng，Shèng·Tuōmǎsīdǎo zuì shòu yóukè huānyíng。
在三个美国原始岛屿中，圣·托马斯岛最受游客欢迎。

二十世纪五十年代之前，格陵兰岛的平均寿命是35岁左右。
We have to keep the memory of Hiroshima and Nagasaki alive in order to avoid similar tragedies in the future.
我们要记得广岛和长崎事件，以避免将来再次发生类似惨剧。
The south of the island has the best waves to surf.
岛屿南部的水域最适合冲浪。
I would like to spend my holidays on a tropical island.
我想在热带岛屿上度假。
This is probably the most quiet and peaceful island you can find in the Mediterranean sea.
在地中海区域，这可能是你能找到的最安静的岛屿了。
On the pacific islands, people enjoy a soft life.
在太平洋岛屿居住的人们享受着悠闲的生活。
He planned to voyage to a distant island in his handmade boat.
他准备划着自制的小船到遥远的海岛上去。
I have two first class roundtrip airline tickets to Maui, Hawaii.
我有两张头等舱往返机票，是去夏威夷毛伊岛的。
The islands were formed comparatively recently.
这些岛屿是在比较近的年代形成的。

军队被派往岛上以恢复秩序。
After their boat sank they wound up on a desert island.
他们的船沉没后，他们被风吹到了一个荒无人烟的小岛上。
Nobody live on that island because there are too many insects and snakes.
那个岛上没人住，因为有太多的虫子和蛇。
The bridge links the island to the mainland.
这座桥把该岛与大陆连接在一起。
The guide rowed the tourists to the little island.
向导划船将游客们送到了小岛上。
All visitors to the central island need to go by row.
所有要去中心岛的游客都需要乘船去。
The row to that island is around two miles.
去那个岛的划程在两英里左右。
Last night the U-boat was towed by a trawler to Iceland.
昨晚那艘U潜艇被一艘拖网渔船拖到了冰岛。
His visions of utopianmism brought him to this island.
他带着不切实际的憧憬，来到了这个岛。
The vessel is sailing from Qingdao to Seoul.
这艘船正从青岛开往首尔。
England, Scotland and Wales compose the island of Great Britain.
英格兰、格兰和威尔士构成大不列颠岛。
Two radar units provide low-altitude coverage of the entire island.
两套雷达能够探测整个岛的低空范围。
Have you ever imagined yourself living alone on a desert island?
你想象过一个人住在荒岛上的情形吗？
Nudity and topless bathing are still taboo in poor Balkan countries.
全身或半裸游泳在贫穷的巴尔干半岛国家仍然是被禁止的。
The main transportation between the two islands are ships.
这两个岛间的主要运输工具是船舶。
This delusory vision kept him out of action at Midway.
这种狂妄的幻想使他在中途岛战役中一无作为。
He will fly around the eastern edge of the island.
Tā huì zài zhè zuò dǎoyǔ dōngbù biānyuán de shàngkōng huánrǎo fēixíng。
他会在这座岛屿东部边缘的上空环绕飞行。
A nuclear bomb exploded in Hiroshima.
Yì kē yuánzǐdàn zài Guǎngdǎo bàozhà。
一颗原子弹在广岛爆炸。
I still remember the exquisite pleasure I experienced in Bali.
Wǒ yīrán jìdé zài Bālídǎo suǒ jīnglì de nà zhǒng jùliè de kuàigǎn。
我依然记得在巴厘岛所经历的那种剧烈的快感。
I was looking forward to the thrill of reaching the highest spot in the British Isles.
Wǒ qīdàizhe gǎnshòu nàzhǒng dàodá Búlièdiān qúndǎo zuìgāodiǎn de xīngfèn。
我期待着感受那种到达不列颠群岛最高点的兴奋。
The transportation system in this island depended heavily on cattle.
Gāi dǎo shàng de yùnshū xìtǒng hěn dà chéngdù shàng yīkào niú lái jìnxíng。
该岛上的运输系统很大程度上依靠牛来进行。
A vacation to a tropical island was just the thing.
Qù rèdài dǎoyǔ dùjià zhèngshì wǒ suǒ xiǎng de。
去热带岛屿度假正是我所想的。
This fruit was derived from the tropical islands.
Zhè zhǒng shuǐguǒ chǎnzì rèdài dǎoyǔ。
这种水果产自热带岛屿。
A group of survivors were deserted on an island.
Yìxiē xìngcúnzhě bèi yíwàng zài dǎo shàng。
一些幸存者被遗忘在岛上。
The rebels were being detained in an island.
Pànluànfènzǐ bèi kòuyā zài yí zuò dǎoshàng。
叛乱分子被扣押在一座岛上。
A devasting storm headed towards the island.
Yì chǎng láishì xiōngměng de fēngbào zhèng xiàng dǎoshàng xílái。
一场来势凶猛的风暴正向岛上袭来。
The animals on this island have diversified.
Dǎoshàng de dòngwù duōzhǒngduōyàng。
岛上的动物多种多样。
There are several types of dragons on this island.
Zài zhège dǎoshàng shēnghuózhe jǐ zhǒng lèixíng de xīyì
在这个岛上生活着几种类型的蜥蜴
Large areas of the islands are pitch black at night.
Qúndǎo de hěndà bùfen zài yèwǎn yípiàn qīhēi。
群岛的很大部分在夜晚一片漆黑。
Oil fires were blazing in the north of the island.
Shíyóu yǐnqǐ de dàhuǒ zhèngzài xiǎodǎo běibù ránshāo。
石油引起的大火正在小岛北部燃烧。
Boats sail to the islands from just about every part of the city.
Jīhū kěyǐ cóng chéngshì de Rènhédìfāng chéngchuán dàodá gāi dǎo。
几乎可以从城市的任何地方乘船到达该岛。
The island\'s length is 74 miles; its greatest breadth 67 miles.
Gāi dǎoyǔ de chángdù wéi 74 yīnglǐ；qí zuìkuān de dìfang wéi 67 yīnglǐ。
该岛屿的长度为74英里；其最宽的地方为67英里。
A few land birds occasionally breed upon the islands.
Yǒuxiē lùdì niǎolèi ǒu\'ěr yě zài hǎidǎo shàng fánzhí。
有些陆地鸟类偶尔也在海岛上繁殖。
Once a week a barbeque is organised on an uninhabited island.
Yìzhōu zǔzhī yí cì huāngdǎo yěchuī。
一周组织一次荒岛野炊。
We were charmed by the natural beauty of the island.
Wǒmen bèi dǎoshàng de zìrán měijǐng suǒ xīyǐn。

Wǒmen de mùbiāo shì quánlì dǎzào zhìnéngxíng diànshìjī。
Our goal is to spare no effort to make a kind of intelligent television.
经常玩益智游戏能促进儿童智力的发展。
Jīngcháng wán yìzhì yóuxì néng cùjìn értóng zhìlì de fāzhǎn。
Playing games for brain development can speed the development of babies\' intelligence.
面对敌人的进攻，将军已计穷智短，无能为力。

The general had exhausted all his means and could do nothing to hold back the enemy\'s attack.
我们不能只关心孩子智力因素的训练，而忽略了非智力因素的培养。

We should concern ourselves with the intellectual factors as well as the non-intellectual ones of our children.
迷信可能会让人丧失理智。
Míxìn kěnéng huì ràng rén sàngshī lǐzhì.
Superstition may cause people to behave irrationally.
面对歹徒，他总能表现出泰然自若的神情，充分体现出一位老刑警的冷静与睿智。
Miànduì dǎitú，tā zǒng néng biǎoxiàn chū tàiránzìruò de shénqíng，chōngfèn tǐxiàn chū yíwèi lǎoxíngjǐng de lěngjìng yǔ ruìzhì。

The Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region is issuing smart identity cards to replace the old ID cards.
香港特别行政区政府正在发放新的智能身份证，来取代过去的普通身份证。
In Europe, the health insurance and banking industries use smart cards extensively.
在欧洲，健康保险和银行都在广泛使用智能卡。
The microprocessor on the smart card is there for security.
智能卡上的微处理器是为了确保安全。
The inside of a smart card usually contains an embedded microprocessor.
智能卡上的内部通常会嵌入一个微处理器。
The old parking meters doesn\'t accept smart cards only change.
老式停车计时器不接受智能卡，只接受硬币。

There was one girl in the class who was very backward with a mental age of five.
Bān zhōng yǒu yí gè xuéxí fēicháng bèn de nǚhái，tā de zhìnéng niánlíng jǐnyǒu wǔsuì。
班中有一个学习非常笨的女孩，她的智能年龄仅有五岁。
It is intelligent in making repairs to wounds as well as fighting disease.
Tā zài xiūfù shāngkǒu hé zhìliáo bìngtòng fāngmiàn dōu hěn zhìnéng。
它在修复伤口和治疗病痛方面都很智能。

Tā tài gāogū zìjǐ de zhìhuì hé néngliàng le。

智者乐水，仁者乐山。
zhìzhěyàoshuǐ，rénzhěyàoshān。
让孩子自己去社会上闯吧，不经一事，不长一智！
Ràng háizi zìjǐ qù shèhuìshàng chuǎngba，bùjīng yí shì，bùzhǎng yí zhì！
Let the children to leave home to gain both experience, and wisdom.
此人沉勇有智谋，很受将军的器重。
Cǐrén chényǒng yǒu zhìmóu，hěnshòu jiāngjūn de qìzhòng。
He is both brave and steady, and is highly regarded by his general.
做人要吃一堑长一智，善于吸取教训。
Zuò rén yào chī yíqiàn zhǎng yízhì，shànyú xīqǔ jiàoxùn。
One should be good at learning from their experiences: a fall into the pit, can contribute to a gain in your wit.
鲁智深倒拔垂杨柳，这个故事你听过吗？
Lǔ Zhìshēn dàobá chuíyángliǔ，zhège gùshì nǐ tīngguò ma？
Have you heard the story of Luzhishen pulling out a weeping willow from the ground?
科技创新政策给科技工作者提供了发挥才智的大舞台。
Kējì chuàngxīn zhèngcè gěi kējì gōngzuòzhě tígōng le fāhuī cáizhì de dàwǔtái。
The policy of innovation through science and technology provides a stage for scientists, and technicians to put their full talents to use.
我们要奖励德智体全面发展的学生。
Wǒmen yào jiǎnglì dézhìtǐ quánmiàn fāzhǎn de xuésheng。
We should award those students who have combined development in moral, intellectual and physical education.
这几名学生，德智体美全面发展。
Zhè jǐ míng xuésheng，dézhìtǐměi quánmiàn fāzhǎn。
These students are well developed in moral, intellectual, physical, aesthetics and labor education.
这个可怜的孩子是一个低智儿童。
Zhège kělián de háizi shì yígè dīzhì értóng。
This poor child is mentally retarded.
借故智，成新事。
Jiè gù zhì,chéng xīn shì.
Adopting old trick to do new business.
我买的新车装有智能自动管控系统。
Wǒ mǎi de xīnchē zhuāngyǒu zhìnéng zìdòng guǎnkòng xìtǒng。
My newly-bought car is equipped with an automatic control system.
他有虎胆却没智慧，遇到危险也只管往前冲。
Tā yǒu hǔdǎn què méi zhìhuì，yùdào wēixiǎn yě zhǐguǎn wǎngqián chōng。
He is a man of dauntless courage, but he lacks wisdom. When confronted with danger, he just rushes forward.
这位智者的训诫使我豁然开朗，明白了很多道理
Zhèwèi zhìzhě de xùnjiè shǐ wǒ huōrán kāilǎng，míngbai le hěnduō dàolǐ
The sage\'s sermon suddenly cleared my view and made me understand many theories.
现在的机器人越来越智能化了。
Xiànzài de jīqìrén yuèláiyuè zhìnénghuà le。
Today\'s robots are more and more intelligent.
面对敌人的进攻，将军已计穷智短，无能为力。
Miànduì dírén de jìngōng，jiāngjūn yǐ jìqióng zhìduǎn，wúnéng wéilì。
The general had exhausted all his means and could do nothing to hold back the enemy\'s attack.
军人要是不知道纪纲，那还有什么智信仁勇严的武德教育和军人品格，以及民族精神可言呢？
Jūnrén yàoshì bùzhīdào jìgāng，nà háiyǒu shénme zhìxìnrényǒngyán de wǔdé jiàoyù hé jūnrén pǐngé，yǐjí mínzú jīngshén kěyán ne？
What military education and quality of intelligence, faith, benevolence, bravery and strictness, and national spirit can be spoken of, if a soldier doesn\'t know laws and disciplines?
禅学是穷理尽性之学，可以使人明智。
Chánxué shì qiónglǐ jìnxìng zhī xué，kěyǐ shǐ rén míngzhì。
Buddhism can fully develop one\'s nature and make one wise.
在与老奸巨猾的骗子进行周旋时，所需要的不仅仅是才智还要有勇敢和镇定。
Zài yǔ lǎojiān jùhuá de piànzi jìnxíng zhōuxuán shí，suǒ xūyào de bùjǐnjǐn shì cáizhì háiyào yǒu yǒnggǎn hé zhèndìng。
When struggling with wily cheaters, we need not only ability and wisdom but also boldness and equanimity.
如今的楼宇日益智能化了。
Rújīn de lóuyǔ rìyì zhìnénghuà le。
Buildings nowadays have become more and more intelligent.
这个地区的文化教育普及率较高，所以民智也普遍较高。
Zhège dìqū de wénhuà jiàoyù pǔjílǜ jiàogāo，suǒyǐ mínzhì yě pǔbiàn jiàogāo。
This region has a high popularization of education, so the literacy of people is also relatively high.
宝宝生日那天，我送给她一个开发智力的魔板玩具。
Bǎobao shēngrì nàtiān，wǒ sònggěi tā yígè kāifā zhìlì de móbǎn wánjù。
On the baby’s birthday, I gave her a magic toy which can help develop her intellect.
机智的警察在匪徒掏枪的瞬间将其扑倒，避免了伤亡。
Jīzhì de jǐngchá zài fěitú tāoqiāng de shùnjiān jiāng qí pūdǎo，bìmiǎn le shāngwáng。
The wise policeman threw himself at the gangster and knocked him down just as he was pulling out the gun, avoiding injuries and deaths.
这部书融汇着许多学者的智慧思想。
Zhèbù shū rónghuì zhe xǔduō xuézhě dìzhìhuì sīxiǎng。
The book collects the wisdom and thoughts of many scholars.
他已经喝醉了，神智不太清楚。
Tā yǐjing hēzuì le，shénzhì bú tài qīngchu。
He is drunk now, he isn\'t clear thinking clearly.
智慧的人善于用理性来控制过度的嗜欲。
Zhìhuì de rén shànyú yòng lǐxìng lái kòngzhì guòdù de shìyù。
Intelligent people are good at using reason to control excessive addictions.
他每天诵经，从中领悟到了大智慧。
Tā měitiān sòngjīng，cóng zhōng lǐngwù dào le dàzhìhuì。
He reads religious scriptures every day, from which he understood a great deal of deep wisdom.
面对歹徒，他总能表现出泰然自若的神情，充分体现出一位老刑警的冷静与睿智。
Miànduì dǎitú，tā zǒng néng biǎoxiàn chū tàiránzìruò de shénqíng，chōngfèn tǐxiàn chū yíwèi lǎoxíngjǐng de lěngjìng yǔ ruìzhì。
He is calm and fearless when faced with a gangster, displaying the soberness and wisdom of a long-time criminal policeman.
兄弟阋墙是不明智的，也是大家最不想看到的。
Xiōngdi xìqiáng shì bùmíngzhì de，yěshì dàjiā zuì bùxiǎng kàndào de。
It is not wise for brothers to quarrel between themselves, and it is also something no one wants to see.
别看他年纪小，智龄却很高。

Though he is quite young, he has a high brain age.

Book of Wisdom, or simply Wisdom, is one of the seven sapiential or wisdom books of the Septuagint Old Testament.
《Suǒluómén Zhìhuì》，huò jiǎnchēng《Zhìhuì》，shì《Jiùyuē Shèngjīng》 de qīdà zhìhuì shū zhīyī。
《所罗门智慧》，或简称《智慧》，是《旧约圣经》的七大智慧书之一。

Zǒngtǒng fūrén zài jiàoyù fāngmiàn shì tā de mùhòu zhìnáng。
总统夫人在教育方面是他的幕后智囊。
The soldier was completely amuck.
Zhège shìbīng chèdǐ shīqù lǐzhì le。
这个士兵彻底失去理智了。

丧失理智
sàngshī lǐzhì 
lose one\'s reason; lose one\'s senses

失掉理智
shīdiào lǐzhì
lose one\'s senses

Zài zhè zhǒng tèshū qíngkuàng xià wèn tā de niánlíng shì hěn bù míngzhì de。
在这种特殊情况下问她的年龄是很不明智的。
It is neither polite nor politic to get into other people\'s quarrels.
Jiārù biérén de zhēngchǎo zhī zhōng jì bù détǐ yě bù míngzhì。
加入别人的争吵之中既不得体也不明智。
Running on the ice is inadvisable.
Zài bīngmiàn shàng pǎo bù míngzhì。
在冰面上跑不明智。
He acted rather unintelligently in this crisis.
Tā zài zhècì wēijī zhōng zuò de fēicháng bù míngzhì。
他在这次危机中做的非常不明智。
It would be ill-advised to accept the offer.
Jiēshòu gāi bàojià bù míngzhì。
接受该报价不明智。
An unwise investor is soon impoverished.
Yí gè bù míngzhì de tóuzīrén hěn kuài jiùhuì hàojìn zìjǐ de qiáncái。
一个不明智的投资人很快就会耗尽自己的钱财。
When you fall in love, it\'s impossible to listen to the voice of reason.
人一坠入情网，就听不见理智的声音了。
The old parking meters doesn\'t accept smart cards only change.
老式停车计时器不接受智能卡，只接受硬币。
I never appreciate his imagination in flattering the manager.
我对他在奉承经理方面表现出的才智不以为然。
His intellectual quality is not only reflected in work, but also in his skill of interpersonal relationship.
他的卓越才智不仅反映在工作中，也表现在与人相处的技能上。
Then suddenly she was wide awake, nerves jangling again, thoughts chaotic.
Nàshí，tā tūrán wánquán xǐnglái，shénjīng zàicì shòudào cìjī，ránhòu yòu shénzhì bù qīng。
那时，她突然完全醒来，神经再次受到刺激，然后又神智不清。
Alzheimer\'s is responsible for her destroyed mind.
Lǎonián chīdāizhèng dǎozhì tā shénzhìbùqīng。
老年痴呆症导致她神智不清。
She was tactful enough not to shatter his illusion.
Tā zúgòu jīzhì，bú zhìyú qù dǎpò tā de huànxiǎng。
她足够机智，不至于去打破他的幻想。
blind destiny
不是受理智支配的命运

智慧不仅在于认识事实。
The number of exams done is not a good measure of cleverness.
大量的考试不是测试智商的好办法。
Having your body pierced is kind of crazy.
在你自己身体上穿孔可不怎么明智。

惹恼上司可不是个明智的选择。
His tendency to stand his ground was not necessarily sensible.
Tā de tèxìng jiùshì jiānchíjǐjiàn，suīrán zhè bùyídìng míngzhì。
他的特性就是坚持己见，虽然这不一定明智。
With all of her talent, she couldn\'t find a way to win.

to be mentally handicapped
智力发育不全
I departed from conventional wisdom.
Wǒ yǔ chuántǒng zhìhuì gégébúrù。
我与传统智慧格格不入。
In relation to intellectual capacity, not everyone has the opportunity to attend.
Yīnwèi hé zhìlì yǒuguān，bú shì měi gè rén dōu yǒu cānyù de jīhuì。
因为和智力有关，不是每个人都有参与的机会。

任何一个神智清醒的人是不会提供变质或者过于一般的食物的！

The fly detective couldn\'t be tricked by any thieves in England.

这本书被毫不谦虚地命名为《关于智慧的一切》。
传略。
a capsule biography
简历，简略的传记
The coach called a draw for the next play.

a rough (or approximate) estimate

要略
yàoluè
summary
战略要点
zhànlüè yàodiǎn
strategic point
占据重要的战略地位
zhànjù zhòngyào de zhànlüè dìwèi 
occupy a position of strategic importance
战略要冲
zhànluèyàochōng
place of strategic importance
企业的管理者要谙熟经略之法。

The manager of a company must be familiar with ways to run a company.
你要用心去领略中国艺术的精微。
Nǐ yào yòngxīn qù lǐnglüè Zhōngguó yìshù de jīngwēi。
You must try to comprehend the profoundity and subtlety of Chinese art.
我们忽略了一个重要的细节。
Wǒmen hūlüè le yígè zhóngyào de xìjié。
We overlooked an important detail.
他忽略了一个重要的细故，致使结论错误。
Tā hūlüè le yígè zhòngyào de xìgù，zhìshǐ jiélùn cuòwù。
He neglected an important condition which led to a incorrect conclusion.
简略地拟出计划要点
jiǎnlüè de nǐchū jìhuà yàodiǎn 
sketch out the main points of the plan

疏略细节是你失败的主要原因。
Shūlüè xìjié shì nǐ shībài de zhǔyào yuányīn。
The main reason for your failure is your neglect of details.
要略
《金匮要略》(汉末张仲景著)。
处理此事，要策略一些
争夺战略要地。
抢占战略要点。
这点很重要，千万不能忽略。
Don\'t ignore the specifics when reading the contract.
看合同时不要忽略细节。
Do not ignore warnings from the locals if the volcano is active, it can be very dangerous near the summit

This curt sumMary is not meant to be ungracious.
Jiǎnlüè de zhāiyào bìng bú yìwèizhe jiùyào méi xīyǐnlì。
简略的摘要并不意味着就要没吸引力。
His first task was to give the new group a strategic thrust.
Tā de shǒuyàorènwù shì yǒu cèlüè de jīlì zhè zhī xīn duì de shìqì。
他的首要任务是有策略地激励这支新队的士气。
A form-only requirement is usually ignored.
Xíngshì shàng de yāoqiú jīngcháng bèi hūlüè。
形式上的要求经常被忽略。
They say a pest control campaign is needed to stop a squirrel population explosion.
Jùshuō xūyào yòng chónghài fángzhì cèlüè lái kòngzhì sōngshǔ shùliàng de zēngzhǎng。
据说需要用虫害防治策略来控制松鼠数量的增长。
A rough idea how long it would take.
Duì xūyào duō cháng shíjiān de cūlüè gūjì。
对需要多长时间的粗略估计。
It splits hairs over non-essential points and ignores the fact that it wouldn\'t matter.
Zhè búguòs hì zài wèi suǒshì ér zhēngbiàn，hūlüèle zhè bìng bú zhòngyào de shìshí。
这不过是在为琐事而争辩，忽略了这并不重要的事实。
Pakistan became a country of paramount geostrategic importance to the United States.

巴基斯坦对于美国而言已经成为地理战略位置极为重要的国家。

为了提高我们的工作效率，不必要的登记程序必须省略掉。
How the future military strategy might be developed is the main purpose of this book.

本书主要阐述了未来军事战略将如何发展。

Yǒu bìyào quánmiàn dì kǎolǜ nǐmen de tuìchū cèluè。
有必要全面地考虑你们的退出策略。
The requirement was only formal and often ignored.
Gāi yāoqiú zhǐshì xíngshì shàng de，jīngcháng bèi hūlüè。
该要求只是形式上的，经常被忽略。
He skimmed over some of the central arguments on both sides.
Tā lüè dúle yíxià shuāngfāng de yìxiē zhǔyào guāndiǎn。
他略读了一下双方的一些主要观点。
Intelligence sources told us we should change our strategy if we want to win the war.
从情报来看，如果要赢得这场战争，我们就应该改变策略。

Hèlǔxiǎofū jīdòng de chéngnuò yào tígōng gěi Gǔbā huǒjiàn yǐ dǐkàng Měiguó de qīnlüè。
赫鲁晓夫激动地承诺要提供给古巴火箭以抵抗美国的侵略。
雄才大略
xióngcái dàlüè
(a man of) great talent and bold vision; (a statesman or general of) rare gifts and bold strategy
他雄才大略满腹经纶，是个不可多得的人才。
Tā xióngcái dàlüè mǎnfù jīnglún，shì gè bùkě duōdé de réncái。
He has great knowledge and bold vision and is a rare genius .
雄才大略
雄才大略
核潜艇是一种战略武器。
Héqiántǐng shì yìzhǒng zhànlüè wǔqì。
The Nuclear submarine is a kind of strategic weapon.
文武才略
武装侵略
We will take up arms against the invading forces.
Wǒmen huì náqǐ wǔqì，dǐkàng qīnlüè shìlì。
我们会拿起武器，抵抗侵略势力。
The disarmament of the aggressor nations must be complete.
Jiěchú qīnlüèzhě guójiā wǔzhuāng de gōngzuò bìxū wánchéng。
解除侵略者国家武装的工作必须完成。
这事略有耳闻，详细情况不很清楚。
Zhè shì lüèyǒuěrwén，xiángxì qíngkuàng bùhěn qīngchu。
I\'ve heard a little about it, but I don\'t know the details.
这只是故事的概略。
Zhè zhǐshì gùshì de gàilüè。
This is only an outline of the story.
这件事我约略知道一些。
Zhèjiànshì wǒ yuēlüè zhīdào yìxiē。
I know something about the matter.
他写的故事过于缺略，应该再增加些细节。
Tā xiě de gùshì guòyú quēlüè，yīnggāi zài zēngjiā xiē xìjié。
The stories he writes are incomplete, they need more details.
对于这件事，我也只是略知皮毛。
Duìyú zhèjiàn shì，wǒ yě zhǐshì lüèzhī pímáo。
I know only a little about this matter.
这次的事多亏你帮助我，略备菲酌，表示感谢。
Zhècì de shì duōkuī nǐ bāngzhù wǒ，lüèbèi fěizhuó，biǎoshì gǎnxiè。
I\'d like to thank you for your help with a simple meal.
他是个有谋略、有才智的军事家。
Tā shì gè yǒu móuluè 、 yǒu cáizhì de jūnshìjiā.
He is a resourceful and astute strategist.
对于那种故事性不强的书，我仅仅略读而已。
Duìyú nàzhǒng gùshìxìng bùqiáng de shū，wǒ jǐnjǐn lüèdú éryǐ。
I just skim books which do not tell stories.
事略
先父事略。
那件事约略发生在20年前。
处理此事，要策略一些
该书记载史事，多有缺略之处。
他具有军事家的胆略
他是一位很有韬略的军事家。
事实粉碎了侵略者不可战胜的神话。
我那时也略略懂了点儿事

to lose sight of sth
[fig] 忽略某事
to omit to do sth
忽略做某事
Don\'t skip over that fact before you haven\'t come to any decision.
在你下决定之前，别略过了那个事实。
There were a few devices in the story.
Zhège gùshi zhōng yùnhánzhe yìxiē móulüè。
这个故事中蕴含着一些谋略。
Our views on this matter coincided.
Zài zhè jiàn shì shàng，wǒmen yīngxióng suǒjiàn lüètóng。
在这件事上，我们英雄所见略同。
He light-heartedly overlooks some of the basic facts of life.
Tā qīngyì de hūlüèle yìxiē jīběn shēnghuó shìshí。
他轻易地忽略了一些基本生活事实。

Xīlàrén de cèlüè yángé jīyú dìlǐxué de shìshí。
希腊人的策略严格基于地理学的事实。

忽略预算问题，而将计划直接报给董事会是非常愚蠢的。
这里的省略号是用来表示对话的断断续续。
Zhèli de shěnglüèhào shì yònglái biǎoshì duìhuà de duànduànxùxù。
The suspension points here are used to show the intermittence of the dialogue.
